text: An intelligent system connected to the video surveillance in the terminal can be given parameters to search for the current or latest location of a vehicle or person in the terminal by being given the register plate, a photo of a person, or other such identifying data.
ethical_us:
Title: Privacy-Protected Identification in Surveillance System

Description: As a security officer, I want to locate a vehicle or person using identifying data while ensuring the privacy of individuals is protected, so that surveillance operations comply with privacy regulations.

Work: 
- Implement data encryption for all identifying information inputted into the system.
- Ensure only authorized personnel can access identifying data and system functionalities.
- Log access and usage of identifying data for auditing and accountability purposes.
- Provide a clear privacy policy to users and stakeholders outlining data use and protection measures.
- Conduct privacy impact assessments to identify and mitigate potential privacy risks.
- Enable option for periodic deletion of identifying data to limit long-term retention.

text: Terminal area and booking documents and booking app contains the help information (for different purposes broken down).
ethical_us:
Title: Enhance Transparency in Terminal Area and Booking Documentation

Description: As a user, I want comprehensive help information available in terminal areas, booking documents, and the booking app broken down by purpose so that I can easily understand and access the assistance I need.

Work:
- Ensure help information is accessible in terminal areas and in all sections of booking documents.
- Categorize help information by specific purposes (e.g., booking changes, cancellations, payment issues) to aid user navigation.
- Include clear, concise explanations and instructions within each help section to facilitate user understanding.
- Provide multi-language support for help information to cater to diverse user groups.
- Regularly update the help information to maintain relevance and accuracy.
- Implement a feedback mechanism for users to report unclear or inadequate information.

text: Before a person with a vehicle enters the port, they are given explanation of what information will be handled, for example at the stage of making a reservation when they agree to give the necessary information of their vehicle.
ethical_us:
Title: Clear Information Disclosure for Vehicle Data Handling

Description: As a vehicle owner, I want to receive a transparent explanation of what information will be handled before entering the port, so that I am fully informed and can consent to the use of my data at the reservation stage.

Work: 
- Provide a clear and concise explanation of what vehicle information will be collected and how it will be used, displayed at the point of reservation.
- Ensure the explanation includes the purposes for data collection, potential data sharing with third parties, and data retention policies.
- Allow vehicle owners to review and agree to the data handling practices before making a reservation.
- Include a section for frequently asked questions (FAQ) regarding data handling for vehicles to enhance understanding.
- Implement an option for users to easily access a complete document outlining the data handling policy.
- Test the information disclosure process with a diverse group of users to ensure understandability and clarity.

text: A clear advertisement is placed on the booking document about the AI and data privacy.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Transparent Communication of AI and Data Privacy in Booking Documents

Description: As a customer, I want to clearly understand how my data is used by AI so that I can make informed decisions about my privacy when booking.

Work:
- Verify that the advertisement about AI and data privacy is prominently displayed on the booking document.
- Ensure the language used in the advertisement is clear, concise, and easy to understand for the average user.
- Include information on what specific data is collected, how it’s used, and the benefits of this data use.
- Provide a link or QR code to a detailed privacy policy for users who want more information.
- Test the advertisement with a diverse group of users to confirm its understandability and clarity.
- Ensure that updates to AI usage and data privacy are reflected immediately in the advertisement on booking documents.

text: Data information policy is communicated at the service app/web page. Procedures in place for GDPR compliance and required steps are planned for example huge amount of user data request. For example redirection of resources or waiting times are clearly communicated.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Data Policy Communication and GDPR Compliance

Description: As a user, I want clear communication of the data information policy and GDPR compliance procedures on the service app/web page, so that I understand how my personal data is managed and any potential wait times or redirection of resources for large data requests.

Work: 
- Ensure the data information policy is easily accessible and prominently displayed on the service app/web page.
- Provide a comprehensive explanation of GDPR compliance procedures.
- Include clear instructions for users on how to request their data.
- Clearly communicate expected processing times for large data requests and any potential waiting periods.
- Outline the steps for redirection of resources when handling large data requests.
- Regularly review and update the communication content to reflect any changes in data management practices or policies.

text: No feature of the smart terminal or port must interfere in an unwanted way with any system in the passenger vehicles.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Non-Interference of Smart Terminal Features with Passenger Vehicle Systems

Description: As a vehicle owner, I want smart terminal features to operate without interfering with my vehicle systems so that my driving experience remains safe and uninterrupted.

Work:
- Verify that the smart terminal is tested rigorously to ensure zero interference with vehicle systems.
- Conduct compatibility assessments with a comprehensive range of passenger vehicle models.
- Implement safety protocols that detect and mitigate potential interference scenarios.
- Ensure clear documentation and user guidelines are provided regarding the terminal's interaction with vehicle systems.
- Perform user testing to confirm the absence of interference in real-world scenarios.
- Establish a feedback mechanism for reporting any interference issues post-deployment.

text: Car indentation system (digital, semi-automated, etc.) with control, navigation and markings is placed in the car deck to direct cars in line and to right places.
ethical_us:
Title: Enhanced Car Deck Navigation for Driver Safety and Efficiency

Description: As a driver, I want a car indentation system on the car deck to guide my vehicle into the correct position so that the process of loading cars is efficient and beneficial for both passengers' safety and convenience.

Work: 
- The system accurately identifies available spots and guides cars to the correct position.
- Navigation and markings are clear and easy to understand for all drivers.
- The system provides seamless and safe automated or semi-automated assistance in directing vehicles.
- Regular updates ensure the system operates reliably and accommodates varying deck layouts and vehicle sizes.
- Any potential issues or obstructions are communicated to the driver in a timely manner to prevent accidents.

text: The system has a reliable way to detect people sitting in a vehicle, that is in balance with respecting the privacy of passengers and adhering to border protocols
ethical_us:
Title: Privacy-Conscious Passenger Detection in Vehicle

Description: As a border security officer, I want to reliably detect people sitting in a vehicle in a way that respects passenger privacy and adheres to border protocols, so that I can ensure border security without compromising individual privacy rights.

Work:
1. Ensure that the detection system collects only necessary data that cannot be used to personally identify the vehicle occupants.
2. Implement data anonymization techniques to protect passenger identities.
3. Ensure compliance with relevant data protection and privacy laws and regulations when designing the detection system.
4. Design a clear protocol for how detected data is processed, stored, and used, with an emphasis on minimizing retention periods.
5. Provide users with clear information about what data is being collected and how it will be used, ensuring transparency.
6. Regularly audit the system to ensure ongoing compliance with privacy requirements and protocols.

text: The system is transparent in its functioning and marks possible "uncertain" situations with timestamps or other identifying information
ethical_us:
Title: Enhance System Transparency with Identifiable Markers for Uncertainty

Description: As a system user, I want the system to transparently mark possible "uncertain" situations with timestamps or other identifying information so that I can understand and address potential ambiguities or inconsistencies effectively.

Work: 
- The system should clearly label situations deemed "uncertain" with a timestamp.
- The system should provide additional identifying information to pinpoint where and why uncertainty arises.
- A user interface element should display this information in an accessible and understandable manner.
- Notifications or alerts should be sent to relevant users when such marked situations occur.
- Documentation explaining the criteria for marking situations as "uncertain" should be available for users.
- Conduct user testing to ensure users can navigate and interpret "uncertain" markers proficiently.

text: Car identification system is tested with right and wrong data and error handling is defined in the terminal action plan and terminal personnel is trained with error handling.
ethical_us:
Title: Comprehensive Error Handling and Training for Car Identification System

Description: As a system administrator, I want the car identification system to be thoroughly tested with both accurate and inaccurate data, and have a clearly defined error handling plan so that I can ensure system reliability and manage errors efficiently.

Work: 
- Verify that the car identification system is tested with a diverse set of data inputs, including both correct and incorrect data.
- Develop a detailed error handling action plan that outlines steps to take when errors are encountered.
- Train terminal personnel in effective error handling procedures, ensuring they understand the action plan.
- Validate that terminal personnel can demonstrate correct error handling techniques during simulated scenarios.
- Set up a monitoring system to collect feedback from terminal personnel about error handling processes for future improvements.

text: The data tied to a person can be found and is eraseable in the system upon request.
ethical_us:
**Title: Data Erasure Request for Privacy**

**Description:** As a **system user**, I want to **ensure that my personal data can be found and erased from the system upon request** so that **my privacy is respected and protected**.

**Work:**

- Verify that personal data is logically organized and can be easily identified within the system.
- Implement a secure and user-friendly process for users to submit data erasure requests.
- Develop a mechanism to authenticate the identity of the requester to prevent unauthorized data modifications.
- Ensure the system can accurately and completely erase the user's data upon request.
- Provide confirmation to the user once their data has been successfully erased.
- Maintain a log of data erasure requests for accountability and auditing purposes.
- Regularly review and update the erasure process to comply with relevant privacy laws and regulations.

text: Smart terminal area is defined in the blueprints of the SMARTER project with responsibilities and roles.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Define Responsibilities and Roles for Smart Terminal Area in SMARTER Project

**Description**: As a project manager, I want to establish clear responsibilities and roles for the smart terminal area in the blueprints of the SMARTER project so that accountability and effective management can be ensured.

**Work**:
- Ensure all roles and responsibilities are clearly documented within the project blueprints.
- Assign responsibility for each key function within the smart terminal area.
- Verify that all stakeholders understand their roles and associated responsibilities.
- Conduct a review meeting with stakeholders to confirm responsibilities and address any concerns.
- Develop a mechanism for monitoring and reporting on role fulfillment and accountability.
- Document any updates or changes to responsibilities in the project archives for future reference.

text: The data storing and collecting follows the GDPR regulations and identifying data is anonymized or destroyed within the legal time frame.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure GDPR Compliance and Data Anonymization

Description: As a user, I want my identifying data to be anonymized or destroyed within the legal time frame to protect my privacy according to GDPR regulations.

Work: 
- Verify that data collection processes are in compliance with GDPR requirements.
- Implement mechanisms for anonymizing identifying data effectively.
- Establish a secure system for destroying data within the legally mandated time frame.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure ongoing compliance with GDPR.
- Provide transparency to users about data handling practices and processes.

text: Before being able to finish purchasing tickets, the passenger is required to accept the terms and conditions of using the smart terminal and having the minimum required data collected.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Transparent Consent for Data Collection

**Description:** As a passenger, I want to transparently understand and accept the terms and conditions of data collection before purchasing tickets so that I am fully informed about how my data is used and retained.

**Work:**
- [ ] The terms and conditions should be clearly visible and easily accessible before the purchase is completed.
- [ ] Provide a concise and understandable summary of data collection practices and usage.
- [ ] Include an option for passengers to view detailed information about data protection and privacy measures in place.
- [ ] Ensure passengers have the opportunity to explicitly consent by clicking an "accept" checkbox before finalizing the purchase.
- [ ] Allow passengers to ask questions or seek clarification about the terms and conditions if needed.
- [ ] Provide contact information or a FAQ section for more detailed inquiries regarding data privacy and usage.

text: Communication plan has a section about on-time communication for different logistical purposes towards car carriers

text: Data consent lifecycle is defined in the SMART terminal blueprints.

text: Harbor area will have clear signs of the data requirities and visualize the flow of events.

text: The boarding process is as similar to what it used to be as possible, or even simpler. Any and all instructions are crystal clear so that the passengers are able to proceed without asking for assistance as often as possible.

- Provide a user-friendly interface or signage that guides passengers through each step of the boarding process.
- Offer accessible support options for passengers who may need additional assistance.

text: Action plan for personnels in terms of delays are embedded into the logistics plan and it will have a section on human behaviour with smart system delays and actions preventing misbehaviour on passsengers.
ethical_us:

text: The system can display capacity information for passengers that access the service remotely and at the port, display terminals can also provide these types of information for passengers.

Title: Transparency in Capacity Information Display

Work:

- [ ] Implement intuitive interfaces on port display terminals for easy comprehension of capacity information.
- [ ] Provide a brief explanation or legend to clarify displayed capacity metrics to passengers.
- [ ] Test the accessibility and understandability of the information display on both remote and port terminals with a diverse group of users.
- [ ] Ensure information consistency across remote platforms and port terminals.

text: Clear logs that shows the state of the system and provide appropriate feedback and APIs that can improve system integration.
ethical_us:
**Title: Enhanced System Transparency through Clear Logs and APIs**

**Description:** As a system integrator, I want to access clear logs that show the state of the system and provide appropriate feedback and APIs so that I can improve system integration and ensure seamless communication across platforms.

**Work:**
1. Generate detailed logs that clearly represent the state of the system at any given time.
2. Ensure logs provide real-time and historical feedback relevant to system operations.
3. Develop and document APIs that facilitate transparent system integration.
4. Provide explanations for system states and transitions within the logs.
5. Implement secure access controls for logs and APIs to protect sensitive information.
6. Regularly update and maintain logs and APIs to reflect any system changes.

text: Technical data of the camera is communicated to developers and also to wider audience in order to built trust on the system as a whole
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Communication of Camera Technical Data

Description: As a responsible organization, I want to communicate the technical data of the camera to both developers and the wider audience so that trust in the system as a whole is built.

Work:
- Identify all relevant technical data of the camera that needs to be communicated.
- Create detailed documentation explaining the technical aspects of the camera.
- Develop a communication plan to share the technical data with developers and the wider audience.
- Ensure the documentation is accessible and understandable for non-technical audiences.
- Set up feedback mechanisms to allow for questions and suggestions from the audience.
- Regularly update the documentation and communication channels to reflect any changes or improvements in the camera technology.

text: Different use cases in passenger flows are modeled and communicated to all needed participants torugh the development lifecycle.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Communication of Passenger Flow Models

Description: As a project manager, I want to ensure that all use cases in passenger flows are clearly modeled and communicated to all necessary stakeholders throughout the development lifecycle so that all participants are informed and aligned with the project's objectives and processes.

Work:
- Ensure that detailed diagrams and descriptions of each passenger flow use case are created and documented.
- Conduct regular meetings with all stakeholders to review and discuss the modeled use cases.
- Develop clear and accessible communication materials explaining each use case, ensuring they are available to all participants.
- Implement a feedback loop allowing stakeholders to ask questions and provide input on the use cases.
- Confirm that all updates and changes to the use cases are communicated promptly to all involved parties.
- Monitor and record the understanding and satisfaction levels of stakeholders regarding the communicated use cases through surveys or interviews.

text: Passengers are instructed to clear their register plates before arriving to the terminal. An employee is still present to resolve problem situations (e.g. to quickly clean the register plate if needed). Accidents are handled as they currently are when two human drivers are involved. For accident situations with smart vehicles, accountability is also determined by the smart vehicle's accountability.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Accountability in Smart Vehicle Operations

Description: As a smart vehicle passenger, I want to ensure that accountability is clearly determined in situations involving my vehicle and another driver so that any incidents are handled fairly and responsibly.

Work: 
- Ensure that procedures are in place for determining accountability in accidents involving smart vehicles.
- Verify that employees are trained to resolve problem situations, such as cleaning register plates.
- Confirm that existing accident handling protocols for human-driven vehicles are adapted for mixed fault determinations in smart vehicle scenarios.
- Develop a system for documenting and analyzing incidents involving smart vehicles to ensure accuracy and integrity in accountability assignment.

text: If the terminal interacts with smart vehicles, it must be in a way that does not compromise the safety of either party. There must be clear limits to what data is shared and what permissions the systems have for information exchange.
ethical_us:
Title: Safeguarding Data Privacy in Smart Vehicle Interactions

Description: As a vehicle owner, I want the terminal to interact with my smart vehicle in a way that safeguards my personal data, so that my privacy is preserved and my autonomy respected.

Work:
- Ensure that data exchange between the terminal and smart vehicles is secured and encrypted.
- Define and implement clear boundaries for what data can be shared between the terminal and the vehicle.
- Specify and restrict the permissions for data access and information exchange between systems.
- Notify users about the type of data being exchanged and seek explicit permission.
- Provide users with the option to review and modify their data sharing preferences.

text: Smart harborfollows a protocol on traditional cars and a smart vehicles when developing the flow of events from harbor entering to entering to the ship.
ethical_us:
Title: Equitable Protocols for Traditional and Smart Vehicles at Smart Harbor

Description: As a Harbor Operations Manager, I want to ensure that both traditional cars and smart vehicles are treated equitably in the flow of events from harbor entry to ship boarding, so that all vehicle types experience fair and unbiased processing and operations.

Work:
- Develop a standardized set of protocols that apply equitably to both traditional cars and smart vehicles.
- Conduct a comparative analysis to identify any differing treatment or processing times between vehicle types.
- Implement system checks to ensure equal opportunity for processing speed and efficiency for all vehicles.
- Train staff on the importance of equitable treatment and how to apply protocols without bias.
- Establish a feedback system for monitoring and addressing any discrepancies in vehicle handling at the harbor.

text: Boarding pass on cars are shared with instructions for different vehicles.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Sharing of Boarding Pass Information

Description: As a transportation user, I want to understand how my boarding pass information is shared with different vehicle systems so that I can have clear knowledge of the usage and flow of my data.

Work: 
- Ensure that the system provides clear and comprehensible information regarding how boarding pass data is shared with different vehicle systems.
- Implement user interfaces that offer detailed explanations about the data sharing process, including the types of data shared and the intended recipients.
- Provide accessible documentation or help guides that describe the data flow in an easy-to-understand format.
- Conduct user feedback sessions to ensure the information provided is clear and meets user understanding and satisfaction.
- Ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations to maintain transparency and user trust.

text: The system can provide a standby system in place should the traffic lights fail or a human traffic warden that will help direct traffic for ship loading and unloading.
ethical_us:
Title: Standby Traffic Management System for Ship Loading and Unloading

Description: As a port authority manager, I want a system that can initiate a standby traffic control mechanism, so that traffic flow remains uninterrupted and safe in the event of traffic light failure.

Work:
- Ensure the system automatically detects traffic light failures and activates the standby mechanism promptly.
- Check that the standby system includes either a backup technological solution or alerts human traffic wardens.
- Verify that human traffic wardens receive real-time instructions and effective communication tools to manage traffic seamlessly.
- Confirm that there is a reporting system for instances of traffic control shifts, ensuring accountability and record-keeping.
- Test the reliability and responsiveness of the standby system under various failure scenarios.
- Ensure training protocols are updated for traffic wardens to effectively manage manual traffic control if needed.

text: Digital scanners that synchronize passenger information with regulations such as alcohol limits that can be brought in and to ensure that drunk or underage passengers are not driving.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Passenger Safety and Compliance through Synchronization of Information

Description: As a transportation safety officer, I want digital scanners that synchronize passenger information with regulations such as alcohol limits and age restrictions so that drunk or underage passengers are prevented from driving, ensuring passenger safety and public welfare.

Work:
- The digital scanner should accurately identify and verify passenger information in real-time.
- Ensure synchronization with current regulations on alcohol limits and age restrictions.
- Implement alerts or prompts for drivers when a violation is detected (e.g., underage or intoxicated passengers).
- Verify that the system does not unintentionally misidentify or unfairly target passengers due to errors.
- Regularly update regulation databases to reflect the latest laws and standards.
- Conduct testing to confirm system accuracy and reliability in various scenarios.

text: The system can provide a standby system in place should the traffic lights fail or a human traffic warden that will help direct traffic for ship loading and unloading.
ethical_us:
Title: Fail-Safe Traffic Management System for Ship Operations

Description: As a port operations manager, I want to have a standby traffic management system in place, such as a backup system or human traffic warden intervention, so that the risk of accidents and harm caused by traffic light failures during ship loading and unloading is minimized.

Work: 
- Ensure redundancy in the traffic management system by implementing a fail-safe mechanism.
- Develop a protocol for human traffic wardens to direct traffic in case of system failure.
- Conduct regular drills and training for human traffic wardens to respond effectively in emergency scenarios.
- Monitor and test the reliability of the standby system to ensure it meets safety standards.
- Document and communicate the contingency plan to all relevant personnel to ensure preparedness.

text: Regular digital or even manual information system checks with prompts informing on current updates such as parking information, duration of parking, etc.
ethical_us:
Title: Comprehensive Information Communication System for Parking

Description: As a vehicle driver, I want to receive regular updates and prompt notifications on parking information and duration, so that I can make informed decisions and manage my parking efficiently.

Work:

- Include prompts for the duration of parking to keep users informed about time limits.
- Ensure that all information is conveyed in an easily understandable format.
- Provide clear and concise notifications for any parking rule changes or updates.
- Verify the accuracy of the parking information provided to users.
- Ensure that users can access and understand the system’s functions and updates with ease.

text: Digital verification devices such as number plate scanners for vehicles to ensure that vehicle is authentic and in line with regulations and biometic scanner for human passengers.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Trustworthy Digital Verification for Vehicles and Passengers

Description: As a transportation security officer, I want to use digital verification devices such as number plate scanners and biometric scanners so that I can ensure that vehicles and passengers are authentic, compliant with regulations, and secure.

Work:
1. Verify that the number plate scanner accurately identifies and cross-references vehicle registration details with the regulatory database.
2. Ensure the biometric scanner securely captures and authenticates passenger identity without storing sensitive data unnecessarily.
3. Validate that all data communication between scanners and databases is encrypted to prevent unauthorized access or tampering.
4. Conduct regular audits to ensure the verification devices meet current security standards and ethical guidelines.
5. Provide clear and comprehensive documentation explaining how the verification process respects passenger privacy and data protection.
6. Implement a feedback system for users to report errors or any trust-related concerns with the verification devices.

text: Ensure the quality of the data by testing. Testing at least with race, gender, age should be done and variance between gropes should not be significant. Realtime testing in real context needs to be done before launch.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Fairness and Equity in Data Quality Assurance

Description: As an ethical AI developer, I want to ensure that the AI system is tested for fairness across race, gender, and age, so that it provides equitable and non-discriminatory outcomes.

Work: 
- Conduct data quality testing focused on demographic variables such as race, gender, and age.
- Analyze variance between demographic groups to ensure it is not significant.
- Perform real-time testing in real-world contexts to validate fairness before deploying the system.

- Verify that all booking feature developments adhere to the established guidelines through periodic audits.

text: Datalifecycle plan is made by the information management team for the developers to use from the beginning of the development phase.
ethical_us:
Title: Implementing a Privacy-Focused Data Lifecycle Plan

Description: As a developer, I want a comprehensive data lifecycle plan created by the information management team from the beginning of the development phase so that user privacy is safeguarded and maintained throughout the system's lifecycle.

Work:
- Review the data lifecycle plan provided by the information management team, ensuring it covers data collection, storage, usage, sharing, and deletion in compliance with privacy laws and regulations.
- Integrate the data lifecycle plan into the development workflow to ensure privacy considerations are addressed at each stage of the project.
- Verify that data minimization principles are adhered to, collecting only the necessary data for system functionality.
- Ensure secure data storage solutions are in place to protect user information from unauthorized access.
- Implement data access controls to restrict data handling only to authorized personnel.
- Establish guidelines for regular auditing and monitoring of data handling practices to ensure ongoing compliance with privacy standards.
- Document and communicate the data lifecycle plan and privacy measures to all stakeholders involved in the development process.

text: Criteria list of different purposes detected from the information flow should be made and Maintained.
ethical_us:
Title: Maintain Clear Documentation of Information Flow Purposes

Description: As a data analyst, I want to create and maintain a comprehensive list of different purposes detected from the information flow so that there is transparency in the data processing and its use is clearly understood by all stakeholders.

Work:
- Compile a detailed list of purposes for which data is collected and processed.
- Ensure the list is regularly updated to reflect any changes in the information flow.
- Make the documented purposes readily accessible to all relevant stakeholders.
- Include clear explanations and rationale for each purpose in the documentation.
- Implement a review process to verify the accuracy and clarity of the documented information flow purposes.
- Provide training or resources for stakeholders to understand the purposes and uses of data.

text: The flow of identity checking should be simulated and tested against identity teft issues.
ethical_us:
Title: Identify and Mitigate Potential Identity Theft Risks

Description: As a security analyst, I want to simulate and test the identity checking flow so that we can identify and mitigate any potential identity theft issues, ensuring the system does no harm to users.

Work: 
- Acceptance Criteria:
  - Simulate identity verification processes with realistic use cases.
  - Test the system against known identity theft patterns and tactics.
  - Identify potential vulnerabilities in the identity checking flow.
  - Ensure all detected vulnerabilities are categorized and documented.
  - Implement necessary safeguards and countermeasures to address identified risks.
  - Validate that implemented safeguards effectively mitigate identity theft risks.
  - Perform regression testing to confirm the system's overall security remains intact.
  - Conduct a review meeting to verify all checks and improvements are completed satisfactorily.

text: System keeps track of all button presses and other actions and logs them. Activity associated with user accounts (where applicable).
ethical_us:
Title: Visibility of User Activity Logging

Description: As a user, I want to clearly understand what actions are being tracked and logged by the system so that I can be informed about my digital footprint and ensure transparency.

Work:
- Provide users with clear, accessible information regarding the types of actions that are being logged.
- Implement a user-friendly dashboard or notification system detailing logged activities associated with user accounts.
- Ensure that privacy policies concerning activity logging are easily accessible and written in understandable language.
- Allow users to view their logged activities upon request to maintain transparency.
- Regularly update users on any changes to the logging process and its purposes.

text: The product shall ensure that it can only be accessed by authorized users. The product will be able to distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users in all access attempts.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Secure Access for Authorized Users  

Description: As a system administrator, I want to ensure that only authorized users can access the product so that the security and trustworthiness of the system are maintained.  

Work:  
- Verify that the system can accurately identify authorized users during all access attempts.
- Implement authentication mechanisms that reliably distinguish between authorized and unauthorized users.
- Conduct rigorous testing to ensure no unauthorized access occurs.
- Document access attempts and their outcomes to ensure transparency and accountability.  
- Provide support for regular updates to authentication methods to adapt to emerging security threats.

text: The system shall offer a display of all the Events in the exercise.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Display of Exercise Events

Description: As a user, I want to view all events in the exercise clearly and comprehensively so that I can understand the sequence of events and make informed decisions.

Work: 
- Ensure all events are accurately listed with timestamps and relevant details.
- Provide clear and understandable explanations or descriptions for each event.
- Implement features to filter and sort events based on different criteria like time, type, or importance.
- Validate that the display is accessible and user-friendly across different devices and platforms.
- Allow users to view additional details or descriptions by selecting an event.

text: Only registered realtors shall be able to access the system.
ethical_us:
Title: Access Control for Realtor Privacy

Description: As a real estate client, I want only registered realtors to access the system so that my personal information is protected.

Work:
- Verify that the system requires valid realtor registration credentials for access.
- Ensure that unauthorized users are restricted from accessing the system.
- Implement encryption for login data to secure user credentials.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure only registered realtors maintain access.
- Provide clear communication to realtors about privacy policies and data protection measures.

text: Every user of the system shall be authenticated and authorized.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Authentication and Authorization for User Privacy

Description: As a system administrator, I want to ensure every user of the system is authenticated and authorized so that their personal data remains secure and private, protecting their identity and access rights.

Work:
- Verify that the system requires users to provide valid credentials for authentication.
- Ensure that the authorization process restricts access to only those resources necessary for each user.
- Implement encryption methods for storing and transmitting authentication data to protect user privacy.
- Conduct regular audits to check for unauthorized access attempts and resolve any identified breaches promptly.
- Provide users with information on how their data is being protected and steps they can take to maintain their privacy.

text: The product shall prevent its data from incorrect data being introduced.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Data Integrity for Trustworthiness

Description: As a data analyst, I want to ensure that only correct and validated data is introduced into the system so that the integrity and reliability of insights derived from the data are maintained.

Work:
- Validate inputs against predefined schemas to ensure data format correctness.
- Implement data quality checks to identify and flag discrepancies or irregularities.
- Include an audit trail to track data entry and modifications for accountability.
- Set up automated alerts for data anomalies or unauthorized data entries.
- Ensure that data entry interfaces include user guidance to minimize manual input errors.

text: Only authorized users shall have access to students' personal information.
ethical_us:
Title: Controlled Access to Students' Personal Information

Description: As a compliance officer, I want to ensure that only authorized users have access to students' personal information so that the privacy of the students is not compromised.

Work:
- Verify user authentication mechanisms are in place and functioning correctly.
- Ensure proper access control policies are established and documented.
- Implement role-based access control to restrict access to sensitive data.
- Conduct regular audits to monitor access logs and identify unauthorized attempts.
- Provide training to users on data privacy and security protocols.
- Establish a protocol for swiftly revoking access when no longer necessary.

text: The system shall protect private information in accordance with the organization's information policy.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Information Handling for Trustworthy Systems

Description: As a data privacy officer, I want to ensure all private information is safeguarded in compliance with the organization's information policy so that users can trust our system to protect their data.

Work:
- Verify that data encryption protocols are in place and up-to-date.
- Ensure compliance with the organization's information security policy.
- Conduct regular audits to check for data breaches or vulnerabilities.
- Implement access controls to limit information exposure to authorized personnel only.
- Provide clear documentation for users on how their information is protected.
- Regularly update the team regarding changes in privacy regulations or policy adjustments.

text: The system shall have basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Data Integrity and Accountability

Description: As a Systems Administrator, I want to implement basic data integrity checking to reduce the possibility of incorrect or invalid data being introduced, so that the system maintains reliability and stakeholders can be accountable for accurate data handling.

Work:
- Implement mechanisms to validate data at each entry point to the system.
- Ensure that there are logs for any data correction, addition, or deletion, including timestamps and operator identity.
- Provide training for users on how to correctly input data and recognize errors.
- Conduct regular audits of the data integrity processes to ensure they are functioning as intended.
- Provide a user-friendly report mechanism for stakeholders to view data accuracy levels and any discrepancies detected.

text: The system shall be built such that it is as secure as possible from malicious interference.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring System Security Against Malicious Interference

Description: As a system administrator, I want to ensure the system is secure from malicious interference so that users can trust the integrity and reliability of our services.

Work: 
- Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments.
- Implement robust authentication and authorization mechanisms.
- Ensure data encryption for data in transit and at rest.
- Establish comprehensive incident response plans.
- Continuously update and patch the system to mitigate emerging threats.
- Monitor system logs and activities for suspicious behavior.
- Provide transparent communication to users regarding security measures and updates.

text: The product must comply with Sarbanes-Oxley.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Compliance with Sarbanes-Oxley for Financial Integrity

Description: As a compliance officer, I want the product to adhere to Sarbanes-Oxley regulations so that the organization maintains accountability and upholds financial integrity.

Work: 
- Verify that financial data processing and storage align with Sarbanes-Oxley requirements.
- Implement audit trails for all financial transactions to ensure traceability and accountability.
- Ensure regular compliance audits and assessments are conducted to identify and rectify any deviations from Sarbanes-Oxley standards.
- Provide training for all relevant employees on Sarbanes-Oxley compliance responsibilities and reporting procedures.
- Establish a transparent and accessible reporting system for financial disclosures.

text: The system shall prevent malicious attacks including denial of service.
ethical_us:
Title: Robust Security to Build User Trust

Description: As a system administrator, I want to ensure the system prevents malicious attacks, including denial of service, so that users can trust our platform's reliability and security.

Work: 
- Implement intrusion detection and prevention mechanisms to identify potential threats in real-time.
- Conduct regular security audits and penetration testing to assess system vulnerabilities.
- Establish rate limiting and automated filtering to mitigate and manage denial of service attacks.
- Develop incident response and recovery protocols to restore service swiftly following an attack.
- Communicate security measures and protocols transparently to users to enhance trust.

text: The product shall conform to the Americans with Disabilities Act.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Accessibility for All Users

Description: As a user with disabilities, I want to access and interact with the product effectively so that my inherent dignity and rights are respected.

Work: 
- Verify that the user interface is compliant with the Americans with Disabilities Act (ADA) standards. 
- Ensure that all text is screen-reader compatible, providing clear and concise alternative text for images. 
- Test the product with users from diverse ability groups to ensure accessibility and ease of use. 
- Implement accessible navigation features such as keyboard shortcuts or voice commands. 
- Conduct regular audits to maintain ADA compliance and incorporate feedback from the disabled community.

text: The product shall have the ability to receive automatic software updates as new threats emerge. 100% of customers will be able to receive automatic software updates transmitted to the installed product.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Reliable and Responsible Automatic Software Updates

Description: As a conscientious software administrator, I want to ensure that all products receive automatic software updates responsibly so that all users are protected from emerging threats and our organization fulfills its duty of care and accountability.

Work:
- Verify that the automatic update feature is enabled by default for all customer installations.
- Implement a notification system to inform administrators of new updates and their content.
- Ensure that update transmissions are secure and do not compromise user data.
- Validate that the update process does not disrupt the functionality or availability of the product.
- Develop a rollback feature to allow restoration to previous versions if new updates cause issues.
- Conduct regular audits to confirm updates align with industry standards and organizational policies.
- Provide administrators with logs and documentation of updates for accountability purposes.

text: The System shall meet all applicable accounting standards. The final version of the System must successfully pass independent audit performed by a certified auditor.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Transparent Compliance with Accounting Standards

Description: As an auditor, I want to ensure that the system meets all applicable accounting standards and successfully passes an independent audit so that stakeholders have confidence in the system's financial integrity and reliability.

Work:
- Verify that the system is aligned with the latest applicable accounting standards.
- Conduct a comprehensive review to ensure all financial processes are documented and transparent.
- Arrange for an independent audit to be performed by a certified auditor.
- Ensure the system provides clear and understandable audit trails for financial transactions.
- Document the audit process and findings to maintain transparency.
- Implement corrective actions if any non-compliance issues are identified during the audit.

text: The System shall be able to automatically backup business data and restore them on demand.
ethical_us:
Title: Safe and Reliable Data Backup and Restoration

Description: As a business owner, I want to ensure my business data is automatically backed up and can be restored on demand so that I can avoid data loss and minimize potential harm to the business.

Work: 
- Implement a system that securely backs up business data at regular, configurable intervals.
- Ensure backups are encrypted to protect data from unauthorized access.
- Develop a user-friendly interface for initiating data restoration on demand.
- Test the automated backup and restoration process to ensure it operates without causing data corruption.
- Provide detailed user guidelines on data backup and restoration processes.
- Regularly audit the backup and restoration system to identify and address potential vulnerabilities.

text: The website shall make its user aware of its information practices before collection data from them via a Privacy Policy, accessible on all pages of the website.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparency in Data Collection Practices

Description: As a website user, I want to be informed about the website's information practices through a Privacy Policy before any data collection occurs, so that I understand how my data will be used and can make informed decisions.

Work: 
- Ensure a clear and comprehensive Privacy Policy is drafted, detailing all information practices.
- Position the Privacy Policy link prominently on all pages of the website for easy access.
- Verify that the Privacy Policy is written in understandable, non-technical language.
- Test the visibility and accessibility of the Privacy Policy link on various devices and browsers.
- Ensure the Privacy Policy is updated regularly and reflects any changes in data practices.
- Provide users with the option to review the Privacy Policy before proceeding with data submission.
- Collect feedback from users to improve the clarity and accessibility of the Privacy Policy.

text: The system shall notify customers of changes to its information policy.
ethical_us:
Title: Clear Communication of Information Policy Updates

Description: As a conscientious customer, I want to be notified of changes to the information policy so that I can remain informed and make informed decisions regarding my personal data usage.

Work: 
- The system shall send an email notification to customers when changes to the information policy occur.
- The notification shall include a summary of the changes made.
- The notification shall provide a link to the full updated information policy.
- The system shall notify customers at least 30 days before the changes take effect.
- The system shall track customer acknowledgments of the policy change notifications.

text: The system shall reveal private information only in compliance with the organizations information policy.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Controlled Access to Private Information

Description: As a data compliance officer, I want to ensure that private information is revealed only in compliance with the organization's information policy so that trust is maintained and data is protected responsibly.

Work: 
- Verify that the system's data disclosure procedures are aligned with the organization's information policy.
- Implement access controls that limit information disclosure to authorized personnel only, according to policy guidelines.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure private information is accessed and revealed in compliance with established policies.
- Create a logging mechanism to track and document all instances of private information access and disclosure.
- Develop a user education program regarding the importance of complying with information policy in data handling.

text: All credit card information will be encrypted in the database.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Transparent Encryption of Credit Card Information

Description: As a responsible developer, I want to encrypt all credit card information in the database so that users can trust that their sensitive financial data is securely handled and accessed only by authorized personnel.

Work:
- Verify that encryption algorithms align with industry standards for data security.
- Document the encryption process clearly to ensure that it is understandable and explainable to stakeholders.
- Implement encryption in the database for all stored credit card information.
- Develop and provide transparent reporting features that allow users to see where and how their credit card data is stored and secured.
- Establish and communicate a protocol for regularly auditing the encryption process for effectiveness and compliance with transparency requirements.

text: Daily usage statistics should be logged  and accessible by the administrator.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Access to Daily Usage Statistics

Description: As an administrator, I want to log and access daily usage statistics so that I can ensure transparency in the system's operations and performance.

Work: 
- Ensure daily usage data is logged accurately and consistently.
- Facilitate easy access to logged data for administrators.
- Provide clear documentation on how to interpret and utilize the logged statistics.
- Implement a user-friendly interface for viewing and analyzing usage metrics.
- Regularly update and audit logging mechanisms to maintain data integrity and transparency.
- Include explanations for any anomalies or irregularities in logged data.

text: For leads that process longer than 25 seconds the system will record the event and duration
ethical_us:
Title: Transparency in Tracking Lead Processing Times

Description: As a System Administrator, I want to record events and their duration for leads that process longer than 25 seconds so that I can ensure transparency in system performance and identify potential bottlenecks.

Work: 
- Ensure the system logs all lead processing events exceeding 25 seconds.
- Record the exact duration of each logged event.
- Store event logs in a secure, accessible database for review.
- Provide a user interface for administrators to access and analyze the log data.
- Include a feature for generating reports on processing times for transparency documentation.
- Ensure compliance with privacy regulations while recording processing times and events.

text: The product shall protect the identity of the players. The product shall provide players no access to information that might reveal the identity of another player.
ethical_us:
Title: Protect Player Identity Through Confidential Interaction

Description: As a player, I want the product to ensure my identity remains private and secure so that my personal information is not disclosed to others.

Work: 
- Verify that players do not have access to identifiable information about other players.
- Implement anonymization techniques to mask personal details in shared data.
- Ensure secure handling and storage of any sensitive information.
- Conduct regular audits to confirm no identity data breaches occur.
- Provide players with privacy settings to control visibility of their information.

text: The product shall be available to players who understand English, Spanish and French. The product shall allow the user to select the language upon accessing the product.
ethical_us:
Title: Multilingual Accessibility for Inclusive User Experience

Description: As a multilingual player, I want to select my preferred language from English, Spanish, or French upon accessing the product so that I can have an equitable and fair user experience in my native language.

Work:
- The product shall provide an option to select a language (English, Spanish, French) upon initial access.
- The language selection interface shall be intuitive and easily accessible to all users.
- The product shall consistently present all content in the selected language throughout user interactions.
- User feedback in all supported languages shall be incorporated to ensure the content quality and usability.
- The product shall be tested for language-specific functionality and display discrepancies to ensure fairness in user experience.

text: The system shall have high availability every day of the year. The system must be available for use between 12:00AM and 6:00PM all days of the year.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Continuous Responsible Availability

Description: As a service user, I want to ensure the system is reliably available every day of the year so that I can access services without unexpected interruptions.

Work: 
- Verify the system's uptime metrics to ensure availability from 12:00 AM to 6:00 PM daily.
- Implement robust monitoring and alerting mechanisms to promptly identify and rectify any availability issues.
- Conduct regular maintenance and updates outside of specified operational hours to prevent downtime.
- Document accountability procedures for incidents impacting system availability.
- Ensure backup systems and contingency plans are in place to maintain service continuity.

text: The product shall provide GUI based Monitoring Services. System Administrators shall monitor message exchanges will predict and determine problems and will also provide internal and external support.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent GUI Monitoring for System Administrators

Description: As a System Administrator, I want to utilize a GUI for monitoring message exchanges so that I can predict, determine problems, and provide both internal and external support transparently.

Work:
- Ensure the GUI provides clear and easily understandable data visualization for monitoring tasks.
- Include explanations for each monitored data point to enhance understandability regarding message exchanges.
- Implement logging features that record actions taken by the monitoring system for transparency.
- Provide real-time alerts and detailed reports that communicate system status and potential issues to avoid misunderstandings.
- Ensure the system allows System Administrators to access historical message data to support explainability of past actions.
- Verify that support processes are documented and communicated clearly to internal and external stakeholders.

text: The product shall be available 99% of the time. Rationale: To avoid service interruption during busiest customer service response periods. The product shall be available 99.99% of the time for regular business days.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring High Availability for System Reliability

Description: As a system administrator, I want to ensure the product is available 99.99% of the time on regular business days so that service interruptions during peak customer service periods are minimized. 

Work: 
- Monitor server uptime and performance continuously to ensure compliance with availability requirements.
- Implement failover mechanisms and redundancy to address potential system failures.
- Conduct regular reviews and maintenance to preemptively address system vulnerabilities.
- Ensure there are clear escalation protocols for addressing unplanned downtime promptly.
- Update stakeholders with regular reports on availability metrics and improvement measures. 
- Test the system under various scenarios to ensure robust responses to high-demand periods.

text: The product shall information Security. The product shall enable privacy by encryption WS-Security and Integrity Checking
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Information Processing for Enhanced Trust

Description: As an <end user>, I want to ensure that all my sensitive information is securely processed <so that> my data remains protected and I can trust the system with my privacy.

Work: 
- Verify that WS-Security encryption is implemented across all data transmission processes.
- Ensure integrity checking mechanisms are in place to detect any unauthorized data alterations.
- Conduct regular security audits to verify the robustness of encryption and integrity measures.
- Implement robust logging to track and report any security breaches or attempts.
- Provide user access control and authentication methods to safeguard data confidentiality.
- Regularly update encryption protocols to the latest standards for optimal security.

text: The product shall have audit capabilities.The product shall store messages for a minimum of one year for audit and transaction tracking purposes.
ethical_us:
Title: Enhanced Audit Transparency for Transaction Integrity

Description: As a compliance officer, I want to have access to audit capabilities and store messages for a minimum of one year so that I can ensure transparency and track transactions effectively.

Work:
- [ ] Implement a secure and accessible audit log that captures all relevant transactions.
- [ ] Ensure messages are stored for a minimum duration of one year in a secure manner.
- [ ] Provide search and filtering capabilities for retrieving specific transaction records.
- [ ] Enable export functionality for audit logs to allow comprehensive reviews.
- [ ] Include clear documentation outlining audit processes and data retention policies.

text: All changes  updates  and additions to the WCS system shall be updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides. Every change must be reflected in WCS system documentation
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Transparent Documentation Updates in WCS System

Description: As a WCS User, I want all changes, updates, and additions to the WCS system to be consistently updated in the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides so that I can understand the system's current state and functionalities.

Work: 
- Verify that any code or feature changes are documented in both the WCS Developer and WCS User Guides.
- Ensure that documentation is clear, understandable, and aligns accurately with the latest system updates.
- Check that all stakeholders, including developers and users, have access to the updated documentation in a timely manner.
- Create a version control system for documentation updates to track changes and ensure accountability.
- Conduct periodic reviews to ensure documentation reflects the current system accurately.

text: The system shall display and embed in each message a date/timestamp of when the message was sent.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Message Transparency with Date/Time Stamps

Description: As a system user, I want to see a date/timestamp on each message so that I can verify when the message was sent and ensure transparency in communication.

Work:
- Display the date/timestamp in a clear and consistent format on each message.
- Ensure the timestamp reflects the exact date and time the message was sent.
- Confirm the timestamp information remains accurate across different time zones.
- Enable easy access to timestamps for users with varying accessibility needs.
- Document how timestamps are generated and maintained for user assurance.

text: All network transactions that involve financial information or personally identifiable information shall be encrypted.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Encryption for Financial and Personal Data Transactions

Description: As a user, I want all network transactions involving financial information or personally identifiable information to be encrypted so that I can trust the system to protect my sensitive data.

Work: 
- Ensure that encryption protocols are implemented for all transactions involving financial data.
- Validate that encryption is applied to transactions containing personally identifiable information.
- Conduct regular security audits to verify the integrity and effectiveness of the encryption measures.
- Provide clear communication and documentation to users regarding the encryption processes in place.
- Ensure compliance with relevant security standards and regulations related to data protection.

text: System use shall not cause any harm to human users.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure AI Systems Do No Harm to Users  

Description: As a concerned citizen, I want AI systems to operate safely and not cause harm to human users so that individuals are protected from potential physical or psychological risks associated with AI technologies.  

Work:  
- Conduct thorough risk assessments to identify potential harm the system might cause.  
- Implement safety measures to mitigate identified risks.  
- Regularly review and update the system to address new or emerging threats.  
- Ensure transparency in how safety measures are implemented for user understanding.  
- Test the system in varied and realistic scenarios to validate its safety features.  
- Establish a feedback mechanism for users to report safety concerns promptly.  
- Document all safety protocols and share them with stakeholders.

text: The system should warn ECA users about the malfunction of the system.
ethical_us:
Title: Proactive Malfunction Alert for ECA Users  

Description: As an ECA user, I want to be proactively warned about system malfunctions so that I can avoid potential harm and disruption to my activities.

Work:  
- The system must continuously monitor for potential malfunctions.  
- The system should promptly detect any signs of malfunction.  
- The system must send an alert to ECA users within 5 minutes of detecting a malfunction.  
- The alert should provide clear and understandable information about the nature of the malfunction.  
- The alert must include steps users can take to mitigate any risks or disruptions.  
- User feedback should be collected to ensure the alerts are effectively serving their purpose.  
- Regular reviews must be conducted to improve the accuracy and efficiency of malfunction detection and alerts.

text: The system shall provide multi language support.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Dignified Access through Multi-Language Support

Description: As a non-native speaker, I want to access and use the system in my preferred language so that I feel respected and acknowledged in my diverse linguistic identity.

Work:
- Implement a language selection feature allowing users to choose from a diverse set of language options.
- Ensure accurate and culturally sensitive translations across all languages available on the platform.
- Conduct usability testing with native speakers of each supported language to verify clarity and comprehensibility.
- Provide user-friendly instructions for switching languages within the system.
- Continuously update and expand language options based on user feedback and emerging needs.

text: The system shall refresh the display every 60 seconds.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Trust

Title: Ensure System Display Refresh for Trustworthy Information

Description: As a system user, I want the display to refresh every 60 seconds so that I can ensure the data I am viewing is current and reliable.

Work: 
- Implement a timer mechanism that triggers a display refresh every 60 seconds.
- Test the system to ensure that the display refresh function works correctly and consistently without errors.
- Provide feedback or notifications to users indicating that the display has been refreshed.
- Ensure the refresh process does not disrupt ongoing user activities or cause delays in system performance.
- Update documentation to inform users about the system's 60-second refresh interval for maintaining data currency.

text: The application shall match the color of the schema set forth by Department of Homeland Security
ethical_us:
Title: Compliance with DHS Color Scheme Guidelines

Description: As a Government Compliance Officer, I want the application to match the color scheme set forth by the Department of Homeland Security so that it adheres to the required legal and regulatory standards, ensuring transparency and trust in the application.

Work: 
- Review the Department of Homeland Security's official color scheme guidelines.
- Implement the designated color codes within the application interface.
- Conduct a visual audit to verify adherence to the DHS color scheme.
- Document the color scheme implementation for internal records and future reviews.
- Obtain a compliance sign-off from a designated department or authority.

text: If projected  the data must be readable.  On a 10x10 projection screen  90% of viewers must be able to read Event / Activity data from a viewing distance of 30
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Readable Projection for Inclusivity

Description: As an event attendee with varying vision capabilities, I want to be able to clearly read Event/Activity data from a 10x10 projection screen at a distance of 30 feet so that I can participate fully and without discomfort during presentations.

Work:
- Ensure text size and font are optimized for readability at 30 feet.
- Conduct tests with diverse audience members to confirm at least 90% can read the information clearly.
- Use high-contrast color schemes to enhance visibility in varying lighting conditions.
- Provide alternative methods for accessing the data, such as handouts or digital copies.
- Gather feedback from attendees with different vision needs to continually improve the presentation accessibility.

Principle: Dignity

This user story is aligned with the principle of Dignity, ensuring that the design accommodates individuals' inherent worth and rights to participate fully and equally, regardless of their vision capabilities.

text: The product shall be available during normal business hours. As long as the user has access to the client PC  the system will be available 99% of the time during the first six months of operation.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Reliable Service Availability

Description: As an office employee, I want the system to be available 99% of the time during normal business hours so that I can rely on it to perform my daily tasks without interruptions and inefficiencies.

Work:
- Verify system uptime reports to ensure 99% availability during normal business hours for the first six months of operation.
- Conduct regular system maintenance to prevent unexpected downtimes.
- Implement a robust alert system for quick response to any service disruptions.
- Ensure there is a customer support framework in place for immediate assistance during downtime.
- Review and analyze any downtime incidents to prevent future occurrences.

This user story relates to the ethical principle of Trust, as it emphasizes system reliability, which is crucial in building and maintaining user trust in the technology.

text: If projected  the data must be understandable. On a 10x10 projection screen  90% of viewers must be able to determine that Events or Activities are occuring in current time from a viewing distance of 100
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Understandable Event Projection 

Description: As an event participant, I want to clearly understand the events or activities being projected on the screen from a reasonable distance so that I can fully engage with the ongoing proceedings and make informed decisions.

Work:
- Verify that the projected data is clearly visible and comprehensible from a distance of 100 feet on a 10x10 projection screen.
- Conduct user testing with a sample group to ensure that at least 90% of viewers can discern current events or activities from the projection.
- Implement visual enhancements, such as appropriate font sizes and color contrasts, to improve readability.
- Ensure that real-time updates and cues are displayed promptly and are easily distinguishable by viewers.

text: The product shall respond fast to keep up-to-date data in the display.
ethical_us:
Title: Real-Time Data Responsiveness for User Trust

Description: As a user, I want the product to respond quickly and keep the data on the display up-to-date so that I can trust the accuracy and timeliness of the information provided.

Work: 
- Implement an efficient data processing algorithm to ensure rapid updates to the display.
- Conduct testing to measure and ensure the system's response time aligns with user expectations.
- Create monitoring tools to detect and address any delays or data inaccuracies promptly.
- Engage in regular updates and feedback sessions with users to continually refine responsiveness and data accuracy.
- Document the processes and system response times transparently for user reassurance and trust-building.

text: The system shall have a MDI form that allows for the viewing of the graph and the data table.
ethical_us:
Title: Multi-View Data Accessibility for Informed Decision-Making

Description: As a data analyst, I want to view the graph and data table simultaneously in an MDI form so that I can make more informed and transparent decisions based on comprehensive data analysis.

Work:
- The MDI form allows seamless switching between graph and data table views without losing context.
- Both the graph and data table should update in real-time with data changes to ensure transparency.
- Users can resize and organize the views to customize their analysis workspace.
- Tooltips and legends are included to help users understand the graph and data table elements.
- The system will provide clear documentation on how to use and interpret the views for transparency purposes.

text: The system shall display Events in a vertical table by time.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Display of Events by Time

Description: As a user, I want to view events displayed in a vertical table by time so that I can understand the timeline clearly and make informed decisions.

Work: 
- Ensure that the events are organized chronologically in a vertical table format.
- Implement a clear and user-friendly interface that labels and defines each time slot accurately.
- Provide options for users to filter events by specific time frames for better clarity.
- Test the system for clarity and ease of navigation to ensure events are displayed transparently and correctly.
- Conduct user feedback sessions to refine the display based on user understanding and transparency needs.

text: The system shall display the Events in a graph by time.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Transparent Visualization of Event Data

**Description:** As a data analyst, I want to view events displayed in a graph by time so that I can easily understand temporal patterns and communicate findings transparently.

**Work:**
- The graph should accurately represent data according to the specified timeline.
- Ensure the graph is easy to interpret, with clearly labeled axes and legends.
- Provide the ability to highlight specific time periods for detailed analysis.
- Allow users to export the graph for reporting and sharing purposes.
- Incorporate a help section explaining how the data is processed and graphed to enhance transparency.

text: The system shall display Events or Activities.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparent Display of Events or Activities

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to transparently display events or activities so that I can make informed decisions and trust the platform.

**Work**:
- Ensure that all events or activities are displayed clearly with relevant details.
- Provide an explanation or context for each event/activity to enhance understandability.
- Include a communication channel for queries regarding displayed events/activities.
- Offer a history or log of past events or activities for user reference.
- Verify that all displayed information adheres to transparency standards and guidelines.

text: The display shall have two regions:  left 2/3 of the display is graphical  right 1/3 of the display is a data table
ethical_us:
**Title:** Clear and Understandable Display Layout

**Description:** As a user, I want the display to be divided into a graphical region and a data table region so that I can easily understand and analyze the information being presented without confusion.

**Work:**
1. Ensure that the left 2/3 of the display is dedicated to graphical representations, providing a visual overview of the data.
2. Ensure that the right 1/3 of the display is allocated for a data table, allowing for detailed numerical analysis.
3. Verify that the transition between the graphical and data table regions is seamless and clear.
4. Test the display layout for different types of data to ensure it remains understandable and accessible.
5. Provide an option to highlight or enlarge specific areas for better focus and analysis.
6. Collect user feedback on the clarity and effectiveness of the display layout for continual improvement.

**Related Ethical Principle:** Transparency - Ensuring that the presentation of information is clear and understandable to foster effective communication and comprehension.

text: The data displayed in both the nodes within the graph and the rows in the table are MSEL Summary data
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensure Transparency in MSEL Summary Data Display**

**Description:** As a *data analyst*, I want to understand and verify the accuracy of MSEL Summary data displayed in both the graph nodes and table rows so that I can trust the information being used for decision-making.

**Work:**
- Acceptance Criteria:
  1. Ensure that each data point in the nodes and rows is accompanied by its source or origin.
  2. Provide a clear explanation of any calculations or transformations applied to the data.
  3. Implement tooltips or a help function that provides context and definitions for technical terms or abbreviations used in the data display.
  4. Create documentation accessible from the interface that outlines the methodology for selecting and displaying data.
  5. Verify and cross-reference displayed data with original MSEL Summary reports to ensure accuracy and consistency.

text: The table side of the display shall be split into 2 regions: sequential and temporal.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Enhancing Data Presentation for Increased Transparency

Description: As a data analyst, I want the table side of the display to be split into two regions: sequential and temporal, so that I can clearly and transparently interpret data trends and patterns over time.

Work: 
- Ensure the display is clearly divided into sequential and temporal regions.
- Label each region accurately with headers for easy identification.
- Implement color-coding or other visual cues to differentiate data types between the regions.
- Provide hover-over tooltips or pop-ups explaining the purpose and content of each region.
- Test the display with users to ensure the division aids in transparency and understanding of the data.

text: The top 1/4 of the table will hold events that are to occur sequentially.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Event Sequencing for Enhanced Clarity

Description: As an event planner, I want to see events that are to occur sequentially in the top 1/4 of the table so that I can easily understand the order and timing of upcoming events with clarity.

Work:
- Display all upcoming sequential events in the top 1/4 of the table.
- Ensure that the sequenced events are clearly labeled with their time and date.
- Provide a clear visual indicator to delineate sequential events from non-sequential ones.
- Ensure the system is capable of updating the table dynamically as event schedules change to maintain transparency.

text: The bottom 3/4 of the table will hold events that occur according to its relevance to current time.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Transparent Event Display for Real-Time Context

Description: As an event analyst, I want to view events updated in real-time according to their relevance to the current time, so that I can make informed decisions based on the most recent and relevant data available.

Work:
- Ensure that the events in the bottom 3/4 of the table are displayed in real-time as they occur.
- Implement a clear visual indicator for new and updated events to enhance visibility and understanding.
- Provide an explainer tooltip or guide that clarifies how events are filtered and prioritized for visibility.
- Ensure the timestamp for each event is visible and accurate to maintain trust and accountability.
- Conduct user testing to confirm that users understand the display and feel that it accurately represents real-time events.

text: The system shall color code events according to their variance from current time.
ethical_us:
### Title: Transparent Event Timing Visualization

### Description: 
As a user, I want the system to color code events according to their variance from the current time so that I can clearly understand and manage event timings with greater clarity.

### Work:
- Acceptance Criteria:
  1. The system shall display events in different colors based on how close or far they are from the current time.
  2. Events happening in the near future should be displayed in a color distinct from those occurring much later.
  3. There should be a legend or explanation available that clarifies the color coding system.
  4. Users can adjust or customize the color coding preferences based on personal or accessibility needs.
  5. The system shall update the color coding dynamically as the current time progresses.

text: The system shall display data from the Sync Matrix 1.0 and Exercise Management Tool 1.0 applications
ethical_us:
