2. Optimize the release size to ensure that installation does not take longer than 5 minutes for 80% of the customer base.
3. Provide clear installation guidelines and support documentation to assist customers during the release process.
4. Monitor the installation success rate and gather customer feedback for continuous improvement.
5. Address any customer issues promptly and communicate updates transparently. 

This user story is aligned with the ethical principle of **Trust**, as it focuses on maintaining customer trust through reliable and efficient service updates.

text: Every registered user will have access to the product\92s support site via the Internet.  70% of registered users shall find a solution to their problem within 5 minutes of using the support site.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient and Accessible Support Experience for Users

Description: As a registered user, I want to have rapid access to effective solutions on the product's support site via the Internet so that I can resolve my issues promptly and independently.

Work: 
- Ensure the support site is accessible over the Internet without restrictions.
- Implement a user-friendly interface that allows users to navigate and find solutions easily.
- Develop and integrate a search functionality that efficiently retrieves relevant solutions.
- Provide clear and comprehensive troubleshooting guides for common issues.
- Ensure that at least 70% of users can find a satisfactory solution within 5 minutes of accessing the site.
- Gather user feedback to continuously improve the support site's effectiveness and usability. 

Related Ethical Principle: Beneficence - This requirement aligns with the principle of beneficence by aiming to provide an efficient support system that benefits users by helping them solve problems quickly and enhancing their overall product experience.

text: The customer shall be able to easily integrate new building maps with the product throughout the product\92s lifecycle.  Integration of new maps with the product shall be possible with little to no support from product support staff.
ethical_us:
Based on the requirement provided, the most relevant ethical principle is **Freedom and autonomy**. This principle is related because it ensures that users have the autonomy to freely and independently integrate new building maps without excessive reliance on product support staff, promoting user empowerment. 

Here is the ethical user story based on that principle:

### Title: Seamless Building Map Integration for User Autonomy

### Description:
As a product user, I want to easily integrate new building maps into the product with minimal to no assistance from product support staff so that I can maintain my independence and control over the system without unnecessary constraints.

### Work:
- Users can access a straightforward interface for uploading and managing new building maps.
- The integration process includes clear instructions and feedback to guide users through each step.
- The system provides error alerts and self-repair suggestions to address potential issues without needing support staff.
- A comprehensive FAQ and help resource center is available online for additional guidance.
- User testing is conducted to ensure a high success rate for map integrations by users with varying technical skills.
- Continuous integration ability is tested and maintained throughout the product’s lifecycle to accommodate updates or new map formats.

text: The product shall be translated into foreign languages other than the target market countries\92 languages in future releases.  For each emerging target market  it shall take no more than 5 days to configure the product for that market\92s language.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Multilingual Accessibility for Emerging Markets

**Description:** As a product manager, I want the product to be translated into foreign languages other than the target market countries' languages in future releases, so that we can ensure the product is accessible and fair to users from emerging markets, supporting justice and fairness.

**Work:**

1. Identify emerging target markets and their primary languages.
2. Establish a streamlined translation process to ensure availability within 5 days.
3. Ensure translations maintain cultural and contextual relevance.
4. Test translated versions for usability and accuracy.
5. Gather user feedback from newly served markets to improve language support.
6. Ensure documentation and support materials align with new translations.

text: The product is expected to integrate with multiple database management systems. The product will operate with Oracle  SQL Server  DB2  MySQL  HSQL  and MS Access.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Fairness and Inclusivity in Database Integration

Description: As a data administrator, I want our product to integrate with a diverse set of database management systems so that users have the flexibility to choose the platform that best suits their needs without facing discrimination or limitations.

Work: 
- Ensure compatibility with Oracle, SQL Server, DB2, MySQL, HSQL, and MS Access.
- Validate data integration processes to prevent bias or data loss across different database systems.
- Conduct regular testing to confirm that all integrations work reliably and consistently.
- Document integration processes clearly to support transparency and understanding for users.
- Provide training materials to educate users on the benefits and uses of different database systems.

text: The product shall be able to be installed in any operating environment within 2 days.
ethical_us:
**Title: Efficient and Quick Installation**

**Description:** As an **IT administrator**, I want to **install the product in any operating environment within 2 days** so that **the system can become operational swiftly and minimize downtime, ensuring user trust and system availability**.

**Work:**
- Verify that the installation package is compatible with all specified operating environments.
- Ensure the installation process includes clear and comprehensive documentation.
- Test the installation process in multiple environments to confirm the 2-day installation timeframe is achievable.
- Provide training resources or support for IT administrators to aid in quick installation.
- Create a feedback mechanism for administrators to report any installation issues or delays.

text: The product shall ensure that only company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs may have product access.  100% of all logons shall be by either company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure and Controlled Access for System Users

Description: As a company IT administrator, I want to ensure that only company employees or external users with company-approved user IDs can access the product so that we can maintain system security and protect sensitive information from unauthorized access.

Work:
- Verify that the system requires user authentication for all attempts to access the product.
- Implement a system for issuing company-approved user IDs to external users.
- Ensure that access control protocols are in place to restrict logons to only authorized employees or external users.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with access control requirements.
- Provide training and resources for employees to understand the importance of secure logon practices.

text: Only managers are able to perform search queries for reservations by user.  100% of all search queries for reservations by user shall be from logons of only management logons.
ethical_us:
Title: Management-Only Access for User Reservation Queries

Description: As a privacy-concerned manager, I want to perform search queries for reservations by user without exposing sensitive information to non-management personnel, so that user reservation data remains confidential and secure.

Work:
- Ensure that only management logons have access to perform search queries for reservations by user.
- Implement authentication and authorization checks to verify management credentials before granting access to search queries.
- Create logging mechanisms to record all search queries for audits and compliance checks.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure that non-management personnel cannot access or circumvent the restriction.
- Provide training for managers to understand privacy implications and the importance of maintaining user data confidentiality.

text: The product shall ensure that the database\92s data corresponds to the data entered by the user.  Each conference room reservation in the system will contain the same information as was entered by the user.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Data Accuracy and Integrity 

Description: As a user who makes conference room reservations, I want the system to accurately store and display the information I entered so that I can trust that my reservation details are correct and unaltered.

Work:
- Verify that the system confirms data entered by the user upon submission.
- Ensure a mechanism for displaying entered data back to the user for confirmation before final submission.
- Implement an audit log to track changes made to reservation data, if any.
- Develop automated tests to compare the entered data with the stored data in the database.
- Conduct periodic checks to verify that the database contents reflect the user's initial input accurately. 

The most relevant ethical principle for this requirement is **Trust**, as ensuring the database's data integrity fosters trust in the system by demonstrating that it operates securely and effectively.

text: The product shall prevent the input of malicious data.  The product and/or adjacent hardware/software systems\92 data shall remain 100% uncorrupted each time malicious data is input into the product.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Data Integrity Against Malicious Inputs

Description: As a quality assurance manager, I want the product to prevent the input of malicious data so that the product and adjacent systems' data remain 100% uncorrupted and secure.

Work:
- Implement input validation mechanisms that detect and block malicious data.
- Develop and integrate real-time monitoring tools to identify suspicious activities and data patterns.
- Conduct regular security audits and penetration testing to ensure robust defenses against data corruption.
- Establish a reporting system for tracking attempted malicious data inputs and responses.
- Create and maintain a comprehensive incident response plan to address potential data integrity breaches promptly.

text: The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall remain operational as a result of the input of malicious data.  The product and/or dependent databases/filesystems shall not crash 100% of the time that malicious data is input into the product.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring System Integrity Against Malicious Data

Description: As a systems administrator, I want the product and dependent databases to remain operational even when malicious data is inputted so that the system maintains reliability and trustworthiness and continues to operate effectively.

Work:
- Implement data validation mechanisms to detect and filter out malicious data inputs.
- Establish a monitoring system to identify and alert system administrators of any instances of malicious data input.
- Conduct security testing to ensure the system can handle various types of malicious data without crashing.
- Develop and maintain a recovery protocol to quickly restore services in the event of a failure caused by malicious data.
- Ensure all logs and alerts are reviewed regularly to improve system resilience and update security measures.
  
The ethical principle most related to this requirement is Trust, as ensuring the system remains operational despite malicious inputs sustains trust in the technology's reliability and security.

text: The language of the product shall accommodate all of the target market countries. 90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the language of the product is acceptable.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Language Compatibility for Global Markets

Description: As a product user from a diverse target market country, I want the product's language to be accommodating and understandable so that I can effectively use it without facing language barriers.

Work:
- Conduct surveys in each target market country to gauge language acceptability among users.
- Ensure that 90% of survey respondents in each target market country find the language acceptable.
- Collaborate with local language experts to adapt language nuances and cultural contexts accurately.
- Test language versions of the product with diverse user groups within each target market.
- Implement ongoing feedback mechanisms for continuous language improvement and adaptation.

Ethical Principle: Justice and Fairness

This user story is most related to the principle of Justice and Fairness, ensuring that the product accommodates linguistic diversity and does not create an unfair disadvantage for users from different language backgrounds.

text: The product shall be able to display calendar dates and times according to the user\92s locale.  90% of survey respondents from each target market country will find that the date and time formatting of the product is correct.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Ensure Localized Date and Time Formatting for User Clarity

**Description:** As a global user, I want the product to display calendar dates and times according to my locale so that I can easily understand and accurately interpret the information without confusion.

**Work:**
- Ensure the system automatically detects the user's locale based on their settings or preferences.
- Implement date and time formatting rules for each target market country.
- Conduct user testing with 90% of survey respondents from each target market country to confirm the date and time formatting is perceived as correct.
- Provide an option for users to manually select their preferred date and time format if the default does not meet their expectations.
- Maintain documentation of all supported locale formats for reference and updates.

**Related Ethical Principle:** Justice and Fairness

This principle is most related to the requirement, as it emphasizes ensuring fairness in representation and accessibility for users from different locales. By correctly displaying date and time formats according to each user's locale, the product demonstrates fairness in accommodating diverse cultural and regional standards.

text: The product must be developed with the J2SE/J2EE programming language libraries
ethical_us:
Title: Promoting Clarity and Reliability through Standardized Language

Description: As a software developer, I want to utilize the J2SE/J2EE programming language libraries so that I can ensure the development process is transparent, understandable, and reliable for all stakeholders involved.

Work:
- Verify that all components of the product are compatible with the J2SE/J2EE libraries.
- Provide documentation that details the use and functionalities of J2SE/J2EE libraries in the development process.
- Conduct training sessions for development team members to ensure proficiency with J2SE/J2EE libraries.
- Perform regular code reviews to ensure consistent adherence to established J2SE/J2EE standards.
- Create a feedback loop with developers and stakeholders to address any issues or lack of understanding related to these libraries.

text: The product shall record meeting entries.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Meeting Records

Description: As a team member, I want to have my meeting entries recorded clearly and accurately so that our team meetings are transparent and details are accessible for all involved members.

Work:
- Ensure that all meeting entries include the date, time, and participants' information in a clear and structured format.
- Provide a secure method for team members to access past recorded meetings.
- Include a feature for participants to verify and confirm the accuracy of the meeting records quickly.
- Implement notifications to inform participants whenever their meeting records are updated or accessed.
- Ensure that all entries are timestamped and stored in a secure manner to prevent unauthorized modifications. 

This story ensures transparency within the team's communication, promoting an open and clear understanding of all meetings held.

text: The product will notify employees of meeting invitations.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Meeting Notification System

Description: As an employee, I want to be transparently notified of meeting invitations so that I can plan my schedule effectively and attend meetings that align with my responsibilities.

Work:
- Ensure that meeting invitations include clear details such as date, time, agenda, and participants.
- Provide notifications in a timely manner, giving employees enough lead time to prepare or communicate any conflicts.
- Make it easy for employees to access and manage their meeting notifications through a user-friendly interface.
- Offer an option for employees to decline or reschedule meeting invitations and provide a way to communicate reasons if necessary.
- Ensure that reminders are sent prior to the meetings to help employees keep track of their commitments.

text: The product shall have the ability to send meeting reminders to employees.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensuring Transparent Meeting Notifications**

**Description:** As an employee, I want to receive clear and timely meeting reminders, so that I am well-prepared and informed about upcoming meetings.

**Work:** 
- The system must provide meeting reminder notifications no later than 24 hours before a scheduled meeting.
- Notifications should include essential details such as meeting time, location, agenda, and participants.
- Users should have the option to customize the notification settings according to their preferences.
- A log of sent reminders must be maintained for auditing purposes.
- Ensure that reminders are sent through multiple channels (e.g., email, messaging apps) to accommodate diverse preferences.

text: The product shall assign the organizers contact information to each meeting they create.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Meeting Management

Description: As an organizer, I want to have my contact information automatically assigned to each meeting I create so that all participants can clearly understand who is responsible for the meeting and can easily reach out for questions or clarifications.

Work:
1. Ensure the organizer's contact information is securely stored and linked to their user profile.
2. Automatically populate the organizer's contact information in the meeting details upon creation.
3. Provide a clear and accessible section in the meeting invitation where participants can view the organizer's contact info.
4. Implement a mechanism for organizers to update their contact information promptly, which will automatically update for all future meetings.
5. Display a confirmation message to the organizer after their contact information is assigned to a new meeting.

text: The product will record meeting acknowledgements.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Transparency in Meeting Acknowledgements 

Description: As a project stakeholder, I want to ensure that meeting acknowledgements are recorded transparently so that all participants are informed and are aware of the decisions made, fostering accountability.

Work:
- Implement a system that automatically logs all meeting acknowledgements with a timestamp.
- Ensure that meeting acknowledgements are accessible to all registered meeting participants.
- Design a user-friendly interface for participants to review recorded acknowledgements.
- Provide a notification system to alert participants when new acknowledgements are recorded.
- Include an explanation for each recorded acknowledgement to enhance clarity and understanding.

text: The product shall store new conference rooms.
ethical_us:
**Title: Secure Storage of Conference Room Data**

**Description:** As a facilities manager, I want to store new conference rooms securely so that the data about room availability and features is protected and managed efficiently.

**Work:**
- Ensure that the data storage system implements strong encryption protocols to protect conference room data.
- Verify that data access is controlled and only authorized personnel can modify or view the data.
- Implement audit logs to track who accesses or modifies the conference room data.
- Provide a user-friendly interface for entering new conference room details that also informs users on data protection measures.
- Regularly update and maintain security measures to protect against unauthorized access and data breaches.

**Ethical Principle: Privacy**

This user story ensures that the data associated with storing and managing new conference rooms is handled with privacy in mind, securing the information against unauthorized access and potential misuse.

text: The product shall update existing conference rooms.
ethical_us:
Title: Fair and Equitable Conference Room Updates

Description: As a Facilities Manager, I want to ensure that updates to existing conference rooms are done with fairness and equitable access in mind so that all employees have equal opportunity and access to these facilities regardless of their role, department, or any other factor that could lead to discrimination.

Work:
1. Review current conference room conditions to identify any existing disparities in facilities and resources.
2. Implement updates uniformly across all conference rooms to ensure equal access to technology and comfort.
3. Consult stakeholders for any specific accommodations needed to ensure inclusivity.
4. Test the updated rooms for functionality and usability to ensure they meet the new equitable standards.
5. Gather feedback from employees to ensure the updates meet diverse needs and improve overall access and fairness.

text: The product will be able to delete conference rooms.
ethical_us:
The ethical principle most related to the requirement about deleting conference rooms appears to be "Trust," as it involves ensuring that systems work properly and users can rely on them to manage data responsibly, including the proper handling and deletion of data related to conference room reservations.

Title: Reliable Management of Conference Rooms

Description: As an Office Administrator, I want to be able to delete conference rooms from the system so that I can ensure the room schedule and availability are always up-to-date and trustworthy.

Work:

- Verify that only authorized users have the ability to delete conference rooms.
- Ensure that deleting a conference room removes all related scheduling information without affecting unrelated data.
- Implement a confirmation prompt before finalizing the deletion action to prevent accidental deletions.
- Maintain a backup or log of deleted conference rooms for records and recovery if necessary.
- Update the system's interface promptly to reflect the deletion, ensuring that all users are viewing the most current information.
- Provide clear documentation and guidance for office administrators on how to safely delete and manage conference rooms.

text: The product shall be able to store new room equipment.
ethical_us:

Description: As a facilities manager, I want to store new room equipment in the system so that inventory management is accurate, transparent, and data is handled ethically and securely.

Work:

- Provide a clear audit trail for equipment storage entries to ensure transparency and accountability.
- Ensure the interface allows for easy data entry while providing clear information on how the data will be used and stored.
- Implement access controls to restrict who can add, edit, or view equipment storage details.
- Regularly update stakeholders on how data integrity and security are maintained within the system.

text: The product will update existing room equipment.
ethical_us:
Title: Responsible Update of Room Equipment

Description: As a facilities manager, I want to update existing room equipment responsibly so that the new equipment operates safely and efficiently without causing harm or disruption.

Work:

- Ensure that installation and replacement processes adhere to industry regulations and guidelines.

text: The product shall be able to delete room equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Room Equipment Data Deletion for Privacy Protection

**Description:** As a facility manager, I want to ensure that room equipment data can be deleted so that the privacy of our users is protected and no unnecessary data is stored.

**Work:**
- Verify that the system provides an interface for authorized personnel to delete room equipment data.

text: The product shall allow an organizer to invite other employees to meetings.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Freedom and Autonomy

Title: Empower Organizers to Facilitate Collaborative Meetings

Description: As an organizer, I want to invite other employees to meetings so that I can promote collaboration and ensure everyone involved has the opportunity to contribute to discussions autonomously.

Work: 
- The system shall provide an interface for organizers to input employee email addresses to send invitations.
- The system shall respect the autonomy of employees by offering them an option to accept or decline the meeting invitation.
- The system shall ensure that the invitation process is straightforward and does not pressure employees into attending.
- The system shall allow organizers to see who has accepted or declined the invitation for efficient meeting planning.
- The system shall ensure that meeting invitations include all necessary details such as time, location, and agenda, so invitees can make informed decisions about attendance.
- The system shall respect the privacy of employees by not sharing the email addresses of invitees with other participants.

text: Each time a conference room is reserved  the conference room schedule shall be updated to reflect the time and date of the reservation.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Conference Room Scheduling

Description: As a conference room manager, I want the conference room schedule to be updated immediately every time a reservation is made so that all users can have a transparent view of the room's availability.

Work:
- Ensure that the conference room reservation system automatically updates the schedule in real-time upon reservation.
- Display the updated schedule visibly and clearly to all users.
- Provide confirmation notifications to both the individual making the reservation and the conference room manager.
- Log all changes to the schedule to maintain a record of reservations for future reference and accountability.

text: The product shall record the transportation status of equipment reserved.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Equipment Transportation Status Transparency

Description: As a logistics manager, I want to record and access the transportation status of equipment reserved so that I can ensure the transparency and efficiency of our logistics processes and foster trust among our clients and team members.

Work:

- The system shall provide a clear interface for entering and updating the transportation status of reserved equipment.
- The transportation status updates shall include timestamps and user identification for accountability.
- A comprehensive log of all status updates shall be accessible to authorized personnel for auditing purposes.
- Notifications shall be sent to relevant stakeholders whenever a change in transportation status is recorded.
- The system shall include a help guide detailing how to accurately update and access transportation status to ensure understanding and correct usage.

text: The product shall display a map of the company building showing conference room locations.
ethical_us:
Title: Location Transparency within the Company Building

Description: As an employee, I want to view a detailed map of the company building with conference room locations so that I can easily find and access meeting spaces without confusion or delay.

Work:
- The map should display accurate and up-to-date room locations and names.
- Ensure that the map is accessible on the company's internal network or app.
- Include clear legends and navigation aids to enhance understandability.
- Provide an option to search for conference rooms by name or capacity.
- Ensure the map is compliant with privacy policies concerning sharing building layouts.

text: The product shall record updated meeting agendas.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensuring Trust through Accurate Meeting Agendas**

**Description:** As a team member, I want the product to record updated meeting agendas so that I can rely on accurate and up-to-date information to prepare for our meetings.

**Work:**

- The system must automatically update the meeting agenda whenever any changes are made by authorized personnel.
- Users should receive notifications whenever there is an update made to the agenda.
- The system must maintain a change log to track any modifications to the meeting agenda.
- Access to modify agendas should be restricted to authorized users only.
- The system should display the latest version of the agenda to all participants.
- Ensure that past agendas are archived and accessible for future reference.

text: The product shall send a meeting confirmation to the meeting organizer.
ethical_us:
**Title: Reliable Meeting Confirmation Notifications**

**Description:** As an organizer, I want to receive a meeting confirmation notification after scheduling a meeting so that I can ensure the meeting details are correctly communicated and recorded.

**Work:** 
- Ensure the meeting confirmation is automatically sent to the organizer immediately after the meeting is scheduled.
- Include all relevant meeting details (date, time, participants, and agenda) in the confirmation.
- Provide options for the meeting organizer to modify any details directly from the confirmation notification.
- Implement a system log to track confirmation deliveries and address any delivery failures.
- Ensure the confirmation process is consistent and resilient to errors, bolstering the trust in the system.
- Validate that the confirmation notification is accessible and clear to the organizer, enhancing understandability.

text: The product shall display room equipment according to search parameters.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Display of Room Equipment Based on Search Parameters

Description: As a hotel guest, I want to view room equipment accurately based on my search parameters so that I can make informed decisions and ensure that my needs and preferences are met.

Work:
- The system should allow users to input specific search parameters such as room size, equipment type, and availability dates.
- The system must accurately filter and display room equipment that matches the search parameters, ensuring no omitted or wrongly categorized items.
- Clear and understandable explanations should be provided for any lack of matching results or discrepancies.
- A mechanism should be in place for users to provide feedback on the accuracy and clarity of the displayed information.
- Users should have access to supplementary information, such as equipment descriptions and compatibility details, to help further inform their decision.
- Regular audits should be conducted to verify and maintain the accuracy and transparency of the room equipment listings.

text: The product shall display conference rooms according to search parameters.
ethical_us:
Title: Fair and Accurate Conference Room Display

Description: As an event organizer, I want to search for conference rooms and receive results that accurately match my search parameters so that I can make informed decisions without bias or unfairness in room selection.

Work: 
- Ensure the search algorithm equitably considers all conference rooms based on input parameters.
- Implement checks to prevent any form of bias or discrimination in displaying search results.
- Verify the transparency of the search process by providing users with a clear explanation of how results are generated.
- Test the system to ensure it consistently returns fair and unbiased results across a variety of searches.

text: The product shall record different meeting types.
ethical_us:

1. Implement functionality to record distinct types of meetings (e.g., client meetings, internal discussions, training sessions).

4. Maintain a change log for meeting type adjustments to ensure transparency.

6. Test the recording system for reliability and accuracy in recording and displaying meeting types.

text: The product shall record all the equipment that has been reserved.

text: The product shall notify building personnel of equipment transport requests.
ethical_us:
### Ethical Principle: Responsibility

Title: **Building Personnel Notification System for Equipment Transport Requests**

Work: 
- A notification system is implemented to alert building personnel of new equipment transport requests.
- Notifications include details such as the time, location, and type of equipment.
- The system allows personnel to acknowledge receipt of the notification and confirm transport arrangements.
- A record is maintained of all notifications sent, including acknowledgments and any issues reported during the transport process.
- The system is tested to ensure consistent and reliable performance in delivering notifications to the appropriate personnel.

text: The product will allow priviledged users to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views.
ethical_us:

**Description:** As a privileged user, I want to view meeting schedules in multiple reporting views so that I can understand and manage the meetings more effectively and transparently.

**Work:**
- Ensure all meeting schedules are available in various reporting formats.
- Provide clear and understandable explanations for each reporting view.
- Implement access controls to verify that only privileged users can use these views.

text: The product shall be able to send meeting notifications via different kinds of end-user specified methods.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Freedom and Autonomy

Title: Flexible Meeting Notification Preferences

Description: As a productivity-conscious end-user, I want to have the ability to choose how I receive my meeting notifications so that I can manage my schedule and communication in a way that aligns with my personal preferences and needs.

Work:
- Implement functionality to allow users to select from various notification methods (e.g., email, SMS, app notification).
- Ensure users can update their notification preferences at any time via the user interface.
- Provide clear instructions and options in the settings menu for configuring notification preferences.
- Conduct usability testing to confirm ease of use and clarity in configuring notification settings.
- Ensure the system respects and prioritizes the user's selected notification methods without defaults overriding their choices.
- Document the feature in the user guide detailing how to set and manage notification preferences.

text: The product shall have a customizable Look and Feel.

Title: Empowering Users with Customizable Interface

Related Ethical Principle: Freedom and autonomy

text: The product shall have an intuitive user interface.
ethical_us:
Title: Intuitive User Interface for Enhanced User Autonomy

Description: As an end user, I want the product to have an intuitive user interface so that I can easily navigate and operate the system independently without requiring frequent assistance.

Work:
- The interface design must be tested for ease of use with a diverse group of users to ensure accessibility for individuals of varying abilities.
- Usability testing sessions should be conducted and refinements made based on user feedback.
- The interface should include clear labeling and instructions for all functions.
- Ensure that all critical features are easily accessible with minimal steps.
- Provide contextual help or tooltips for complex features within the interface.

text: The product will display an available status for unreserved conference rooms.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Display of Conference Room Availability

Description: As an employee, I want to see the available status for unreserved conference rooms so that I can plan meetings efficiently and ensure optimal use of office resources.

Work: 
- Ensure the system interface clearly indicates room availability status.
- Verify that the display updates in real-time to reflect any changes in room reservations.
- Include a user guide or tooltips to explain how the availability status is determined and displayed.
- Test the functionality with a sample group to confirm clarity and ease of use.
- Ensure that the available status does not inadvertently reveal any private reservation details.

text: Recreation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment for the period of previous 30 days shall take no more than 30min.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient Inventory Adjustment Recreation

Description: As a warehouse manager, I want the recreation of inventory quantity adjustments for the past 30 days to be completed in no more than 30 minutes, so that I can ensure timely and transparent reporting and decision-making.

Work:
- Ensure the inventory system can process and recreate quantity adjustments for up to 30 days in an efficient manner.
- Optimize the algorithm to handle large data sets and minimize processing time.
- Provide a progress bar or status update during the recreation process to increase user transparency.
- Implement error-handling mechanisms to alert the user if the process cannot be completed within the time frame.
- Conduct user testing to validate that the process consistently meets the 30-minute requirement under various scenarios.

Related Principle: Transparency

text: The System shall allow for a minimum of  6 users to work at the same time.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Multi-user Access for Fair Collaboration

Description: As a team member, I want the system to support a minimum of 6 users working simultaneously so that all team members can collaborate fairly and complete our tasks efficiently without some members being excluded.

Work:
- Verify that the system can support at least 6 concurrent user sessions without performance degradation.
- Ensure the user interface remains responsive and functional during simultaneous access by multiple users.
- Conduct a load test to confirm that system resources are not exhausted when 6 users are connected concurrently.
- Implement and check necessary measures to prevent any potential system contention or denial of service when multiple users access the system.
- Confirm that the multi-user feature does not compromise data integrity and security.

text: The System shall utilize currently owned computer equipment.
ethical_us:
Title: Optimize Resource Use for Sustainability

Description: As an IT Manager, I want to ensure that the AI system utilizes currently owned computer equipment effectively so that we promote sustainability by reducing unnecessary resource consumption and minimize electronic waste.

Work:
- Verify the compatibility of the AI system with existing computer equipment.
- Assess the performance of currently owned equipment for AI processing needs.
- Implement necessary software updates or configurations to maximize equipment efficiency.
- Conduct tests to ensure that the system operates within optimal parameters using the existing hardware.
- Document the resource usage and efficiency improvements achieved by utilizing current equipment.

text: The System shall maintain consistent security.  Any changes in user passwords and/or permissions should take affect in all parts of the System.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Consistent Security Through Unified User Access Controls

Description: As a security-conscious user, I want the system to maintain consistent security by ensuring any changes in user passwords and/or permissions are reflected across all parts of the system so that my data and activities remain protected and secure.

Work:
- Verify that when a user changes their password, access is immediately updated across all system modules.
- Ensure that when user permissions are modified, these changes are consistently applied throughout all system components.
- Test the system to confirm access denial if credentials are incorrect or outdated in any part of the system.
- Implement a notification system to alert users and administrators of any successful or failed access attempts after a change in password or permissions.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure all sections of the system reflect the most current user permission settings.

text: The System shall granularly control access rights to all major subsystems.  It should be possible to assign access rights to all subsystems independently.
ethical_us:
Title: Granular Access Control for System Subsystems

Description: As an IT Administrator, I want to granularly control access rights for all major subsystems of the system, so that user access is managed responsibly and unauthorized access risks are minimized.

Work:
- Verify that the system allows setting access rights for each subsystem independently.
- Ensure that IT administrators can assign, modify, and revoke access rights at a granular level.
- Ensure that there are clear logs and audit trails for all access changes.
- Confirm that users receive notifications about any changes to their access rights.
- Test the system to confirm that unauthorized users cannot access subsystems they do not have rights to.
- Validate that the access control system complies with relevant data privacy regulations. 

The ethical principle most related to this requirement is Privacy, as it involves ensuring that user data and system components are protected from unauthorized access.

text: The System shall not require additional third party licenses resulting in royalty fees.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Cost-Free Accessibility

Description: As a software developer, I want to use the AI system without the need for additional third-party licenses so that I can avoid incurring unexpected royalty fees and ensure project sustainability.

Work: 
- Verify that the AI system and all its components are free from third-party dependencies requiring additional licenses.
- Conduct a thorough review of all libraries and tools integrated into the AI system to ensure they are open-source or have a no-fee license.
- Ensure that updates to the system do not introduce new dependencies with licensing constraints.
- Provide clear documentation specifying the licensing requirements of each component of the system.
- Test to ensure the system operates fully without additional cost-based licenses after integration into new environments.

text: The System shall allow generation of Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Ethical Management of Inventory Adjustments

**Description:** As a supply chain manager, I want to generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents on demand so that inventory records are accurately maintained and transparent, ensuring accountability and preventing loss or misuse.

**Work:**
- Ensure that the system provides proper authentication and authorization mechanisms to verify the identity of users requesting document generation.
- Validate that the generated documents are time-stamped and include comprehensive details of the adjustment for accurate tracking and audit purposes.
- Ensure that the Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents align with regulatory compliance and organizational policies.
- Implement a notification system to alert relevant stakeholders about significant inventory adjustments to maintain transparency within the organization.
- Develop training materials to educate users about the responsible creation and handling of adjustment documents to maintain ethical standards.

text: The System shall allow on demand generation of all Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents since certain point of time.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Access to Inventory Adjustment Documents

Description: As a warehouse manager, I want to generate and review all Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents from a specific point in time on demand so that I can ensure transparency and accuracy in stock management and auditing processes.

Work:

1. The system must have a user-friendly interface allowing the selection of a start date for generating Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents.
2. The system must provide clear and complete information in the generated documents, including the reason for each adjustment, the before and after quantities, and the date of adjustment.
3. The system must allow exporting the generated documents in various formats such as PDF and Excel for documentation and reporting purposes.
4. The system must ensure that only authorized personnel have access to this functionality to maintain data integrity and security.
5. The system should log the generation activity, capturing who generated the documents and when, for audit trail purposes.

text: The IQA subsystem shall take into account current inventory status and adjust inventory of substitutionary ingredients accordingly.
ethical_us:
Title: Ethical Inventory Adjustment for Substitutionary Ingredients

Description: As a supply chain manager, I want the IQA subsystem to automatically adjust inventory levels of substitutionary ingredients based on current inventory status so that the supply chain remains balanced, reduces waste, and prevents shortages or overstock, supporting sustainable operations.

Work:
- Acceptance Criteria:
  1. The system accurately monitors the current inventory status of all primary and substitutionary ingredients.
  2. The system identifies substitutionary ingredients that can be used without causing depletion or waste.
  3. Inventory adjustments are made in real-time to reflect immediate stocking needs.
  4. The system logs all inventory adjustments with reasons for substitution for transparency and auditing purposes.
  5. Alerts or notifications are sent to stakeholders when substitutionary ingredient levels fall below a sustainable threshold.

text: The System shall allow entering  storing and modifying product formulas.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Safe and Responsible Management of Product Formulas

Description: As a product manager, I want to enter, store, and modify product formulas so that the formulas are accurately maintained and used responsibly without causing harm to users or misusing sensitive information.

Work: 
- The system must provide clear guidance on how to enter product formulas accurately.
- The system must have robust security measures to protect stored formulas from unauthorized access.
- The system must log all changes made to the product formulas with timestamps and responsible individuals.
- The system must verify the accuracy of data before saving any changes to ensure no harm is introduced through incorrect formulations.
- The system must provide an option to review formula changes for compliance with safety standards before implementation. 

Ethical Principle: Responsibility

text: Product formulas shall allow use of semi-products  which have own formulas.

Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Enable Transparent Use of Semi-Product Formulas in Product Formulas

2. Ensure that any modifications in a semi-product formula are automatically updated and visible in all associated product formulas.
3. Provide clear documentation of changes made to any product or semi-product formulas for audit and review purposes.
4. Allow users to easily trace the origin and components of each semi-product used within a product formula.
5. Test the system for accurate reflection and integration of semi-product formulas into product formulas.

text: Product formula ingredients shall allow defining substitutionary ingredients.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensure Substitution Flexibility in Product Formulas 

**Description**: As a product manager, I want the ability to define substitutionary ingredients in product formulas so that I can ensure our products are sustainable and ethical while adapting to supply chain changes.

**Work**:

  2. Ensure the system provides clear guidance on acceptable substitutions based on regulatory and quality standards.
  3. Create a user-friendly interface that allows easy modifications to the ingredient list without requiring technical support.
  4. System should notify relevant stakeholders when a substitution is made and provide a rationale for the decision.
  5. Test the feature to ensure it maintains product compliance with sustainability certifications and ethical standards.

text: Product formula substitutionary ingredients shall be entered automatically by the PFE subsystem.

- Verify that the data input for substitutionary ingredients is comprehensive and up-to-date.

- Test the system for consistency in substitution suggestions across similar product categories.

text: Formula substitutionary ingredients shall be kept in persisted order

text: Product shall allow entering  storing and modifying product menus used by POS terminals.

text: PME Subsystem shall allow for a product to exist in more than one submenu
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Clear Product Navigation Across Submenus

Description: As a product manager, I want the PME Subsystem to allow a product to exist in more than one submenu so that users can navigate and find products easily regardless of where they start their search.

Work:

- Implement and review user feedback to assess the ease of navigation and the efficiency of accessing products from different submenus. 
- Document the process and provide user training materials to enhance understanding and guide users in effectively using the submenu navigation feature.

Ethical Principle: Transparency - This requirement emphasizes clear communication and understandability by allowing products to be found in more than one submenu, ensuring users can navigate and find information with transparency and ease.

text: The RMS System shall have Windows XP look and feel and use GUI futures making its use intuitive.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Intuitive and Transparent User Interface Experience

Description: As a casual user, I want the RMS System to have a Windows XP look and feel with intuitive GUI features so that I can easily understand and navigate the system without confusion or the need for extensive training.

Work:
- Ensure the user interface resembles the Windows XP style to provide a familiar environment for users.
- Implement intuitive GUI elements, including clearly labeled buttons, icons, and menus, to enhance user understanding.
- Conduct usability testing with diverse user groups to confirm that the interface is easily understandable and navigable.
- Provide in-system help or tooltips to support users in understanding the purpose and functionality of different features.
- Document and communicate any advanced features or processes clearly to users to enhance explainability.

text: The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document based on product daily sales data and product formulas.
ethical_us:

**Description:** As an inventory manager, I want the system to transparently generate inventory quantity adjustment documents based on daily sales data and product formulas so that I can understand and trust the inventory update process.

**Work:**
- Ensure the system provides a clear explanation of how the product daily sales data and formulas contribute to the adjustment calculation.
- Implement a feature that displays a step-by-step breakdown of the adjustment calculation.
- Develop a user-friendly interface that allows easy access to and understanding of the generated documents.
- Test the transparency and clarity of the document generation process with user feedback.
- Validate that the generated documents meet organizational transparency standards and regulations.

text: The System shall generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically when daily Product Sales data is available.
ethical_us:
Title: Automatic Inventory Adjustment for Accurate Stock Management

Description: As an inventory manager, I want the system to generate Inventory Quantity Adjustment documents automatically when daily Product Sales data is available so that I can ensure accurate and efficient stock management without manual errors and delays.

Work: 
- Ensure that the system is capable of accessing daily Product Sales data once it is available.
- Implement a feature that triggers the generation of the Inventory Quantity Adjustment document automatically upon daily data availability.
- Verify that the generated documents accurately reflect the sales data and make corresponding adjustments to inventory quantities.
- Conduct testing to confirm the automated process reduces manual intervention and potential errors.
- Document the process flow for system transparency and for users to understand how automatic adjustments are implemented.

text: Administrator shall be able to activate a pre-paid card via the Administration section in under 5 seconds.

text: Customer shall be able to check the status of their prepaid card  by entering in the PIN number  in under 5 seconds.

text: System shall let customers register on the website as a \93pay as you go\94 user in under 5 minutes.

Ethical Principle: Trust

Title: Quick and Trustworthy Registration for "Pay As You Go" Users

Description: As a potential customer, I want to register on the website as a "pay as you go" user in under 5 minutes so that I can start using the service quickly and trust that my data is being handled responsibly.

- Ensure the registration process is streamlined to be completed in 5 minutes or less.

- Implement and display a secure data protection system, reassuring users that their information is stored safely.
- Provide an option for users to consent to the use of their data for registration purposes.
- Include clear instructions and support options if the registration process encounters issues.

text: System shall let customers register on the website as a \93unlimited movie subscriber\94 user in under 10 minutes.
ethical_us:
**Title: Efficient and Inclusive Registration for Unlimited Movie Subscribers**

**Description:** As a potential movie subscriber, I want to register on the website as an "unlimited movie subscriber" user in under 10 minutes so that I can start enjoying unlimited movie streaming with minimal delay and maximum ease.

**Work:**

- Ensure the registration process is intuitive and user-friendly for all potential users, including those with varying levels of technical skill.
- Design the user interface to be visually clear, providing step-by-step guidance through the registration process.
- Guarantee that registration forms are concise, only asking for necessary information to avoid discouraging applicants through long forms.
- Implement an easy-to-navigate help or FAQ section that explicitly aids users in completing any challenging parts of the registration process.
- Conduct user testing with a diverse group to ensure the process is accessible and fair to all potential users.
- Ensure system capabilities are sufficient to handle simultaneous registrations without causing delays.
- Provide clear confirmation and onboarding instructions once registration is complete, reinforcing trust in the usability and reliability of the service.

text: System shall let existing customers log into the website with their email address and password in under 5 seconds.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient and Trustworthy Login Experience

Description: As an existing customer, I want to log into the website using my email address and password in under 5 seconds so that I can trust the system to provide a seamless and secure access experience and focus on using the services without unnecessary delays.

Work:
1. Ensure the login process authenticates customer credentials securely and efficiently.
2. Optimize the server response time to facilitate quick authentication under 5 seconds.
3. Implement appropriate cryptography techniques to protect customer credentials during the login process.
4. Conduct regular security and performance tests to maintain quick and reliable access over time.
5. Provide user feedback if logins exceed the expected time to enhance user transparency and trust in the process.
6. Create a user-friendly error message system to guide users in case of login failures without compromising security.

text: System shall let customers cancel their account  process shall take no longer than 2 minutes.  Database will mark the account as inactive  and user will not be able to log into the website.
ethical_us:
Title: Enabling Efficient Account Cancellation

Description: As a customer, I want to cancel my account in a straightforward and timely manner so that I can exercise my autonomy and control over my personal data and online accounts.

Work:
1. Provide a clear, accessible option for account cancellation on the user's profile or settings page.
2. Simplify the cancellation process to ensure it can be completed within 2 minutes.
3. Display a confirmation message to the user once their account has been successfully marked as inactive.
4. Ensure that once an account is marked inactive, the user cannot log into the website.
5. Implement clear communication about data handling and the effects of marking an account as inactive, ensuring customer understanding and consent.

text: System shall let administrator de-activate a customer account in under 1 minute. Customer will no longer be able to access the website.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Responsibility

Title: Responsible De-activation of Customer Accounts

Description: As an administrator, I want to swiftly deactivate a customer account in under 1 minute so that I can responsibly manage user access while maintaining service integrity and respecting user agreements.

Work:
- Verify the process for identifying and authenticating the admin who can perform account deactivation.
- Ensure that there is a clear protocol and guidelines for situations or reasons that warrant account deactivation.
- Confirm that de-activation logs are maintained to provide transparency and accountability for the action taken.
- Notify the customer via email about the deactivation with a rationale and any steps for appeal or reactivation.
- Ensure de-activated accounts are archived securely, respecting data privacy standards.
- Test de-activation process to confirm it consistently completes within the specified 1-minute window.

text: System shall let administrator add/remove movies on the website in under 5 minutes.  Entered movie information will be stored in the database and will now be available on the website.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient and Responsible Content Management for Administrators

Description: As an administrator, I want to add or remove movies on the website quickly and efficiently so that I can maintain a relevant and up-to-date content library without wasting time, while ensuring accuracy and responsibility in the content management process.

Work:
- Ensure that the system allows administrators to add or remove movies within 5 minutes to maximize efficiency.
- Verify that all entered movie information is accurately stored in the database without errors.
- Confirm that newly added movies are visible on the website immediately after being added.
- Provide administrators with a confirmation message upon successful addition or removal of a movie.
- Implement logging mechanisms to track changes made by administrators for accountability and integrity.

text: System shall let the administrator add/remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient Category Management for Website Administrators

Description: As a website administrator, I want to quickly add or remove categories on the website in under 5 minutes so that I can ensure the website remains updated and relevant while maintaining user trust.

Work:
- The system provides a user-friendly interface for managing categories.
- The administrator is able to add a new category within 5 minutes.
- The administrator is able to remove an existing category within 5 minutes.
- The system confirms successful addition or removal of a category.
- The system keeps a log of category changes for accountability and transparency purposes. 

Ethical Principle: Trust

Rationale: This ethical user story emphasizes the importance of maintaining user trust by ensuring that system operations, like modifying website categories, are carried out efficiently, transparently, and reliably. This principle aligns with the trust organizations must build by ensuring technologies function properly and users are informed of changes.

text: System shall let Izogn Manager access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient Access to Sales and Usage Insights

Description: As a Sales Manager, I want to access sales and usage statistics in under 2 minutes so that I can make timely and informed decisions that enhance business performance and customer satisfaction.

Work:
- The system must provide fast and direct access to the dashboard displaying sales and usage statistics within the specified time frame.
- Ensure the user interface is intuitive and clearly labeled, allowing managers to rapidly locate and analyze data without confusion.
- Implement efficient data retrieval and processing mechanisms to minimize loading times.
- Verify that the access meets the security standards, keeping the data privacy intact while ensuring swift accessibility.
- Test the feature under various network conditions to guarantee a consistent performance.
- Gather feedback from a group of sales managers to ensure the feature meets their expectations and make necessary adjustments based on their input.

text: System shall let administrators generate unique pre-paid pins in under 2 minutes and generate an Excel file with the generated PINs.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Trust

Title: Efficient and Trustworthy Pre-Paid PIN Generation for Administrators

Description: As an administrator, I want to generate unique pre-paid PINs in under 2 minutes and export them to an Excel file so that I can efficiently and securely manage PIN distribution, ensuring reliability and trust in the system's performance.

Work:
- The system shall have a user-friendly interface for PIN generation accessible to administrators.
- Ensure the generation process takes no more than 2 minutes from initiation to completion.
- The system will log each PIN generation action with a timestamp for accountability.
- Provide functionality to export generated PINs to an Excel file.
- Verify that PINs are unique and free from duplication within each batch.
- Implement security measures to protect the integrity and confidentiality of the PINs during generation and export.

text: The website shall be attractive to all audiences.  The website shall appear to be fun and the colors should be bright and vibrant.
ethical_us:
Title: Creating an Inclusive and Engaging Website Design

Description: As a website visitor, I want the website to be attractive to all audiences with vibrant and fun colors, so that it fosters a sense of inclusivity and enjoyment for users of diverse backgrounds.

Work:
- Conduct user research to understand color preferences and cultural connotations across different audiences.
- Design the website using a color palette that is vibrant yet universally appealing.
- Ensure that the website's design is accessible to people with vision impairments, including color blindness.
- Test the design with diverse user groups to gather feedback on the attractiveness and engagement level of the site.
- Iterate on the design based on user feedback to enhance inclusivity and appeal.

text: The website should have an African feel  but should not alienate non-Africans.  The website should use animation on pages which are describing the services  to grab the users attention and encourage them to sign up.
ethical_us:
The most relevant ethical principle for this requirement is Justice and fairness, as it pertains to ensuring inclusivity and avoiding alienation of users from different cultural backgrounds.

Title: Inclusive and Engaging Website Design

Description: As a culturally diverse user, I want the website to reflect an African feel without alienating non-Africans, so that I can feel represented while knowing it's welcoming to everyone, and use animations effectively to grab my attention and motivate sign-ups.

Work:
1. Design the website with elements that capture an authentic African aesthetic, ensuring they are universally inviting and respectful.
2. Implement animations on service description pages that are engaging, informative, and accessible to people of all cultural backgrounds.
3. Test the website with diverse user groups to gather feedback on cultural inclusivity and how well the animations capture attention without detracting from the user experience.
4. Adjust design and animations based on feedback to ensure non-discriminatory interaction and user engagement.
5. Ensure all animations are subtitled or described in text for accessibility purposes.

text: The website design should be modern  clean  and concise.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensuring Transparency Through Modern Design**

**Description:** As a **website user**, I want the website design to be modern, clean, and concise **so that** I can easily understand and navigate the website content without confusion, thereby enhancing transparency and user experience.

**Work:**
- The website interface is visually uncluttered and intuitive, allowing users to locate information easily.
- All design elements, such as typography and color schemes, support readability and do not distract from the content's clarity.
- Navigation menus are logically organized and consistent throughout the website to facilitate straightforward access to different sections.
- The website should support responsive design to maintain its clarity across various device types and screen sizes.
- Information and labels are presented clearly, with tooltips or explanations provided where necessary for understanding technical terms or functionality.

text: The product should be able to be used by 90% of novice users on the Internet.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Justice and Fairness

Title: Ensuring Accessibility for Novice Internet Users

Description: As a novice internet user, I want to be able to use the product with ease so that I can benefit from its features without facing unnecessary difficulties or barriers due to my lack of expertise.

Work:
- Conduct usability testing with a diverse group of novice internet users to identify usability issues.
- Implement user-friendly interfaces that simplify navigation and use of the product.
- Provide clear and simple instructions or tutorials to guide novice users in utilizing the product effectively.
- Ensure that error messages and help options are easily understandable and accessible.
- Measure the usability success rate among novice users, aiming for 90% satisfaction and ease of use.
- Regularly update and refine the product interface based on user feedback to maintain accessibility.

text: Users should only have to navigate through a maximum of 4 pages  to create an account with the website.
ethical_us:
Title: Streamlined Account Creation for Enhanced User Autonomy

Description: As an online user, I want to navigate through a maximum of 4 pages to create an account with the website so that I can maintain my autonomy and have a seamless user experience without unnecessary complexity.

Work:
- Ensure the account creation process is limited to a maximum of 4 pages.
- Each page should have clear and concise information or fields to fill out.
- Provide users with visible progress indicators to show which step they are on.
- Minimize unnecessary data entry to enhance the user's autonomy and freedom.
- Test the user experience to ensure that navigation remains intuitive and user-friendly.

text: Users should be able to access their streaming movies in under 2 clicks after logging into the website.
ethical_us:
Title: Seamless Access to Streaming Content

Description: As a movie enthusiast, I want to access my streaming movies in under 2 clicks after logging into the website so that I can enjoy a hassle-free and efficient viewing experience.

Work:
- Ensure login functionality is streamlined and reliable to prevent unnecessary obstacles.
- Design navigation to prioritize quick access to movie content immediately after login.

- Test the website's responsiveness and load time to guarantee speed and efficiency.
- Conduct user testing to confirm that the experience is intuitive and meets user expectations for ease of access.

Ethical Principle: Beneficence. By enabling users to access streaming content quickly and easily, this requirement aims to provide a good and beneficial user experience, enhancing user satisfaction and enjoyment.

text: An anonymous survey will show that 70% of customers are comfortable purchasing streaming movies after 2 weeks using the website.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensuring Customer Trust through Comfortable Purchasing Experience**

**Description:** As a customer, I want to feel comfortable purchasing streaming movies after using the website for two weeks so that I can trust the service and enjoy a seamless and reliable user experience.

**Work:**
1. Ensure the website provides clear and comprehensive information about movie purchases, including pricing and viewing options.
2. Implement a user-friendly purchasing process that facilitates easy transactions.
3. Offer robust customer support to assist with any issues or inquiries regarding movie purchases.
4. Gather and analyze anonymous customer feedback through surveys to assess their comfort levels and identify areas for improvement.
5. Integrate feedback mechanisms that allow customers to express concerns or suggestions in a confidential manner.
6. Regularly update customers on any changes or enhancements made based on their feedback to reinforce trust.
7. Ensure that all data collected is anonymized and securely stored to protect customer privacy.

text: An anonymous survey will show that 95% of customers are comfortable using and purchasing pre-paid cards after a month of using the system.
ethical_us:
Title: Enhancing Customer Trust in Pre-Paid Cards

Work: 
- Conduct a comprehensive security audit of the pre-paid card system to ensure data protection.
- Develop clear and accessible information regarding the security features and privacy policies of the pre-paid card system.
- Implement a feedback loop for customers to express concerns or issues with privacy and security.
- Provide regular updates to customers regarding any changes or improvements in privacy and security measures.
- Analyze anonymous survey results to understand customer confidence and address any negative feedback promptly.

text: The product shall retain the customer\92s buying preferences and information.
ethical_us:
### Title: Privacy-Preserving Customer Preference Retention

#### Description:
As a **customer**, I want to have my buying preferences and information retained **with assurance that my privacy is protected**, so that I can receive personalized recommendations and offers without compromising my personal data privacy.

#### Work:
- Ensure that all data retention complies with current data privacy regulations, such as GDPR.
- Implement data encryption methods to secure stored customer information.
- Provide customers with clear information on how their data is being used and stored.
- Offer customers the ability to opt-out of data retention or selectively choose what data is retained.
- Regularly review and update data security measures to safeguard against unauthorized access.

text: The product shall be easy for customers with novice skills on the  Internet to purchase and watch streaming movies.  Customers should be able to purchase and watch a pre-determined movie in under 3 minutes.
ethical_us:
Based on the requirement, the most related ethical principle is **Freedom and Autonomy**, as it emphasizes the importance of ensuring that users, especially those with novice skills, can easily purchase and watch movies without feeling restricted or overwhelmed. The user story will focus on empowering users with autonomy over their entertainment choices.

---

**Title: Easy and Accessible Movie Streaming for Novice Internet Users**

**Description**: As a *novice internet user*, I want to *easily purchase and watch a streaming movie in under 3 minutes* so that *I can enjoy my chosen entertainment without frustration or confusion*.

**Work**: 
- Implement a simplified user interface that guides the user step-by-step through the purchasing process.
- Provide clear, concise instructions with visual aids or tooltips for first-time users.
- Ensure compatibility with common devices and browsers to prevent technical barriers.
- Offer a demo video or a tutorial for navigating the purchase and viewing process.
- Test the process with users of varying internet skills to gather feedback and make necessary adjustments.
- Measure the average time for a user to purchase and watch a movie, ensuring it consistently stays under 3 minutes.

text: The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by users familiar with websites
ethical_us:
Title: Enable Understandable User Interface for Web Users

Description: As a web user, I want the product to use symbols and words that are naturally understandable to ensure I can intuitively navigate and interact with the website.

Work:
- Review existing symbols and words for common understandability among web users.
- Conduct user testing to identify any confusing or unclear elements in the interface.
- Iterate over the interface design based on user feedback to enhance clarity and understanding.
- Ensure that the product documentation explains any non-standard symbols or terminology used.
- Validate the final design with a diverse group of users to confirm universal understandability.  

(Note: The ethical principle most related to this requirement is "Transparency," as ensuring that symbols and words are naturally understandable supports clear communication and understanding for users.)

text: The website will use standard Internet conventions when interacting with the user.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent User Interactions through Standard Conventions

Description: As a website user, I want the website to use standard Internet conventions when interacting with me so that I can clearly understand and navigate the site with ease.

Work: 
- Ensure the website uses universally recognized icons and terms for actions such as 'Login,' 'Sign Up,' and 'Search.'
- Implement clear and consistent navigation menus that follow standard layouts and terminology.
- Use recognizable visual cues like buttons and hyperlinks to guide user actions.
- Provide an accessible site map for users to easily understand the website structure.
- Offer a clear and concise FAQ or help section explaining website features and navigation.

text: Any interface between a user and the automated system shall have a maximum response time of 5 seconds  unless noted by an exception below.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Timely User Interaction for Enhanced Trust

Description: As a conscientious user, I want the interface between myself and the automated system to respond within 5 seconds unless specific exceptions apply, so that I can trust the system's reliability and effectiveness.

Work: 
- Benchmark the system's current response times across varied user scenarios.
- Implement optimizations to ensure response times consistently remain within the 5-second threshold.
- Identify and document any exceptions where response time might exceed 5 seconds, providing clear communication to users.
- Conduct user testing to confirm system responsiveness meets established criteria.
- Monitor and log response times in real-time to ensure compliance and identify potential areas for further improvement.

text: When purchasing a streaming movie or pre-paid card via credit card  the processing time should have a maximum response time of 15 seconds.
ethical_us:
Title: Fast and Reliable Transaction Processing for Streaming Purchases

Description: As an online movie consumer, I want my credit card transactions for streaming movies or pre-paid cards to process within 15 seconds so that I can have a seamless and efficient purchasing experience without unnecessary delays.

Work: 
- Ensure the payment processing system infrastructure can handle peak loads efficiently.
- Optimize backend server performance to reduce latency in transaction processing.
- Implement a monitoring system to track and log transaction response times.
- Conduct regular performance testing to maintain and verify the response time does not exceed 15 seconds.
- Provide clear communication to the user if there is any delay beyond the stated response time, including reasons and expected resolution time.

text: When streaming a movie  the buffering time should take no longer than 10 seconds (plus any latency on the user\92s connection.)
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Seamless Movie Streaming Experience

Description: As a movie streamer, I want the buffering time to take no longer than 10 seconds, so that I can watch movies without interruptions and maintain a smooth viewing experience, considering my connection's latency.

Work:
- Ensure the streaming service's servers are optimized to minimize buffering times.
- Implement adaptive bitrate streaming to adjust quality based on connection speed.
- Monitor and address latency issues related to the streaming service.
- Provide clear communication to users about potential factors affecting buffering.
- Test the streaming experience under various connection speeds to validate buffering performance.

Ethical Principle: Trust

Explanation: This user story is predominantly related to the principle of trust. Users trust the service to deliver a seamless and uninterrupted streaming experience. To uphold this trust, it is crucial to ensure reliable performance and transparent communication regarding factors that could affect service delivery. Thus, maintaining buffering times under 10 seconds aligns with the commitment to reliability and fostering user trust.

text: While streaming a movie  buffering should only occur if there is latency in the user\92s connection.
ethical_us:
**Title: Fair Streaming Experience Without Unjust Buffering**

**Description:** As a movie watcher, I want buffering to occur only if there is latency in my connection so that my streaming experience is not unfairly disrupted by factors outside of my control.

**Work:**

- Ensure the streaming service accurately detects real connection latency before initiating buffering.
- Implement algorithms that distinguish between network issues (user-side) and server or service-related issues.
- Conduct tests to ensure buffering only occurs for genuine latency and not due to service inefficiencies.
- Validate that user feedback mechanisms allow for reporting unjust buffering experiences for investigation.
- Ensure continuous monitoring and improvement of network diagnostic tools to maintain fairness in streaming.
