This user story aligns with the ethical principle of Justice and Fairness, as it seeks to ensure that users are not subjected to unnecessary buffering that would lead to an unfair streaming experience.

text: All credit card information will be secured on the server  and only accessible by authorized Izogn administrators.  Information will be encrypted in the database.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure and Encrypted Storage of Credit Card Information

Description: As an Izogn customer, I want my credit card information to be securely stored and only accessible to authorized administrators, so that my personal financial data is protected and my privacy is preserved.

Work:
- Ensure all credit card information is stored on secure servers.
- Implement encryption protocols for credit card data in the database.
- Restrict access to credit card information only to authorized Izogn administrators.
- Conduct regular security audits to ensure ongoing compliance and data protection.
- Provide customers with information regarding the data protection measures in place for their financial information.

text: The website shall be available for use 24 hours per day  365 days per year.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Continuous Access for Users

Description: As a website user, I want to access the website 24 hours per day, 365 days per year, so that I can rely on its availability for my needs at any time.

Work: 
- Verify that the website's server infrastructure supports 24/7 availability.
- Implement redundancy and failover mechanisms to minimize downtime.
- Ensure regular monitoring and maintenance schedules are in place to detect and address issues promptly.
- Conduct load testing to ensure performance under varying traffic conditions.
- Provide clear communication channels for users to report any accessibility issues.  

Related Ethical Principle: Trust. Ensuring that the website is consistently available builds trust with users by demonstrating reliability and a commitment to maintaining promised availability standards.

text: The website shall achieve 99.5% up time.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring System Reliability and Trustworthiness

Description: As a user, I want the website to achieve a 99.5% uptime so that I can have trust in its reliability and access its services whenever needed.

Work: 
- Conduct regular system maintenance to identify and address potential vulnerabilities.
- Implement robust failover solutions to minimize downtime.
- Monitor system performance in real-time to quickly detect and fix issues.
- Establish a comprehensive incident response plan to restore services promptly.
- Communicate uptime metrics transparently to users to build trust.

text: All movies shall be streamed on demand  at any time of the day.
ethical_us:
**Title: Anytime Movie Streaming for Autonomous Entertainment**

**Description:** As a movie enthusiast, I want to stream movies on demand at any time of the day, so that I can exercise my freedom and autonomy in choosing when to enjoy leisure activities without being constrained by fixed schedules.

**Work:**
- Ensure the streaming service infrastructure supports 24/7 availability to prevent downtime.
- Implement a user-friendly interface allowing users to easily search and play movies at their convenience.
- Ensure all legal and licensing requirements for on-demand streaming are met.
- Provide a method for user feedback on streaming experience to continually improve service.
- Establish robust customer service support to address any issues or queries related to on-demand streaming.

text: The website shall continue to operate if the streaming server goes down.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Continuous Operation During Server Downtime

Description: As a website user, I want the website to continue operating seamlessly even if the streaming server goes down, so that I can trust the service to be reliable and uninterrupted.

Work:
- Implement a failover mechanism to switch to a backup server in case the primary streaming server fails.
- Develop a notification system to alert the technical team of server issues immediately.
- Test the failover solution under various conditions to ensure its effectiveness and reliability.
- Document the failover process and train staff to handle server downtime efficiently.
- Regularly review and update the failover strategy based on new insights and technological advancements.

text: The website shall continue to operate if the payment gateway goes down.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Continuous Website Operation During Payment Gateway Downtime

Description: As a website user, I want the website to continue functioning even if the payment gateway goes down, so that I can maintain access to non-transactional information and services without interruption.

Work:
- Implement a fallback system to notify users about payment gateway issues while allowing access to other site areas.
- Develop an alternative workflow for transactions that can be resumed once the payment gateway is back online.
- Test the system to ensure all non-payment functionalities remain operational during payment gateway downtime.
- Communicate expected downtime and alternative options to users clearly and transparently.
- Ensure the system logs incidents for accountability and future analysis to prevent recurrence.

text: The streaming server will support 50 simultaneous streaming connections.
ethical_us:
**Ethical Principle: Trust**

**Title:** Ensure Reliable Streaming Capacity

**Description:** As a streaming service user, I want the server to support 50 simultaneous streaming connections so that I can trust the service to deliver smooth and uninterrupted content during peak usage times.

**Work:**
- Verify the server's capacity to handle 50 concurrent connections through load testing.
- Monitor the server’s performance under stress to ensure stability and reliability.
- Implement alert systems to notify technical teams of any performance issues with concurrent connections.
- Optimize network bandwidth and resources to support the required number of streaming connections.
- Conduct regular maintenance and updates to the streaming server to uphold service quality and reliability.

text: The streaming server will support a maximum of 700 movies
ethical_us:
Title: Responsible Streaming Server Capacity 

Description: As an operations manager, I want the streaming server to support a maximum of 700 movies so that we can ensure the system runs efficiently and responsibly without risking crashes or data loss.

Work: 
- Verify that server load is tested to handle up to 700 movies.
- Ensure system monitoring tools are in place to alert when approaching capacity.
- Confirm a contingency plan is established for handling excess movie uploads.
- Document the server capacity specifications clearly for engineering and operational awareness.
- Train staff on managing server loads and responding to capacity alerts.

text: The server will support a maximum of 1 000 simultaneous users.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring System Capacity for Fair Access

Description: As a server administrator, I want to ensure the system can support a maximum of 1,000 simultaneous users so that all users have an equitable experience and the system remains stable and reliable for everyone.

Work:
- Determine the server's current capacity and infrastructure limitations.
- Upgrade hardware or optimize software as needed to support up to 1,000 simultaneous users.
- Perform load testing to confirm the server can handle 1,000 concurrent connections without performance degradation.
- Implement monitoring tools to track the number of simultaneous users and alert administrators when nearing capacity.
- Establish a queuing mechanism or system warnings to manage user access if nearing the maximum capacity.
- Document procedures and system thresholds to ensure ongoing maintenance of maximum user support.

text: The website shall be capable of supporting 100 000 customers.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Fair Access to Website Resources

Description: As a website administrator, I want to ensure the website can support 100,000 customers simultaneously so that all users have equal access to resources without experiencing latency or service disruptions.

Work:
- Conduct load testing to verify the website can handle 100,000 concurrent users effectively.
- Implement necessary scalability measures, such as server load balancing and optimized database queries, to support increased traffic.
- Monitor the website's performance continuously to ensure consistent user experience even under peak loads.
- Ensure there are no biases in resource allocation that could lead to unfair service distribution among users.
- Provide documentation on system capacity and maintain transparency with users about service capabilities and potential limitations.

text: The product shall be expected to operate within the maximum maintenance budget for a minimum of 2 years.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Product Affordability and Longevity for Ethical Sustainability

Description: As a responsible financial manager, I want to ensure that the product operates within the maximum maintenance budget for a minimum of 2 years so that the organization can commit to sustainable financial practices without incurring unexpected costs.

Work: 
- Verify that the product maintenance does not exceed the allocated budget over two years through regular financial audits.
- Implement a monitoring system to track ongoing maintenance costs against the budget in real-time.
- Develop and provide maintenance guidelines to minimize unforeseen expenses.
- Schedule regular reviews with the maintenance team to identify and address any potential cost overruns.
- Set up alerts to notify relevant stakeholders if the maintenance budget approaches the predetermined limit before the two-year term ends.

text: All aspects of the website shall be accessed by a web browser over the Internet.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Accessible Web Browsing

**Description:** As an internet user, I want to access all aspects of the website via a web browser over the Internet so that I can have the freedom and autonomy to use the website from any location and device of my choice without restrictions.

**Work:**
- Ensure website compatibility with multiple web browsers (e.g., Chrome, Firefox, Safari).
- Implement responsive design to allow access on various devices (e.g., desktop, tablet, mobile).
- Verify that all website features are accessible without extra plugins or applications.
- Ensure consistent performance and loading times across different browsers.
- Conduct user testing to confirm ease of access and functionality across browsers and devices.
- Provide clear guidance and support for accessing the website via a web browser.

text: The same hardware supporting the current website will be used to support the new system.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Sustainable Resource Utilization for New System

Description: As an IT Infrastructure Manager, I want to utilize the same hardware supporting the current website for the new system so that we can promote sustainability by maximizing resource efficiency and reducing electronic waste.

Work: 
- Evaluate the current hardware's capacity and performance metrics to ensure compatibility with the new system's requirements.
- Ensure that the new system is optimized for the existing hardware capabilities to prevent unnecessary upgrades.
- Conduct stress testing on the current hardware with the new system to guarantee stability and performance.
- Document any adjustments or configurations needed for the new system to operate efficiently on the existing hardware.
- Develop a plan for regular maintenance checks to ensure continued sustainability and effectiveness of the hardware.

text: We must be able to interface with the following browsers: IE 5.X  6.0  Netscape 6.x  7.x  8.x and Firefox 1.0.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Browser Compatibility for Inclusive Access

Description: As a web user with diverse browser preferences, I want to access the application across multiple browsers, so that I can have a fair and inclusive digital experience regardless of my choice of browser.

Work: 
- Ensure compatibility of the application with Internet Explorer 5.X and 6.0.
- Test and confirm that the application works seamlessly on Netscape versions 6.x, 7.x, and 8.x.
- Validate that Firefox 1.0 users can access all features of the application without issues.
- Conduct usability testing across all specified browsers to ensure consistent user experience.
- Document any browser-specific issues and implement solutions to address them.

text: Website must interface with the CyberSource API to process credit card transactions.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure and Transparent Credit Card Processing

Description: As an online shopper, I want the website to interface with the CyberSource API to process credit card transactions securely and transparently, so that I can make purchases with confidence that my financial information is protected and the process is clear.

Work:
- Implement secure encryption protocols to ensure data privacy during transactions.
- Provide clear communication on the website about how customer data is handled and processed.
- Ensure the interface with the CyberSource API adheres to industry standards for financial data security.
- Display a confirmation message to users after successful transactions.
- Establish a process for monitoring and auditing transactions to detect and address potential issues.

text: Website must be fully operational with MSN TV2.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Ensuring Website Compatibility with MSN TV2

**Description:** As a user relying on MSN TV2, I want the website to be fully operational so that I can access all features and services without any hindrance.

**Work:**

1. Test the website on MSN TV2 to ensure full functionality.
2. Identify and resolve compatibility issues specific to MSN TV2.
3. Ensure that all website features load and perform properly on MSN TV2.
4. Regularly update compatibility tests as website or MSN TV2 updates occur.
5. Provide a channel for feedback from MSN TV2 users regarding any operational issues.

**Related Ethical Principle:** Freedom and Autonomy

This user story relates to the principle of Freedom and Autonomy. By ensuring the website is fully operational with MSN TV2, the requirement supports users' freedom to choose their preferred platform without being restricted due to compatibility issues.

text: Movies shall be encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Ensure Transparent Encoding and Streaming of Movies

Description: As a technology auditor, I want to ensure that movies are encoded and streamed via Windows Media Player 9.0 transparently so that stakeholders can have clear insights into the encoding and streaming processes.

Work: 
- Verify that the encoding process is fully documented and accessible for review by authorized personnel.
- Implement a logging mechanism to track the streaming activities within Windows Media Player 9.0.
- Provide stakeholders with an explainer guide on how the encoding and streaming process works, using understandable language.
- Ensure that any changes or updates to the encoding and streaming methodologies are communicated to stakeholders in a timely and clear manner.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure ongoing transparency in the encoding and streaming processes.

text: Movies shall be encoded for 56k and 256k streams.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Accessibility for Diverse Internet Speeds

Description: As a movie streaming user with varying internet bandwidth, I want movies to be available in both 56k and 256k encoded streams so that I can enjoy a seamless viewing experience regardless of my internet connection quality.

Work:
- Verify that the movie streaming platform supports multiple encoding options, specifically for 56k and 256k streams.
- Conduct tests to ensure movie quality is optimized for lower bandwidths without significant loss in viewing experience.
- Implement adaptive streaming technology that automatically selects the appropriate stream based on the user’s internet speed.
- Ensure clear communication to users regarding the availability of different streaming options and how to choose the best one manually if desired. 

Ethical Principle: Justice and fairness. 
This user story aligns with the ethical principle of justice and fairness, as it ensures that users with limited internet speeds are not disadvantaged and can access movie streaming services similarly to those with faster internet connections.

text: Promotional updates to the website should take a day to update.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Timely Update for Promotional Website Content

**Description**: As a marketing manager, I want promotional updates to the website to be processed and updated within a day so that I can ensure the latest promotions are promptly communicated to customers, maintaining their trust in our brand's reliability and transparency.

**Work**:

- Verify that the content management system processes updates efficiently within a 24-hour window.
- Ensure that communication about any potential delays in updates is made clear to the marketing team.
- Test the website updating process regularly to mitigate any issues that could cause delays.
- Document any changes in update protocols and share them with relevant stakeholders, ensuring transparency.
- Confirm that all updates align with the company's transparency and truth-in-advertising guidelines.

text: Izogn Administrator must be able to update the category listings on the website within 2 minutes.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Efficient Updating of Category Listings

**Description:** As an Izogn Administrator, I want to update the category listings on the website within 2 minutes so that I can maintain an accurate and timely presentation of information to users without unnecessary delays.

**Work:**
- Ensure the system provides clear instructions for updating categories to promote transparency.
- Verify that the administrative interface is easy to use and intuitive to understand.
- Test and confirm that updates can be processed and reflected on the website within 2 minutes consistently.
- Log each update action for accountability and future auditing purposes.
- Provide feedback to administrators about the success or failure of the update process immediately. 

**Ethical Principle:** Trust

The ethical principle most related to the requirement is Trust. By ensuring the category listings can be updated quickly and reliably, administrators can maintain user trust in the website's accuracy and timeliness. The transparency and accountability in the update process, along with immediate feedback, further consolidate this trust.

text: Izogn Administrator must be able to add new products to the website within 2 minutes.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Efficiency and Effectiveness (related to the principle of Trust)

Title: Efficient Product Addition for Izogn Administrator

Description: As an Izogn Administrator, I want to add new products to the website within 2 minutes so that I can ensure an up-to-date product catalog and provide customers with the latest offerings promptly.

Work:
- Ensure that the product entry interface is user-friendly and intuitive.
- Optimize the back-end processing to support rapid data input and submission.
- Implement clear guidelines and tooltips to assist administrators in expediting the data entry process.
- Test the system to verify that adding a product consistently takes under 2 minutes.
- Provide training materials or sessions for administrators to efficiently use the product addition feature.

text: The system will provide a 24 hour 800 toll free number for support to its customers.
ethical_us:
**Title:** 24/7 Customer Support Accessibility

**Description:** As a customer, I want to have access to a 24-hour toll-free support line so that I can receive assistance and resolve any issues promptly, enhancing trust in the service provider.

**Work:**

- Ensure the support line is operational 24/7 without interruptions.
- Verify that the toll-free number is prominently displayed on all customer-facing interfaces.
- Train support staff to handle a wide range of inquiries and issues effectively and with empathy.
- Implement a system for tracking customer inquiries and resolutions to improve service quality continually.
- Conduct regular audits of the support service to ensure compliance with quality and efficiency standards.
- Provide multilingual support to accommodate non-English speaking customers.

text: The website will provide a help section with answers and solutions to common problems.
ethical_us:
Title: Accessible Help Section for Enhanced Clarity

Description: As a website user, I want to have access to a comprehensive help section with answers and solutions to common problems so that I can easily understand and resolve any issues I encounter, ensuring a transparent and smooth user experience.

Work: 
- The help section must contain detailed guides and FAQs that address common inquiries and problems.
- Information should be presented in clear and easily understandable language to cater to users with varying levels of technical expertise.
- The help section must be easily accessible from the main navigation menu on the website.
- Regular updates should be made to the help section to include new issues or changes, based on user feedback and system updates.
- A search functionality should be included within the help section for users to quickly find answers to specific questions.
- The help documentation should be cross-referenced with related topics for comprehensive guidance.

Related Ethical Principle: Transparency

This user story aligns with the ethical principle of Transparency, focusing on providing clear, accessible, and understandable information to users, ensuring they can effectively navigate and resolve issues on the website, thereby enhancing user confidence and satisfaction.

text: Velkat staff will be available for phone support between 7am-7pm  M-F to provide technical support to the Izogn administrators.
ethical_us:
Title: Reliable and Accessible Customer Support for Technical Assistance

Description: As an Izogn administrator, I want Velkat staff to be available for phone support between 7am-7pm M-F so that I can receive timely and necessary technical assistance, ensuring uninterrupted service and maintaining trust in the system.

Work:
- Velkat staff must be available via phone support from 7 am to 7 pm, Monday to Friday.
- Ensure clear communication lines are established and functional for administrators to reach support staff easily.
- Maintain a log of support calls to monitor common issues and improve service quality.
- Train support staff to provide accurate and efficient solutions, reinforcing trust in the support service.

text: The product shall be able to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient Installation for Timely Operations

Description: As a systems administrator, I want the product to be installed in the specified environment within 1 working day so that our operations can proceed without unnecessary delays, ensuring fairness and efficiency for all stakeholders involved.

Work: 
- Confirm that all installation requirements are met and the environment is prepared before installation begins.
- Develop a streamlined installation process that is consistently executable within a single working day.
- Provide clear documentation and support resources to assist with the installation process.
- Test the installation process in varying environments to ensure reliability and adherence to the 1-day installation goal.
- Collect feedback from early installations to identify and address any obstacles to achieving a 1-day installation. 

Ethical Principle: Justice and fairness - This requirement aims to ensure that the installation process is fair and efficient for all users, avoiding unnecessary delays and disruptions in their operations.

text: Only registered customers can purchase streaming movies.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Fair Access to Streaming Services

Description: As a registered customer, I want to be the only one allowed to purchase streaming movies so that the service is secure, fair, and my account privileges are respected.

Work: 
- Verify that only users with registered accounts can access the movie purchasing page.
- Implement authentication checks to confirm user registration before allowing a purchase.
- Ensure the registration process is transparent and easy for users to understand.
- Provide clear communication to prospective customers about the benefits of registration.
- Confirm that all registered users are treated fairly and equitably without discrimination.

text: A customer can only stream a movie if they purchased it  and are within the 2 day viewing period.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensuring Fair Access to Purchased Movies**

**Description:** As a customer, I want to stream a movie only if I have purchased it and am within the 2-day viewing period, so that I can fairly utilize the rights I paid for while ensuring the system respects the terms of the agreement.

**Work:**
- Verify the customer has completed the purchase transaction for the movie.
- Confirm the streaming request falls within the 2-day viewing period from the time of purchase.
- Restrict access if the viewing period has expired or if the customer has not purchased the movie.
- Provide customers with clear communication regarding viewing expiration times.
- Ensure that system logs are maintained to track when the purchase was made and when the streaming period ends.
- Implement a method for customers to view their purchase history and current viewing periods.

This user story is primarily related to the ethical principle of **Trust**, ensuring that systems work properly to protect the integrity of purchased rights and maintaining customer trust by fulfilling the terms of service agreements.

text: Only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database.
ethical_us:
Title: Protect Customer Privacy by Restricting Database Access

Description: As a database administrator, I want to ensure that only authorized personnel can access customer records in the database so that customer privacy is maintained and personal data is protected from unauthorized access.

Work: 
- Verify that access control mechanisms are implemented to restrict database access to authorized personnel only.
- Ensure that all database access requests are logged for audit purposes.
- Conduct regular reviews and audits of access logs to ensure compliance with privacy policies.
- Implement strong authentication methods for personnel accessing the database.
- Provide training to authorized personnel on privacy and data protection practices.
- Establish a process for promptly revoking access for personnel who no longer require it.

text: Only administrators can activate a pre-paid card.
ethical_us:
Title: Administrator-Controlled Activation for Pre-paid Cards

Description: As a financial services administrator, I want to have exclusive control over the activation of pre-paid cards so that we can ensure transparency, security, and proper authorization in financial transactions.

Work:
- Verify that only users with administrator roles have access to the card activation process.
- Ensure the system logs every activation attempt with the administrator's credentials for audit purposes.
- Create user documentation that explains the activation process and its authorization requirements.
- Implement a notification system to inform administrators of any attempted unauthorized activation.
- Regularly review and update the permissions required for activation to align with security policies.

text: Only authorized personnel can access sales information.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Secure Access to Sales Information

**Description**: As a Sales Manager, I want to ensure that only authorized personnel can access sales information so that sensitive data is protected and privacy is maintained.

**Work**:
- Implement user authentication mechanisms to verify the identity of personnel accessing the sales information.
- Set up role-based access controls to restrict sales information access to authorized personnel only.
- Log and monitor access to sales information for audit and compliance purposes.
- Regularly update and review access permissions to reflect changes in personnel roles or responsibilities.
- Ensure data encryption during transmission and storage to protect sales information from unauthorized access.

text: The website shall prevent its data from being corrupted when incorrect data is entered in.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Data Integrity and Protection

Description: As a developer, I want to implement mechanisms to prevent website data from being corrupted when incorrect data is entered so that the integrity and trustworthiness of the data are maintained.

Work:
- Validate all user inputs before processing them.
- Implement error-handling procedures to manage incorrect data entries.
- Create and maintain a backup system to restore original data if corruption occurs.
- Provide clear feedback to users when incorrect data is submitted, guiding them to rectify their input.
- Regularly audit and test data validation systems to ensure ongoing effectiveness.

Ethical Principle: Trust - Ensuring the system functions properly to maintain the security and effectiveness of data handling, thereby establishing trust with users.

text: The website shall protect itself from intentional abuse  and notify the administrator at all occurrences.
ethical_us:
Title: Preventing and Reporting Intentional Abuse

Description: As a website administrator, I want to ensure that the website is protected from intentional abuse and receive notifications of such occurrences so that I can take action to prevent potential harm and maintain the integrity of the website.

Work: 
- Implement security measures to detect and block intentional abuse attempts.
- Set up a notification system to alert administrators immediately when abuse is detected.
- Ensure that the notification system includes details of the abuse attempt for better assessment.
- Conduct regular tests to verify the effectiveness of the protection system.
- Document procedures for administrators to follow upon receiving an abuse notification.

Ethical Principle: Responsibility
This user story aligns with the principle of Responsibility, emphasizing the accountability of the website administrators in protecting the website from malicious activities and ensuring appropriate measures are taken to maintain the website's integrity and safety.

text: Data integrity scripts will be run on a weekly basis to verify the integrity of the database.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Data Integrity with Regular Verification

Description: As a data custodian, I want to run data integrity scripts on a weekly basis so that I can maintain the trustworthiness and reliability of the database.

Work:
- Schedule and automate weekly execution of data integrity scripts.
- Verify that all data integrity checks are completed successfully without errors.
- Document any discrepancies found during the integrity checks.
- Review and address any data integrity issues identified during the verification process.
- Generate a report summarizing the results of each weekly integrity check.
- Ensure compliance with organizational policies for data integrity and security.

Associated Ethical Principle: Trust

text: All customer information will be stored on a secure database  accessible only to authorized personnel.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure and Private Data Storage

Description: As a customer, I want my personal information to be stored securely in a database that is only accessible by authorized personnel so that my privacy is protected from unauthorized access and potential misuse.

Work: 
- Ensure the database is encrypted to protect data at rest.
- Implement role-based access control to restrict data access to authorized personnel only.
- Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments on the database.
- Log and monitor access to the database for unauthorized access attempts.
- Provide training to authorized personnel on data privacy and security protocols.
- Establish a protocol for responding to and reporting data breaches promptly.

text: The streaming server will have anti-virus software to prevent infection of malicious viruses.
ethical_us:
Title: Protect Streaming Server from Malicious Threats

Description: As a network administrator, I want the streaming server to have anti-virus software installed so that it can prevent infection from malicious viruses and protect both the server's integrity and user data.

Work: 
- Ensure antivirus software is compatible with the streaming server's operating system.
- Install and regularly update the antivirus software to safeguard against new threats.
- Configure the antivirus to perform real-time scanning and regular system checks.
- Test the server to ensure the antivirus does not interfere with streaming performance.
- Document and communicate antivirus measures to relevant stakeholders. 

The most relevant ethical principle to this requirement is Non-maleficence, as the installation of anti-virus software aims to "do no harm" by preventing malicious threats that could compromise the server and user data.

text: The website should cater to all tribes in Nigeria.
ethical_us:
Title: Inclusive Representation for All Tribes in Nigeria

Description: As a member of a diverse tribal community in Nigeria, I want to ensure that the website acknowledges and represents all Nigerian tribes fairly so that my cultural identity is recognized and respected.

Work:
- Conduct research to identify all tribes in Nigeria and their cultural characteristics.
- Design and implement a user interface that includes elements representing each tribe.
- Consult with cultural experts to ensure accurate and fair representation.
- Test the website with members from each tribe to gather feedback and make necessary adjustments.
- Regularly update the website to reflect any changes in tribal demographics or cultural practices.

text: The website shall not be offensive to religious or ethnic groups.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Inclusivity and Respect for Religious and Ethnic Groups

Description: As a culturally sensitive user, I want the website to be free of offensive content related to religious or ethnic groups so that I can engage with the platform without experiencing discrimination or offense.

Work: 
- Conduct a comprehensive review of all website content to identify any potential offensive material related to religious or ethnic groups.
- Implement a content moderation policy that specifically outlines the avoidance of material offensive to religious or ethnic groups.
- Train content creators and moderators on cultural sensitivity and inclusivity principles.
- Set up a reporting mechanism for users to flag potentially offensive content.
- Regularly update the content review process to include feedback from a diverse panel representing various religious and ethnic groups.
- Ensure that all images, language, and interactions on the website maintain fairness and respect towards all cultural backgrounds. 

Ethical Principle: Justice and Fairness

text: The website should appeal to all Africans  not only Nigerians.
ethical_us:
Title: Inclusive and Diverse Website Representation for African Audiences

Description: As a website user from any African country, I want the website to appeal to all Africans, not just Nigerians, so that I feel represented and included regardless of my nationality.

Work:
- Conduct research on diverse cultural elements and preferences across different African countries to ensure broad appeal.
- Design user interface elements that reflect diverse African cultures in a way that is inclusive and respectful.
- Ensure content on the website includes perspectives and stories from various African nations, not just Nigeria.
- Test the website with focus groups from different African countries to gather feedback on inclusivity and appeal.
- Regularly update content and design elements to maintain relevance and inclusivity for all African users.

text: The website should use Flash to provide animation on the home page.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Accessibility and Security Through Modern Web Technologies

Description: As a web developer, I want to use modern, open web technologies for animations on the home page so that users have a secure, accessible, and optimal browsing experience without compatibility issues or security risks.

Work:
1. Research and select modern web technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript that offer robust and secure alternatives to Flash for animations.
2. Implement and test animations using the selected modern web technologies to ensure compatibility across various devices and browsers.
3. Validate that animations do not compromise the accessibility of the website for users with disabilities, ensuring alignment with web accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG).
4. Conduct a security assessment to confirm that the chosen technologies do not introduce vulnerabilities or risks to user privacy or data security.
5. Gather user feedback to verify that the animations improve the user experience without causing any technical or ethical issues.

text: IzognMovies shall meet the licensing requirements set forth by the appropriate organizations in order to stream African movies.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Compliance with Licensing Requirements for Streaming

Description: As a compliance officer, I want IzognMovies to meet the licensing requirements set forth by the appropriate organizations so that we can ethically stream African movies and respect intellectual property rights.

Work: 
- Verify all streaming licenses against appropriate regional and international regulations.
- Establish a system to track licensing requirements and expiration dates.
- Develop partnerships with rights holders and relevant licensing organizations.
- Implement regular audits to ensure ongoing compliance with all licensing agreements.
- Provide transparent documentation of licensing compliance for internal and external stakeholders.

text: The website will comply with W3C standards.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Accessibility and Fairness through W3C Compliance

Description: As an ethical developer, I want to ensure that the website complies with W3C standards so that all users, regardless of their abilities or disabilities, can access and use the website fairly and without discrimination.

Work: 
- Verify that the website adheres to the Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG).
- Conduct accessibility testing with tools and assistive technologies.
- Ensure website content is perceivable, operable, understandable, and robust across different devices and browsers.
- Provide alternative text for all images and multimedia content.
- Implement keyboard navigability for all interactive elements.
- Review color contrast and text readability for inclusivity.
- Conduct user testing with individuals with disabilities to validate accessibility improvements.

text: The PHP code will comply with PEAR standards.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Code Compliance with Standards

Description: As a developer, I want the PHP code to comply with PEAR standards so that the codebase remains consistent, reliable, and easy to maintain, ensuring high quality and ethical software practices.

Work:
- The PHP code must be reviewed and formatted according to PEAR coding standards.
- Continuous integration tools will be set up to automatically check for compliance with PEAR standards.
- Documentation will be made available to the development team on PEAR standards and best practices.
- Both manual and automated testing must ensure that code changes do not break PEAR compliance.
- Any non-compliant code must be refactored to align with PEAR standards.

text: The website will allow customers to search for movies by title  actor  or director.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Movie Search Functionality 

Description: As a movie enthusiast, I want to transparently search for movies by title, actor, or director, so that I can easily find and access accurate and relevant information about my favorite films.

Work: 
- The search feature should clearly display which databases and sources are being used for the search results.
- The search algorithm should be capable of providing a brief explanation or rationale behind the rankings of search results.
- Users should have access to a FAQ or help section that explains how search terms are matched and how results are prioritized.
- The system should log and display the last updated date/time of the movie database, ensuring users understand the data currency.
- An intuitive user interface that allows users to toggle or filter results based on their preferences, such as release dates, genres, or ratings.

text: viewing a movie details the website will display the movies description actor and director entered in by the administrator.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Movie Information Display

Description: As a movie enthusiast, I want to view detailed and accurate movie descriptions, actors, and director information entered by the administrator so that I can make informed decisions about which movies to watch.

Work: 
- Ensure that movie details (description, actors, and director) are clearly displayed on the website.
- Verify that all information is up-to-date and matches the data entered by the administrator.
- Implement a feature that indicates when the movie details were last updated.
- Provide contact information or a feedback option for reporting discrepancies in the movie information.
- Test the user interface to confirm that the information is accessible and easy to read across different devices.

text: Website shall request  and authorize credit card payment before allowing a user to stream a movie.
ethical_us:
The ethical principle most related to the requirement of requesting and authorizing credit card payments before allowing a user to stream a movie is "Trust". Trust is fundamental in ensuring that users feel secure in making payments and that their financial data is handled responsibly.

Title: Secure Payment Authorization for Movie Streaming

Description: As a movie streaming platform user, I want to ensure that my credit card payment is requested and authorized securely before I am allowed to stream a movie, so that I can trust the service with my financial details and enjoy my movie without concerns.

Work:
- Implement a secure payment gateway that complies with PCI DSS (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard).
- Ensure that the payment process involves encryption to protect credit card details.
- Notify users of successful payment authorization through a confirmation email or on-screen message.
- Provide clear instructions and an understandable payment interface for users.
- Allow users to review their payment details before final authorization.
- Implement a process for handling payment errors and securely notifying users of any issues.

text: shall be able to stream purchased movie via Windows Media Player  for up to 2 days aftere purchase date.
ethical_us:
Title: Enable Timely Access to Purchased Movie Content

Description: As a movie consumer, I want to be able to stream my purchased movie via Windows Media Player for up to 2 days after purchase so that I can enjoy my entertainment at my convenience while respecting the rights of the content creators.

Work:
- Ensure that the digital rights management (DRM) mechanisms are in place to allow streaming for a maximum of 2 days from the purchase date.
- Implement a notification system to alert users 24 hours before their streaming access expires.
- Verify that the streaming functionality is seamless and reliable within the specified period.
- Ensure that access to the movie is revoked after the 2-day period has elapsed.
- Maintain user data privacy and do not collect unnecessary data about their viewing habits.

text: Website shall allow customers to browse movies by categories entered in by izogn administrator.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Movie Browsing by Categories

Description: As a customer, I want to browse movies by categories entered by the izogn administrator so that I can easily find movies that interest me and understand how they are organized.

Work: 
- Display all available movie categories clearly on the website.
- Ensure that each category is accurately described for easy understanding.
- Provide information about how categories are determined and updated by the admin.
- Allow customers to see the number of movies available in each category.
- Offer a user guide or FAQ section explaining the browsing process and addressing potential queries.

text: Website shall allow customers to view reviews of selected movies by other customers.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Transparent Movie Review Visibility

**Description:** As a movie enthusiast, I want to view reviews of selected movies by other customers so that I can make informed decisions about which movies to watch.

**Work:**
- Display a list of movie reviews from other customers for each selected movie.
- Ensure reviews include details like the reviewer's rating, comments, and date of posting.
- Provide a clear summary or average rating for each movie based on customer reviews.
- Allow users to sort and filter reviews by various criteria such as rating, date, or helpfulness.
- Ensure transparency by indicating which reviews are verified and highlighting any potential biases or conflicts of interest from reviewers.

text: Website shall allow customers to add their own movie review for a selected movie.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Empowering User Expression through Movie Reviews

**Description**: As a movie enthusiast, I want to add my own review for a selected movie so that I can share my perspective and contribute to the community’s understanding and appreciation of films.

**Work**:
- Ensure that the review submission form is easy to understand and accessible to all users.
- Allow users to submit a review after watching a movie by logging into their account.
- Provide clear guidelines on how to write a review, encouraging respectful and constructive feedback.
- Implement moderation features to ensure reviews adhere to community guidelines and do not contain harmful or offensive content.
- Display submitted reviews prominently on the movie's page for other users to read.
- Allow users to edit or delete their reviews after submission.
- Provide feedback to users once their review has been posted or if moderation requires changes.

**Related Ethical Principle**: *Freedom and Autonomy* - This functionality promotes freedom of expression by allowing users to voice their opinions and share their perspectives, thereby fostering a diverse and inclusive platform where movie enthusiasts feel empowered to contribute.

text: Website shall allow the Izogn administrator to approve a review posted by a customer.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Fair and Trustworthy Reviews Approval Process

Description: As an Izogn administrator, I want to approve customer reviews so that we maintain the integrity and trust of the content on our website, ensuring it is fair and not harmful to others.

Work: 
- Acceptance Criteria:
  1. The system must support a feature that allows administrators to review all customer-submitted reviews.
  2. Administrators can either approve or reject reviews based on predefined guidelines focused on fairness and non-maleficence.
  3. The review process should be transparent, showing reasons for approval or rejection to the administrative user.
  4. Audit logs must be maintained for each review's approval decision for accountability.
  5. The interface must provide clear instructions and criteria for review approval to support decision-making aligned with ethical principles.

text: System will allow customers to pay for a streaming movie with a pre-paid card.
ethical_us:
Title: Enabling Equitable Payment Options for Streaming Services

Description: As a customer who prefers using pre-paid cards, I want to pay for streaming movies with a pre-paid card so that I can access content without relying on credit cards and have more control over my spending.

Work:
- Ensure the payment system securely accepts and processes pre-paid card transactions.
- Verify the payment process is user-friendly and accessible for all customers.
- Implement a clear explanation on how to use pre-paid cards for payment on the user's dashboard.
- Provide customer support to assist customers using pre-paid cards in case of payment issues.
- Conduct tests to ensure the system fairly processes payments from all supported pre-paid card providers.

text: Website shall allow customers to purchase pre-paid cards of $5  $10  or $20 value either by credit card or mail-in payment option.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Purchase Options for Pre-Paid Cards

Description: As a customer, I want to clearly understand the options and processes available to purchase pre-paid cards of $5, $10, or $20 through either credit card or mail-in payment option, so that I can make informed decisions and trust the purchasing process.

Work: 
- Display all available pre-paid card values ($5, $10, $20) clearly on the website.
- Provide a detailed comparison of the credit card and mail-in payment options, including any fees and processing times.
- Ensure that the terms and conditions for each payment method are easily accessible and understandable.
- Implement an FAQ or help section addressing common questions about purchasing pre-paid cards.
- Include a clear and concise confirmation process to verify successful transactions.

text: System shall automatically update the main page of the website every Friday  and show the 4 latest movies that have been added to the website.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Movie Update Display

Description: As a website user, I want the main page to automatically update every Friday to display the 4 latest movies that have been added, so that I can easily stay informed about new content on the platform and enhance my viewing experience.

Work:
- Verify that the system updates the main page every Friday at a consistent time.
- Ensure that the 4 latest movies displayed are the most recent additions to the website's database.
- Provide a short description of each new movie to enhance understandability for users.
- Include a clear timestamp or note indicating when the last update occurred to maintain transparency.
- Conduct thorough testing to confirm the accuracy and timeliness of the updates displayed.

text: System shall allow users to update their billing and contact information via the \93My Account\94 section of the website.
ethical_us:
**Title: Enabling User Autonomy through Account Information Updates**

**Description:** As a user, I want to update my billing and contact information via the "My Account" section of the website so that I can ensure my details are current and accurate without needing to rely on customer service representatives.

**Work:**

- The system must provide a secure login process to access the "My Account" section.
- Users should be able to easily navigate to the billing and contact information update section.
- The system should allow users to modify fields including billing address, contact phone number, and email address.
- Real-time validations should be in place to ensure the entered data is correct and follows required formats.
- Changes must be securely saved and immediately reflected in the user's account.
- Users should receive a confirmation notification upon successfully updating their information.
- Audit logs should be maintained to track changes for accountability and security purposes.
  
The ethical principle most related to this requirement is "Freedom and autonomy," as it empowers users to independently manage their personal information, reflecting democratic values of individual control and self-governance over one's own data.

text: Pre-paid cards shall be distributed via email or via a printed paper card.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Distribution of Pre-Paid Cards

Description: As a card distributor, I want the option to send pre-paid cards via email or printed paper, so that recipients can choose their preferred method with full understanding of process transparency.

Work:
- Ensure recipients are informed clearly about the distribution options (email or printed card).
- Provide detailed instructions for both distribution methods, explaining each step of the receiving process.
- Confirm that security information is included in the communication for both email and printed deliveries.
- Include contact information for support in case recipients have questions about the distribution process.
- Gather feedback from recipients regarding their experience of the distribution method to improve transparency and processes in the future.

text: Movies can only be streamed if the customer has purchased a movie  and is within the 2-day time period to stream the movie.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensure Fair Access to Purchased Movie Streams**

**Description:** As a paying customer, I want to stream a movie I've purchased within a defined 2-day period so that my purchase rights are respected and fairness is maintained in access to digital content.

**Work:**

1. Verify the purchase of the movie by the customer using secure transaction records.
2. Implement a system to track the 2-day streaming period from the time of purchase.
3. Ensure the movie is accessible to the customer only within the 2-day timeframe.
4. Display a notification to the customer indicating when the streaming period is about to expire.
5. Prevent streaming access if the movie has not been purchased or if the 2-day period has elapsed.
6. Log access attempts for auditing and customer service support.

text: Website must be able to support free trial periods with various parameters set by the Izogn Manager.
ethical_us:
Title: Implement Transparent Free Trial Management

Description: As an Izogn Manager, I want to configure and manage free trial periods with various parameters so that users have a clear understanding of the trial conditions and can make informed decisions.

Work:
- Ensure the system can display all available trial period options and settings to users.
- Develop a user interface that allows managers to easily set and modify trial parameters.
- Provide clear and concise communication to users about the terms and duration of their free trial.
- Implement a notification system to inform users when their trial is approaching expiration.
- Create a log of all changes made to trial period settings for review and accountability.

text: All streaming movie sales will be logged in the database  and accessible by the administrator.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Logging of Streaming Movie Sales

Description: As an administrator, I want to access all streaming movie sales logged in the database so that I can ensure transparency and accountability in the sales process.

Work:
- Verify that each movie sale transaction is accurately recorded in the database.
- Ensure that the logging system includes a timestamp and relevant user information for each sale.
- Implement secure access controls to allow only authorized administrators to view the logged sales data.
- Create a user-friendly interface for administrators to view and analyze the sales logs.
- Ensure that the logging system complies with data privacy and security regulations.

text: All registered customer information shall be stored and maintained in the database  even after the customer cancels their account.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensuring Data Retention Compliance**

**Description:** As a data protection officer, I want to ensure that registered customer information is stored and maintained ethically in the database even after account cancellation, so that we respect customer privacy and comply with legal data retention regulations.

**Work:**

- Verify that the requirement to store customer information post-account cancellation is aligned with applicable data protection laws and regulations.
- Implement mechanisms to inform customers about their data retention and the reasons behind it in clear, understandable terms.
- Ensure the ability for customers to request data deletion or anonymization when legally permissible and document this process.
- Regularly audit the database to ensure compliance with privacy policies and to address risks of data exposure.
- Keep logs or records which track when and why data retention policies were applied to each customer account.

text: The owner shall have free access to all of the streaming movies.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Freedom and autonomy

Title: Unrestricted Access to Streaming Content for Owners

Description: As an owner of the streaming service, I want to have free access to all of the streaming movies so that I can exercise my autonomy in choosing and managing the content I wish to view without restrictions.

Work:
- Verify that the owner's account has an updated status granting full access to the streaming library.
- Ensure the owner's free access is maintained without interruptions across all compatible devices.
- Implement a clear mechanism for the owner to report any access issues for prompt resolution.
- Provide transparent communication about any content availability changes to the owner.
- Conduct regular reviews of the owner's access rights to ensure they align with their freedom and autonomy as the service owner.

text: Total lead cycle time must be completed in 5 minutes for 90% of lead volume between the business hours of 8AM CST to 8PM CST
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient Lead Processing

Description: As a Business Analyst, I want to ensure that lead cycles are processed within 5 minutes for 90% of the lead volume during business hours so that the company can provide timely responses to potential customers, maintaining operational efficiency and fairness in service delivery.

Work:
- Verify that the lead management system can handle the expected volume of leads seamlessly during business hours.
- Implement automated processes to prioritize and distribute leads efficiently within the designated timeframe.
- Ensure there are backup systems in place to handle unexpected spikes in lead volume.
- Conduct performance testing to confirm that 90% of lead processing consistently meets or exceeds the 5-minute target during the specified hours.
- Develop monitoring and alert systems to detect and address any delays in processing in real-time.
- Review and optimize resource allocation to maintain fairness in lead distribution during peak times.

text: No lead evaluation will complete in a time period longer than 25 seconds for 97% of all leads processed.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Timely Lead Processing for Efficient Service

Description: As a sales manager, I want the lead evaluation process to be completed in under 25 seconds for 97% of leads processed so that I can provide timely responses to potential clients and maintain efficient workflow operations.

Work:
- Evaluate and optimize the lead evaluation algorithm to improve processing speed.
- Conduct performance testing to ensure lead evaluations complete within the desired timeframe for 97% of cases.
- Implement monitoring tools to track the lead processing time continuously.
- Provide a detailed report of processing times and any outliers exceeding 25 seconds for adjustments.
- Ensure that system resources are adequately allocated to handle peak loads efficiently.

text: The process must fit within the processing time conditions set forth by the Auto Rep Assignment process in which a lead is assigned within 3 minutes of the total life cycle.
ethical_us:
Title: Timely Lead Assignment for Fair Opportunity

Description: As a Sales Manager, I want the lead assignment process to adhere to the specified 3-minute processing time, so that all sales representatives have a fair and equal opportunity to engage with new leads promptly.

Work:
- Ensure that the lead assignment system is capable of processing leads and assigning them within a strict 3-minute timeframe.
- Implement monitoring tools to track and report on the time taken for each lead assignment.
- Test the lead assignment process under different loads to guarantee consistent performance.
- Provide clear communication to all stakeholders about any potential delays or issues in the lead assignment process.
- Ensure that any failure to meet the 3-minute requirement is addressed immediately, with a contingency plan in place. 

The most relevant ethical principle for this requirement is "Justice and fairness". The requirement ensures that leads are assigned timely to all sales representatives, promoting fairness and equal opportunity in lead management.

text: The lead washing process will operate within the established physical web service structure.
ethical_us:
Title: Maintain Operational Integrity of the Lead Washing Process

Description: As an Operations Manager, I want to ensure that the lead washing process operates within the established physical web service structure to maintain accountability and reliability, complying with safety and environmental standards.

Work:
- Verify the integration of the lead washing process with the existing web service structure.
- Ensure that all safety and environmental protocols are documented and adhered to during operation.
- Implement a monitoring system for real-time performance tracking and immediate anomaly detection.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure process adherence to established standards and guidelines.
- Provide a mechanism for reporting and addressing any deviations from the accepted operational framework swiftly.

text: The washing process must use a non binding  neutral data format  such as xml  when receiving and processing lead data.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Data Interoperability with Neutral Formats

Description: As a data integration specialist, I want to use a non-binding neutral data format, such as XML, for receiving and processing lead data so that I can ensure transparency and compatibility across different systems.

Work:
- Verify that the system supports and can interpret XML formats for incoming lead data.
- Ensure that the processing pipeline accepts XML inputs and produces outputs that can be consistently understood by various stakeholders.
- Test the conversion of lead data from XML to any other required formats without data loss or misinterpretation.
- Document the data processing workflow, highlighting the use of XML and its benefits for transparency and interoperability.

text: Defect reports will be available to technical units on a 24x7 basis.
ethical_us:
Title: Continuous Access to Defect Reports for Transparent Operations

Description: As a technical team member, I want to have 24x7 access to defect reports so that I can ensure transparency in the system's operation and quickly address any issues that may arise.

Work:
- Ensure the defect reporting system is accessible at all times, without any downtime.
- Provide clear and organized defect reports that are easy for technical staff to understand.
- Implement automated notifications for new defect reports, available to technical team members.
- Ensure secure access protocols are in place to protect sensitive information within defect reports.
- Maintain an up-to-date log of all defect report views and actions taken for accountability purposes.

text: Washing parameters will be updated during scheduled maintenance hours.
ethical_us:
### Title: Scheduled Maintenance for Transparent Washing Parameter Updates

### Description:  
As a responsible user, I want washing parameters to be updated during scheduled maintenance hours, so that I can ensure fair and transparent updates and avoid unexpected changes that could disrupt processes and maintain trust in the system.

### Work:  
- The system will notify users in advance of scheduled maintenance times for updates.
- Updates will be logged and accessible for review to ensure transparency.  
- Ensure that all updates have been tested and verified before implementation.  
- Users will receive a summary of changes made to washing parameters post-update.  
- Monitor the system during maintenance to prevent unintended interruptions or errors.

text: The vendor will verify the invalid lead.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Justice and Fairness

Title: Validation of Leads to Ensure Fair Allocation

Description: As a sales manager, I want to verify the invalid leads so that there is a fair distribution of sales opportunities and resources among team members, avoiding favoritism or bias in lead allocation.

Work:
- Acceptance criteria:
  - Ensure that all captured leads are automatically flagged for validity checks before being assigned.
  - Implement a verification process to assess the validity of each lead based on pre-determined criteria.
  - Develop a system report to track the reasons for which leads are marked as invalid.
  - Provide an override option for sales managers to review and validate flagged leads manually if additional information is available.
  - Ensure that the verification process is transparent, providing clear documentation that outlines the criteria for lead validity.
  - Regularly review and update validation criteria to accommodate any changes in market conditions or business strategies.

text: Vendor will submit a credit validation record to be applied to the enterprise billing system.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Transparency in Credit Validation Submission

Description: As a billing system administrator, I want the vendor to submit a clear and comprehensive credit validation record to be integrated into the enterprise billing system, so that I can ensure transparency and accuracy in billing processes.

Work: 
- Ensure the credit validation record includes detailed information about the vendor, transaction, and validation process.
- Implement a standardized format for credit validation records to facilitate easy integration and review.
- Validate that the submitted credit validation record accurately reflects the vendor's activities and agreements.
- Provide a user-friendly interface for administrators to access and review the submitted records.
- Establish a communication channel for queries or clarifications regarding the submitted credit validation records.
- Conduct regular audits to verify the consistency and transparency of the credit validation process.

text: If a lead is scored to the high range the system will supply the lead data and score to the enterprise system.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Privacy in Lead Data Integration

Description: As a data privacy officer, I want to ensure that only necessary and relevant lead data and scores are supplied to the enterprise system so that individual privacy is protected and data misuse is prevented.

Work: 
- Verify that the system shares only the essential lead data needed for integration with the enterprise system.
- Implement data anonymization techniques where personal identifiers are not required.
- Ensure compliance with data protection regulations such as GDPR or CCPA in the transfer of lead data.
- Conduct regular audits on data access and sharing logs to prevent unauthorized access.
- Provide clear documentation and guidelines on what data is shared and why, maintaining transparency.

text: The leads washing functionality will validate all leads received by the web service for valid data
ethical_us:
Title: Valid Lead Data Assurance

Description: As a data quality analyst, I want the leads washing functionality to validate all leads received by the web service for valid data so that we can ensure accuracy and integrity in our customer information database.

Work:
- Verify that the leads washing functionality accurately checks each lead for data completeness and consistency.
- Ensure the system flags incomplete or incorrect data entries and provides a mechanism for correction.
- Validate that transformed data meets the defined standards for data quality and consistency.
- Confirm that a report is generated detailing which leads were validated successfully and which require further attention.
- Test the process to ensure it does not inadvertently remove or incorrectly alter valid data.

text: The leads washing functionality will insert all leads captured by the web service.
ethical_us:
Title: Ethical Handling of Lead Data in Web Services

Description: As a Marketing Data Analyst, I want to ensure that all leads captured by the web service are processed in a way that upholds the principles of justice and fairness, so that biased or unfair handling of data is avoided and all leads are given equal consideration and opportunities for engagement.

Work: 
- Verify that the lead washing functionality adheres to anti-discrimination protocols, ensuring equitable processing across all demographic categories.
- Implement checks to ensure that no algorithms used in processing lead data introduce bias based on gender, ethnicity, socioeconomic status, or any other protected characteristic.
- Ensure that data ingestion workflows are transparent and that any transformations applied to the data maintain the integrity and fairness of the original lead information.
- Provide clear documentation and explanations of how leads are processed to relevant stakeholders to promote understanding and accountability.
- Include a review mechanism for regularly auditing the lead processing system to identify and rectify any fairness issues that may arise.

text: If the leads score falls within the high average score then it will be process by the ARA functionality.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Ensure Fair Lead Processing through ARA Functionality

**Description:** As a data analyst, I want to ensure that high average score leads are processed equitably by the ARA functionality, so that all leads are treated fairly and without bias.

**Work:**
- Acceptance Criteria:
  1. Verify that the ARA functionality correctly processes leads with a high average score.
  2. Ensure that the algorithm setting the lead scores is free from bias and treats all leads justly.
  3. Validate that the scoring system used for ranking leads implements fairness across different demographic segments.
  4. Test the ARA functionality to confirm it operates transparently and consistently processes eligible leads according to the established criteria.
  5. Document the decision-making process within the ARA functionality to maintain transparency and accountability.

text: If the leads score falls within the medium average then it will be set for manual verification by an Enrollment Coordinator through the eleads system.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Justice and Fairness

Title: Ensure Fair Manual Verification of Medium-Scored Leads

Description: As an Enrollment Coordinator, I want to manually verify leads that fall within the medium average score, so that I can ensure fairness and objectivity in the enrollment process by preventing the algorithm from making potentially biased decisions.

Work: 
- Acceptance criteria:
  1. Identify leads with scores falling within the predefined medium average range.
  2. Notify Enrollment Coordinators about the leads requiring manual verification through the eleads system.
  3. Provide enrollment data and relevant details needed for a comprehensive manual review.
  4. Implement training for Enrollment Coordinators on unbiased decision-making and verification processes.
  5. Log all manual verification actions in the system for transparency and future audits.
  6. Ensure the eleads system is accessible and user-friendly for Enrollment Coordinators conducting manual verifications.

text: If the leads score falls within the low average then it will be returned to the supplying vendor
ethical_us:
Title: Fair Treatment of Supplied Leads

Description: As a data analyst working with AI-driven lead scoring, I want to ensure that leads that fall within the low average are returned to the supplying vendor fairly, so that the process is transparent and does not result in discrimination against certain vendors.

Work: 
- Acceptance criteria include:
  - Develop a clear and transparent criteria for identifying leads that fall within the low average.
  - Implement a review mechanism to reassess leads categorized as low average before returning them to the vendor.
  - Ensure vendors are provided with a transparent report explaining why specific leads were returned.
  - Validate that the lead scoring algorithm is free from biases that could unfairly categorize leads.
  - Ensure documentation is available regarding the lead scoring process to the vendors to foster understanding and trust.

text: The leads washing functionality will compile both contact and academic scoring information for a total score.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Scoring System for Leads

Description: As a marketing analyst, I want to ensure that the leads washing functionality transparently compiles both contact and academic scoring information into a total score, so that I can make informed decisions and maintain trust with potential clients.

Work:
- Acceptance Criterion 1: Clearly document the elements included in the contact and academic scoring components.
- Acceptance Criterion 2: Provide a transparent algorithm or formula used to compile the total score.
- Acceptance Criterion 3: Implement a user-friendly interface that allows users to view how each lead's information contributes to their total score.
- Acceptance Criterion 4: Ensure compliance with data protection regulations when processing and displaying personal and academic information.
- Acceptance Criterion 5: Validate the scoring process to ensure accuracy and fairness in the total scores generated.

text: The leads washing functionality will use the parameters supplied by corporate and schools to score part of the lead.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Justice and Fairness

Title: Ensuring Fairness in Lead Scoring

Description: As a data analyst, I want to ensure that the leads washing functionality uses parameters that are fair and unbiased so that the resulting lead scores do not discriminate and are equitable across all demographics.

Work: 
- Review and document the parameters supplied by corporate and schools for lead scoring to identify potential biases.
- Ensure the lead scoring algorithm incorporates fairness checks and reflects equitable scoring criteria.
- Test the lead scoring process with diverse sample data sets to assess neutrality across different demographic segments.
- Include documentation that explains how the parameters affect the lead scoring and demonstrates the fairness of the outcomes.
- Set up a periodic review process to revisit and update parameters and algorithms to align with ethical and fairness standards.

text: The leads washing functionality will return the lead data supplied to the vendor along with the reason of rejection.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Lead Rejection Feedback

Description: As a vendor, I want to receive the lead data supplied along with the reason for rejection so that I can understand and improve our data quality.

Work: 
- Ensure the system returns all lead data provided by the vendor in the original submission.
- Include a clear, understandable reason for each lead's rejection.
- Ensure that the reason for rejection is communicated in an unambiguous and standardized format.
- Provide documentation or guidelines on how vendors can improve data to avoid rejection.
- Implement a logging mechanism to track all feedback communications for auditing purposes.
- Confirm that the feedback process aligns with regulatory compliance and organizational policies on transparency.

text: The leads washing functionality will have an interface in which lead data parameters can be maintained.
ethical_us:
Based on the requirement provided, the principle of **Transparency** is most relevant, as it involves the need for clear and understandable communication of data parameters within an interface. Ensuring the user can easily interpret and manage lead data aligns with making the system transparent and understandable.

Title: Transparent Lead Data Management Interface  

Description: As a data manager, I want to maintain lead data parameters in a clear and accessible interface so that I can ensure all information is up-to-date and accurately reflects our operations.  

Work:  
- The interface should provide a clear view of all lead data parameters.  
- Parameter fields must have labels and tooltips for clarity and understanding.  
- Include documentation with examples for maintaining and updating data.  
- Provide a log of changes made to the data parameters for audit purposes.  
- Implement user feedback options for interface improvements.  
- Ensure that the interface is compatible with accessibility standards for all users.

text: The leads washing functionality will verify the users authentication and rights to make parameter updates.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Access to Parameter Updates

Description: As a system administrator, I want to verify users’ authentication and rights to make parameter updates so that only authorized personnel can modify system configurations and ensure data security.

Work:
- Ensure that the authentication system is integrated and functioning correctly to validate user identities.
- Implement role-based access controls to restrict parameter updates to authorized users.
- Log all parameter update activities to monitor changes and detect potential unauthorized access.
- Test the authentication and authorization processes to verify that only users with sufficient rights can make updates.
- Provide training for system administrators on managing user rights and authentication checks.

text: The leads washing functionality will store any potential lead duplicates returned by the enterprise system.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Privacy

Title: Secure Handling of Potential Lead Duplicates

Description: As a Data Privacy Officer, I want to ensure that any potential lead duplicates returned by the enterprise system are stored securely and with proper safeguards so that individual privacy is protected and no personal data is exposed unnecessarily.

Work:
- Ensure that storage of lead duplicates complies with the company's data protection policies.
- Implement encryption for stored lead duplicates to prevent unauthorized access.
- Establish clear guidelines on how long lead duplicates are retained and when they should be deleted.
- Set up access control mechanisms to ensure only authorized personnel can view or manage lead duplicates.
- Conduct a privacy impact assessment to ensure no potential privacy risks are overlooked.

text: Prior to submitting the lead to the enterprise system the leads washing functionality will assign the lead to an admissions rep.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Fairness and Transparency in Lead Assignment

Description: As a marketing analyst, I want the lead washing functionality to transparently and fairly assign leads to admissions representatives so that there is no bias or unfair treatment in the distribution of leads, and each representative gets an equal opportunity to engage with potential students.

Work:
1. The lead washing functionality must log and provide a clear rationale for each lead assignment decision, accessible to authorized users.
