- Regularly update the website with the latest information and ensure outdated content is removed or revised.
- Include a feature for users to provide feedback or ask questions about the information presented to continually improve transparency and user understanding.

text: All information must be updatable on the website.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Transparency in Information Updates on the Website

**Description**: As a website administrator, I want the ability to update all information on the website so that users can access the most accurate and current data, ensuring transparency and trust in our platform.

**Work**:
- Ensure all information fields on the website can be edited and updated by authorized personnel.
- Implement a revision history feature to track changes made to information on the website.
- Create a notification system to inform users of significant updates to critical information.
- Develop a user-friendly interface for administrators to manage updates efficiently.
- Ensure updates are reflected in real-time to avoid any discrepancies.
- Establish a review process to verify the accuracy of updated information before it goes live.

text: It must allow a user to download a backup of their medical information.
ethical_us:
Title: Empowering Users with Access to Their Medical Information

Description: As a patient, I want to download a backup of my medical information so that I can have control over my personal healthcare data and ensure my access to important health records whenever needed.

Work:
- The system must provide a clear and easily accessible option for downloading medical information.
- The downloaded data should be in a common, readable format (e.g., PDF, CSV).
- Users must be able to select specific data to include in the download if desired.
- The process should be secure, requiring authentication to access the download option.
- The system must offer guidance on how to securely store or share the downloaded data.
- Logging and audit trails should maintain records of data downloads for security purposes, without compromising user privacy. 

Ethical Principle: Privacy. This user story aligns with the principle of privacy, ensuring users have the right to access and control their personal medical information while maintaining data security and confidentiality.

text: Logout must be automatic after 1 hour of inactivity.
ethical_us:
Title: Automatic Session Timeout for Enhanced Privacy

Description: As a security-conscious user, I want the system to automatically log me out after 1 hour of inactivity so that my personal data remains confidential and protected from unauthorized access.

Work: 
- Implement a session timer that tracks user inactivity.
- Automatically terminate user sessions after 1 hour of inactivity.
- Provide a user notification prior to logout warning them of impending session termination.
- Ensure session termination is secure and all associated resources are properly released.
- Test the feature for consistency across different devices and browsers.

text: Full data backups must be created daily.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Data Integrity Through Daily Backups

Description: As a data manager, I want to ensure that full data backups are created daily so that the integrity and security of the system's data are maintained, and potential data loss is avoided, reinforcing stakeholder trust.

Work:
- Verify that the backup system is configured to perform full data backups every 24 hours.
- Ensure that backup processes do not disrupt regular system operations or performance.
- Confirm the successful completion of daily backups through automated notifications or logs.
- Test restored backups routinely to ensure data integrity and reliability.
- Securely store backup copies in a separate and safe location to prevent data loss due to hardware failure, cyberattacks, or disasters.
- Maintain encryption and other necessary security measures to protect backed-up data. 

This user story is most related to the ethical principle of Trust, as having reliable data backups helps build trust by ensuring data is preserved accurately and securely.

text: A user must be logged on to be able to view or edit any medical information.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Access to Medical Information

Description: As a healthcare professional, I want to ensure that a user must be logged on to view or edit any medical information so that patient privacy is protected and unauthorized access is prevented.

Work: 
- Verify that login credentials are required before accessing any medical information.
- Ensure that logging mechanisms are in place to track access and changes to medical records.
- Implement session timeouts to automatically log out users after periods of inactivity.
- Test for all possible entry points to confirm that login is enforced on all accesses to medical information.
- Conduct audit checks to ensure only authorized users have access to specific medical data.

text: Each account must securely store all of its data.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Data Storage for User Privacy

Description: As a user, I want my account data to be securely stored so that my personal information is protected against unauthorized access and potential breaches, ensuring my right to privacy.

Work:

- Ensure all stored data is encrypted both in transit and at rest to safeguard against unauthorized access.
- Implement robust authentication mechanisms to control access to user data.
- Regularly update security protocols to align with the latest industry standards.
- Conduct periodic security audits and vulnerability assessments to identify and rectify potential risks.
- Provide users with clear communication regarding data storage practices and their security measures.
- Implement a data breach response plan, including notifying users promptly if their data is compromised.

text: Each account must have a separate identifying account number.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Privacy with Unique Account Identifiers

Description: As a user of the system, I want each account to have a separate identifying account number so that my personal information remains secure and private from unauthorized access.

Work:
- Every user account must generate a unique account number upon creation.
- The account number should be securely stored and transmitted using encryption.
- The account number must not reveal any personal information of the account holder.
- Ensure that the system prevents any duplication of account numbers.
- Regularly audit and test the security of the account number storage and retrieval processes.

text: The system shall allow user to choose filling that they want.
ethical_us:
Title: Empower User Choice in Filling Selection

- Ensure that the interface is user-friendly and accessible to people with disabilities.
- Allow users to preview their selection before finalizing the choice.
- The system should confirm the user's selection and provide an option to modify it before checkout.
- Collect feedback on the selection process to improve future user experiences.

text: The system shall allow user to choose their preferable topping.

Title: Empowering User Choice in Topping Selection

- Ensure the system stores and processes users' topping selections accurately without errors.
- Provide confirmation of selected toppings before finalizing the order.
- Include an option for users to provide feedback on the topping selection process.

text: The system shall allow user to decorate their doughnut.

Title: Empower Users with Doughnut Decoration Options

- Confirm that the decoration feature is intuitive and user-friendly, allowing for a seamless customization process.
- Test that user selections are accurately reflected on the final product before completion.
- Ensure that user data related to decoration choices is handled with privacy and security in mind.

text: The system shall give the user an opportunity for the user to choose the selection of doughnut provided.
ethical_us:
Title: Empowering Users with Doughnut Selection Options

Description: As a doughnut enthusiast, I want to have the freedom to choose the type of doughnut I am provided with so that I can enjoy a personalized and satisfying experience.

1. The system should present a clear and diverse selection of doughnut options to the user.

4. Ensure the user interface is intuitive and accessible for all users to make selections effortlessly.
5. Provide information about each doughnut option, including ingredients and dietary information, to aid informed decision-making.
6. Validate the selection process to prevent errors and ensure user autonomy in choices.

text: The system should take the customer name.
ethical_us:

**Work:**
- Ensure that customer names are collected securely and stored with encryption.
- Implement access controls to prevent unauthorized access to customer names.
- Provide transparency on how customer names will be used and obtain consent from customers before collection.
- Review data retention policies to limit how long customer names are kept.
- Conduct regular audits and compliance checks to ensure privacy standards are maintained.

text: The system should keep the customer contact number.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Privacy of Customer Contact Details

Description: As a customer, I want my contact number to be securely stored and protected so that my privacy is respected and my personal data is not misused.

Work:

- Access to contact numbers should be restricted to authorized personnel only.
- Implement a logging system to track access and modifications to stored contact numbers.
- Ensure customers are informed about how their contact number will be used and stored.
- Regularly update the security protocols to safeguard customer contact information against breaches.

text: The system should keep the customer email.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Privacy

Title: Secure Storage of Customer Email

Description: As a customer, I want the system to securely store my email address so that my personal information is protected and my privacy is maintained.

- Ensure the database is encrypted to protect stored email addresses.

text: The system should ask the user to key in the pickup date.

Work:

text: The system use SSL (secured socket layer) in all transactions that include any confidential customer information.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Secure Customer Transactions with SSL

Description: As a privacy-conscious user, I want the system to use SSL (secured socket layer) in all transactions that include any confidential customer information so that my personal data remains protected and private throughout the communication process.

Work:
- Ensure SSL certificates are installed and configured on all servers handling confidential customer information.
- Set up automatic renewal of SSL certificates to prevent expiration-related vulnerabilities.
- Implement backend validation to confirm that SSL is actively used in every transaction involving confidential data.
- Conduct regular security audits to verify SSL compliance and identify potential vulnerabilities.
- Provide users with visual indicators (e.g., a padlock symbol) confirming the use of SSL during transactions.

text: The system must automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity.
ethical_us:
Title: Auto-Logout for Inactivity to Protect Privacy

Description: As a security-conscious user, I want the system to automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity so that my personal data remains secure and private even if I forget to log out manually.

Work:
- Implement a timer to track user inactivity across the system.
- Configure the system to automatically log out the user after a specified period of inactivity (e.g., 15 minutes).
- Display a warning message to the user before the automatic logout, allowing them a chance to extend their session if needed.
- Ensure that all active sessions are terminated upon automatic logout to prevent unauthorized access.
- Test the logout functionality across different devices and browsers to ensure consistency and reliability.

ethical_us:

Work:

- Implement encryption for any sensitive data that might necessitate temporary storage.
- Conduct security testing to ensure no cookies contain sensitive user information.
- Regularly update the system’s cookie management practices to adhere to the latest privacy standards.
- Provide clear communication to users about how their data is managed and protected.

text: The system’s back-end servers shall only be accessible to authenticated administrators.
ethical_us:
**Title: Secured Access for Authorized Administrators**

**Description:** As an **IT Security Officer**, I want to ensure that the system’s back-end servers are only accessible to authenticated administrators so that we can protect sensitive data and maintain system integrity.

**Work:**
- Implement multi-factor authentication for administrator access.

- Regularly update authentication protocols to address emerging security threats.
- Conduct routine audits to ensure that only authorized personnel have access.

**Ethical Principle: Trust**

text: Sensitive data will be encrypted before being sent over insecure connections like the internet.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Data Privacy through Encryption

Description: As a data security officer, I want to ensure that sensitive data is encrypted before being sent over insecure connections like the internet so that user privacy is protected and personal data is not intercepted or accessed by unauthorized parties.

Work: 
- Verify that encryption protocols are implemented for all outgoing data over insecure connections.
- Test the encryption process to ensure data integrity and confidentiality during transmission.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with privacy regulations and data protection guidelines.
- Provide training and documentation for staff to understand the importance of encryption and data privacy.

text: The system provides storage of all databases on redundant computers with automatic switchover.
ethical_us:
Title: Reliable Data Storage through Redundancy

Description: As a data administrator, I want the system to store all databases on redundant computers with an automatic switchover so that data availability and integrity are maintained during hardware failures or maintenance, ensuring the trustworthiness of the system.

Work:
- Implement a redundant server infrastructure that mirrors all database operations in real-time.
- Develop an automatic switchover mechanism that activates the backup server instantly in case of a primary server failure.
- Conduct routine tests and drills to ensure the switchover process functions seamlessly without data loss or corruption.
- Provide comprehensive logs and alerts for system administrators during switchover events.
- Ensure compliance with industry standards for data redundancy and protection.

text: The reliability of the overall program depends on the reliability of the separate components. The main pillar of reliability of the system is the backup of the database which is continuously maintained and updated to reflect the most recent changes.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Database Backup Reliability for Trust

Description: As a data manager, I want to ensure the database backup is continuously maintained and updated so that I can trust the reliability of the overall program and guarantee data integrity.

Work: 
- Verify that the database backup system is functioning correctly and is integrated seamlessly with the main program.
- Confirm that backups are scheduled at regular intervals and changes are captured accurately.
- Ensure there is a recovery plan in place, documented and tested, in case of data loss or corruption.
- Maintain logs of all backup activities and changes for accountability and auditing purposes.
- Provide training sessions for staff on the significance of regular backups and data integrity measures.

text: An end-user may use this system on any OS
ethical_us:

**Work:**

text: The logo and the current basic design of registration system should be displayed. The system should be attractive according to the clients. The design and the color should make users feel comfortable when using the system instead of flashing useless colors on the screen. The design should also reflect the seriousness of the environment.
ethical_us:
Title: Comfortable and Serious Registration System Design

Description: As a registered user, I want the registration system to have an attractive and comfortable design that reflects the seriousness of the environment, so that I feel confident and undistracted while using the system.

Work:
- Ensure the design is visually appealing and meets client satisfaction.
- Use color schemes that promote comfort and do not distract users.
- Avoid flashing or overly vibrant colors that do not serve a purpose.
- Incorporate design elements that convey the seriousness and professionalism of the environment.
- Review designs with sample users to ensure comfort and appropriateness.
- Include the logo and maintain a basic design consistent with branding guidelines. 

Ethical Principle: Dignity - This user story aligns with human dignity as it respects the users' inherent worth by creating an environment that promotes comfort and professionalism, ensuring users feel valued and respected during their interaction with the system.

text: The system should be able to manage all the information incoming from the database and the catalogue.
ethical_us:
Title: "Efficient and Responsible Data Management"

Description: As a database administrator, I want to efficiently manage all the information incoming from the database and the catalogue so that data integrity and system performance are maintained without compromising ethical standards.

Work:
- Acceptance Criteria:
  1. Ensure that the data management process is transparent and understandable for all stakeholders.
  2. Implement mechanisms to validate and verify the accuracy of incoming data.
  3. Regularly update and synchronize data from both the database and the catalogue to ensure consistency.
  4. Implement security measures to protect the data from unauthorized access or misuse.
  5. Monitor the system for any irregularities in data processing and address any issues promptly.
  6. Provide clear documentation on data handling procedures for transparency and accountability.
  7. Ensure that any automated processes involved in data management are explainable to users.
  
The ethical principle most related to this requirement is Transparency, as it involves ensuring that data handling and management processes are clear, understandable, and trustworthy.

text: The product is Web based therefore it will be used in any environment that allows Web access.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Justice and Fairness in Web Access

Work:
1. Verify that the web-based product is fully operational across various devices and internet speeds to accommodate different environments.
2. Conduct accessibility testing to ensure compatibility with assistive technologies for users with disabilities.
3. Implement language options to cater to a diverse user base, considering global access.
4. Ensure compliance with relevant accessibility standards and guidelines.
5. Regularly review user feedback to identify potential barriers and optimize access for all users.

text: For the system to successfully operate the registration system should be integrated with other IT services and the portal.

Work:
- Ensure the registration system is compatible with existing IT services and the portal.
- Implement secure and reliable data exchange protocols between the registration system and other IT services.
- Verify that the integration supports user authentication and authorization seamlessly.
- Conduct thorough testing to ensure the system operates without errors or delays during registration.
- Provide clear documentation and support for users navigating the integrated systems.

Selected Ethical Principle: Transparency

Explanation: Transparency is crucial when integrating systems, as users need to understand how their data flows between services, ensuring their experience is smooth and avoiding potential confusion or misuse.

text: The system should need to be entirely self-supporting since the users would be using it only to register courses.

Work:

text: The Web interface should be compatible with standards in order to be usable via all major Web browsers in a wide variety of environments.
ethical_us:

Work:

- Verify the interface's performance in various environments, including different operating systems (Windows, macOS, Linux) and devices (desktops, tablets, smartphones).
- Implement responsive design principles to guarantee accessibility across various screen sizes and resolutions.
- Conduct accessibility testing to ensure compliance with WCAG guidelines, promoting inclusivity for users with disabilities.

text: Everyone (stakeholders and guests) can have access to the system and the catalogue. Every client must have secure and private access to his/her data. The  and the service man can have access to every part of the system. All these accesses (except the “guest tour” access) require identification through ID and password.
ethical_us:
**Title: Secure and Private Access for Stakeholders and Guests**

**Description:** As a system user, I want to have secure and private access to my personal data through identification (ID and password) so that my privacy is maintained and I can trust the system with my information.

**Related Ethical Principle: Privacy**

**Work:**
- Ensure user authentication requires a valid ID and password.
- Implement encryption methods for storing and transmitting user data.
- Create separate access levels, including guest access, stakeholder access, and service access, ensuring only authorized access to different parts of the system.
- Regularly update and audit access control protocols to prevent unauthorized access.
- Provide users with a clear and understandable privacy policy outlining data use and protection methods.
- Allow users to update and manage their authentication credentials securely.

text: The system will develop a security system that will reduce to the minimum the possibility of corruption from systems and/or humans.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Trust

Title: Ensure System Integrity and Trustworthiness

Description: As a system administrator, I want to develop a security system that minimizes the possibility of corruption from both systems and humans so that all stakeholders can trust in the integrity and reliability of the system.

Work: 
- Evaluate existing security measures to identify potential loopholes and vulnerabilities.
- Implement advanced encryption techniques to safeguard data against unauthorized access.
- Develop a robust access control system to ensure that only authorized users can perform critical actions.
- Conduct regular audits and vulnerability assessments to detect and address any potential threats.
- Provide training and resources to staff to ensure they understand and adhere to security protocols.
- Create a transparent reporting mechanism for any security incidents or breaches to ensure accountability.

text: The Operational Interface shall have a Mean Time Between Failures of no less than 7 days.
ethical_us:
Title: Reliable Operational Interface for Consistent Functionality

Description: As a system operator, I want the Operational Interface to have a Mean Time Between Failures of no less than 7 days so that I can ensure a consistent and uninterrupted service experience for users and maintain trust in the system's reliability.

Work:
- Verify that the system design and architecture support a Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) of at least 7 days.
- Implement redundancy and failover mechanisms where necessary to prevent downtime.
- Conduct regular stress testing and debugging to identify and address potential issues before they cause failures.
- Establish a robust monitoring system to promptly detect and respond to system anomalies.
- Document maintenance schedules and procedures to sustain the system’s reliability.
- Review and update system reliability metrics and logs at regular intervals to identify trends or shifts in performance.

text: The system shall be available 99.5% of the time.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring System Availability for User Trust

Description: As a system user, I want the system to be available 99.5% of the time so that I can trust in its reliability and uninterrupted service.

Work:
- Ensure the system infrastructure is robust and capable of handling expected loads.
- Implement redundancy mechanisms to mitigate system failures or downtimes.
- Monitor system uptime continuously to identify and address any issues promptly.
- Conduct regular maintenance and updates to prevent unexpected outages.
- Provide clear communication to users about planned downtimes and unexpected disruptions to maintain transparency and trust.

text: The software system needs a robust security mechanism in place so that unauthorized users are not allowed access to parts of the system.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Secure Access to the Software System

Description: As a Security Manager, I want to implement a robust security mechanism so that unauthorized users are not allowed access to parts of the system, ensuring data protection and maintaining confidentiality.

Work: 
- Verify that authentication mechanisms (e.g., username/password, multi-factor authentication) are in place and functioning correctly.
- Ensure that user roles and permissions are clearly defined and enforced within the system.
- Test the system for vulnerabilities and resolve any identified issues to prevent unauthorized access.
- Implement logging and monitoring tools to detect and alert on unauthorized access attempts.
- Conduct regular security audits and updates to maintain the integrity of the security mechanisms.
- Ensure compliance with relevant legal, industry, and organizational security standards and policies.

text: Each user shall either be trusted or not trusted.
ethical_us:
**Title: Enhancing Trust Through User Assessment**

**Description:** As a security administrator, I want to ensure that each user is accurately assessed as either trusted or not trusted, so that the system maintains high integrity and security for all users.

**Work:**
- Implement a robust mechanism for assessing user trustworthiness based on predefined criteria.
- Ensure the assessment process is transparent and explainable to gain user trust and confidence.
- Regularly update the trust criteria to adapt to new security challenges and risks.
- Allow users to view and understand the factors influencing their trust status.
- Facilitate a feedback mechanism for users to contest or question their trust assessment if needed.

text: All source code and development related documents shall be controlled under a version control system.

**Work**:

- Ensure all source code is committed to a shared version control repository.
- Document all changes made to the source code with clear commit messages.
- Maintain a history of all versions of documents and code to allow for traceability.
- Train development team members on best practices for using version control systems.
- Provide access to version control logs to authorized auditors or stakeholders.

text: All source code shall adhere to an agreed upon and well-defined set of coding standards for each development language used.
ethical_us:

**Work:**
- Ensure coding standards are clearly documented and accessible to the development team.
- Conduct training sessions for all developers to familiarize them with the agreed-upon coding standards.
- Implement automated tools to enforce coding standards during the development process.
- Review and update coding standards regularly to accommodate new language features or techniques.
- Include a step in the code review process to check for adherence to the coding standards.
- Create a feedback mechanism for developers to suggest improvements or discuss challenges related to the coding standards.

text: Since the software must run on several popular hardware platforms and the goal is to achieve a reasonable level of platform independence.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Sustainability

Title: Ensuring Sustainable Platform Independence

Description: As a software developer, I want the software to be platform-independent so that it can run efficiently on various popular hardware platforms, minimizing resource waste and enhancing longevity across different devices.

Work: 
- Conduct a feasibility analysis to identify all popular hardware platforms that the software needs to support.
- Develop a modular architecture that allows for flexibility and adaptability across different platforms.
- Test the software on a variety of hardware platforms to ensure compatibility and performance.
- Implement efficient resource management to optimize software performance across platforms.
- Create documentation and guidelines for maintaining platform independence in future updates and revisions.
- Regularly update the software to support new hardware platforms and deprecate support for obsolete ones, maintaining a balance between inclusivity and practical resource allocation.

text: High level of performance requires high speed network and high level of connectivity.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Connectivity for High Performance

Description: As a network-dependent user, I want access to a high-speed network and robust connectivity so that I can maintain optimal performance levels and work efficiently without interruptions.

Work: 
- Conduct a comprehensive assessment of existing network infrastructure to identify potential bottlenecks impacting speed and connectivity.
- Implement upgrades to network hardware and software to support high-speed data transmission.
- Monitor network performance continuously to identify and address connectivity issues in real-time.
- Provide users with clear guidelines and support for optimizing their own connectivity setups.
- Ensure compliance with industry standards for network security and access to safeguard data and maintain performance integrity. 

This user story relates to the principle of Responsibility because it involves ensuring reliable access and infrastructure to meet performance needs, reflecting the integrity and accountability necessary from developers and stakeholders managing the technology.

text: The available server must be reliable and the network connectivity in the supermarket should be proper for smooth flow of all operations and data.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Reliable Connectivity and Operations in Supermarket Systems

Description: As a supermarket manager, I want to ensure that our server is reliable and network connectivity is optimal so that the operational flow and data management are smooth and uninterrupted.

Work: 
- Verify that the server uptime meets or exceeds a 99.9% reliability standard.
- Conduct regular maintenance checks on the server to prevent unexpected downtimes.
- Ensure that the network infrastructure supports high-speed data transfer without interruptions.
- Implement a failover system to automatically switch to a backup server in case of primary server failure.
- Test connectivity regularly to identify and address potential bottlenecks in data flow.
- Document and communicate all network and server reliability measures to relevant staff.

text: Every user of the software is provided a unique login ID and a password which is stored in the database hashed by SHA2 algorithm.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure User Authentication and Privacy Protection

Description: As a software user, I want my login ID and password to be securely stored and protected so that my personal information and privacy are not compromised.

Work: 
- Ensure that each user is provided with a unique login ID.
- Implement a secure password creation process for users.
- Utilize the SHA2 algorithm to hash and securely store passwords in the database.
- Regularly update and audit the password hashing process to ensure continued security.
- Provide users with guidance on creating strong, secure passwords.
- Ensure that security protocols for login information comply with industry standards for privacy protection. 

Ethical Principle: This user story aligns with the ethical principle of Privacy, as it focuses on safeguarding the personal data of users by securely storing their login credentials, thereby upholding their privacy and protecting them from unauthorized access.

text: The software is available for use from the supermarket opening time to the closing time.
ethical_us:
**Title: Continuous Access to Supermarket Services for Customer Convenience**

**Description:** As a supermarket customer, I want the software to be available for use from the supermarket opening time to the closing time so that I can ensure I have convenient access to services like shopping assistance and self-checkout without interruption.

**Work:**
- Ensure the software system is scheduled to activate automatically at the supermarket's opening time.
- Implement monitoring systems to guarantee the software remains operational during all opening hours.
- Develop a procedure for rapid resolution of any issues or downtime that might arise during operational hours.
- Test the system to ensure no connectivity or functionality issues occur from opening to closing time.
- Provide a mechanism for customers to report any access issues immediately.

text: The system shall accommodate high number of items and users without any fault.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring System Reliability and Scalability for User Trust

Description: As a system developer, I want to ensure that the system can accommodate a high number of items and users without any faults so that users can trust its reliability and effectiveness even during peak usage times.

Work:
- Conduct load testing to determine the system's capacity and identify potential bottlenecks.
- Implement robust error-handling mechanisms to prevent system faults under high load.
- Optimize database queries and system architecture for scalability.
- Monitor system performance in real-time to pre-emptively address issues before they affect users.
- Ensure regular updates and maintenance to accommodate evolving user demand and technological advancements.
- Provide clear documentation and communication to users about system capabilities and limitations.

text: System will use secured database
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Data Security and Trust in Systems

Description: As a data protection officer, I want to ensure that the system uses a secured database so that users' data is protected against unauthorized access and builds trust in our services.

Work:
- Verify that the database is encrypted both at rest and in transit.
- Conduct regular security audits and vulnerability assessments on the database.
- Implement role-based access control to ensure only authorized personnel can access sensitive data.
- Ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations and standards.
- Document and communicate security protocols to relevant stakeholders.
- Set up monitoring and alerts for any unauthorized access attempts.

text: Normal users can just read information but they cannot edit or modify anything except their personal and some other information.
ethical_us:
Certainly! The requirement "Normal users can just read information but they cannot edit or modify anything except their personal and some other information" is most related to the ethical principle of **Privacy**. This principle ensures that users have control over their personal information while protecting it from unauthorized changes.

Here's the transformed requirement into an ethical user story based on the principle of Privacy:

Title: Users' Personal Data Privacy Management

Description: As a normal user, I want to have the ability to read all available information and modify only my personal information and certain allowed data so that my privacy is protected while maintaining control over my personal data.

Work:
- Ensure normal users have read-only access to all information except for their personal data.
- Implement edit functionality exclusively for users' personal information and other permitted data categories.
- Provide clear instructions on what data users are allowed to modify.
- Set up logging to track attempted edits to unauthorized sections for auditing purposes.
- Verify that access controls are enforced and periodically reviewed to prevent unauthorized data modifications.

text: System will have different types of users and every user has access constraints.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Privacy

Title: Implement User Access Constraints to Protect Data Privacy

Description: As a system administrator, I want to implement access constraints for different types of users so that the privacy of personal data is maintained and unauthorized access is prevented.

Work: 
- Define different user roles and levels of access based on the sensitivity of the data.
- Implement authentication mechanisms to ensure only authorized users can log in.
- Set up role-based access control to restrict access to data based on user roles.
- Regularly review and update access permissions to comply with privacy policies.
- Provide audit logging to track access and changes made by users in the system.
- Conduct user training sessions on privacy policies and the importance of data protection.

text: Control the database and keep track of all records of customers and employee details.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Privacy

Title: Ensure Privacy in Database Management for Customer and Employee Information

Description: As a data administrator, I want to control the database and keep track of all records of customer and employee details so that individuals' privacy is protected and unauthorized access is prevented.

Work: 
- Implement access controls to restrict who can view and modify customer and employee records.
- Encrypt sensitive data both at rest and in transit to protect against unauthorized access.
- Ensure audit trails are in place to monitor access to customer and employee details.
- Regularly update security protocols to safeguard against emerging threats.
- Provide regular privacy training for all employees handling personal data.
- Obtain informed consent from customers and employees regarding data collection and storage policies.

text: Contact with the vendors and give permission to sell their product under the site after testing the product’s quality.
ethical_us:
Title: Vendor Product Transparency and Quality Assurance

Description: As a marketplace manager, I want to ensure transparency and quality by only allowing vendors to sell their products on the site after those products have been tested for quality, so that customers can trust the products they purchase and have a positive experience.

Work: 
- Develop a standardized process for evaluating vendor product quality.
- Establish clear criteria and guidelines for product testing.
- Implement a communication system to inform vendors of the testing process and criteria.
- Create a feedback mechanism for continuous improvement based on testing outcomes.
- Ensure all vendor products meet the established quality standards before being listed on the site.

text: View the details of all employees and control the whole site.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Privacy

Title: Ensure Privacy in Employee Data Access

Description: As a site manager, I want to view the details of all employees cautiously, so that I respect and protect their personal privacy.

Work:
- Implement access controls that restrict viewing employee details to authorized personnel only.
- Ensure data logging to track and audit who accesses employee information.
- Provide clear guidelines and training on data privacy for all personnel with access privileges.
- Incorporate data anonymization measures where detailed personal information is not necessary.
- Regularly review and update data access policies to comply with privacy laws and regulations.

text: Customers must have a valid login id to enter into the site.
ethical_us:
**Title: Secure and Private Access for Site Entry**

**Description:** As a website user, I want to have a valid login ID to enter the site so that my personal information is kept secure and my privacy is respected.

**Work:**

- Implement secure authentication mechanisms to verify the user's login ID.
- Ensure encryption of data during login to protect user credentials.
- Provide users with the ability to recover their login credentials securely.
- Design the login process to comply with privacy regulations such as GDPR.
- Regularly update and test the security measures to protect against unauthorized access.
- Offer clear communication regarding how user data is used and stored during the login process.

text: New users can sign up by creating new ID.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Privacy

Title: New User Secure Sign-Up Process

Description: As a potential new user, I want to securely create a new ID so that my personal information is protected during the sign-up process.

Work: 
- Ensure data encryption is applied to all personal information submitted during sign-up.
- Implement a privacy policy that clearly explains how user data will be stored, used, and shared.
- Provide users with options to control their data, including opting in or out of data collection practices.
- Validate the user sign-up process to prevent unauthorized access or data breaches.
- Conduct regular privacy audits to ensure compliance with privacy standards and regulations.

text: Can view all available products and can compare them and make a choice for purchasing products.
ethical_us:
**Title: Enhancing Consumer Autonomy in Product Selection**

**Description:** As a consumer, I want to view all available products and compare them easily so that I can make informed choices and exercise my freedom and autonomy in purchasing decisions.

**Work:**
- Ensure a comprehensive list of all available products is displayed with accurate details.
- Provide a comparison feature that allows side-by-side evaluation of product features, prices, and reviews.
- Ensure the interface is user-friendly and accessible to all users, facilitating independent decision-making.
- Include transparent descriptions and specifications for each product.
- Guarantee that all information is current and reliable to support consumer autonomy.
- Implement necessary updates in real-time to reflect accurate product availability.

text: Can purchase any product through valid credit card.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Secure and Fair Credit Card Purchases

Description: As a customer, I want to purchase any product using my valid credit card so that I can transact securely and fairly without any discrimination or unauthorized use.

Work: 
- Verify credit card details securely without storing sensitive information unencrypted.
- Ensure the payment process complies with PCI DSS (Payment Card Industry Data Security Standard) to protect user information.
- Implement checks to prevent credit card fraud and unauthorized transactions.
- Provide customers with clear and transparent information about transaction processing and handling of their financial data.
- Apply consistent rules to prevent any discriminatory practices in credit card acceptance.
- Notify customers immediately in case of a failed transaction or security breach.

text: Can give feedback to the 24X7 Customer Care Service center about their impression for the site and services.
ethical_us:
Title: Facilitate User Feedback for Transparency

Description: As a site user, I want to provide feedback to the 24X7 Customer Care Service center, so that my experiences and impressions of the site and services can be communicated and potentially used for improvements.

Work:
- Implement a feedback form accessible to all users after interaction with customer care.
- Ensure the feedback system is easy to navigate and understand.
- Provide a confirmation message once feedback is submitted, assuring users that their input will be considered.
- Enable the user to submit feedback anonymously if desired, respecting user privacy.
- Create a system for users to receive responses or updates regarding their feedback, if they choose to be informed.
- Train customer care representatives to process and address feedback constructively and transparently.

text: Customer must logout of the site after purchasing products.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Secure Session Termination Post-Purchase

Description: As a customer, I want to be automatically logged out of the site after purchasing products so that my personal and payment information remains secure and protected from unauthorized access.

Work:
- Implement automatic logout functionality for customers upon completion of purchase.
- Ensure that all user sessions are properly terminated with no residual data remaining in browser cache.
- Conduct security testing to confirm that unauthorized users cannot access active sessions post-purchase.
- Provide a clear notification to the user upon logout to confirm that the session has ended securely.

text: Can only visit the site without registration.
ethical_us:
Title: Access without Registration for User Privacy

Description: As an anonymous user, I want to be able to visit the site without registering so that my personal data is protected and my privacy is respected.

Work: 
- Ensure site allows full functionality access without requiring user registration.
- Verify that no personal data is collected or stored when visiting the site anonymously.
- Ensure that users are clearly informed about optional registration benefits without coercion.
- Conduct user testing to confirm seamless navigation and access for unregistered users.

text: Vendors must take permission from the Administrator for selling their products under the site. Administrator will test product’s quality according to its market price to permit vendor for selling purpose.
ethical_us:
The requirement relates to the ethical principle of Trust, as it involves ensuring the quality and reliability of products being sold under the site, thereby building trust with customers.

Title: Ensuring Product Quality Through Administrative Oversight

Description: As an Administrator, I want to review and test the quality of products submitted by vendors according to their market price, so that we can ensure that only reliable and high-quality products are available for purchase on the site, maintaining customer trust.

Work:
1. Develop a process for vendors to request permission to sell products on the site.
2. Implement a system to receive product details from vendors for quality assessment.
3. Establish quality testing criteria aligned with product market prices.
4. Verify each product's quality through established testing procedures.
5. Approve or reject vendor products based on quality test outcomes.
6. Notify vendors of approval or rejection with feedback on decisions.
7. Establish a record-keeping system for all product quality assessments and approvals.

text: Can consult with the Administrator regarding product’s quality and advertisements.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Consultation with Administrator for Product Quality and Advertisements

Description: As a User, I want to consult with the Administrator regarding the product’s quality and advertisements so that I can ensure transparency and informed decision-making.

Work: 
- Ensure a clear communication channel is available for users to reach the Administrator.
- Provide users with a comprehensive guide on how to initiate consultations regarding product quality and advertisements.
- Ensure responses from the Administrator are timely and include detailed information about product quality assessments.
- Maintain a log of consultations for users to reference past queries and responses.
- Ensure that any advertisement details discussed are documented and accessible for user review to promote transparency.

text: View the personal details of the customer.
ethical_us:
**Title: Secure Viewing of Customer Personal Details**

**Description:** As a customer service representative, I want to view the personal details of the customer responsibly so that I can provide effective support while ensuring the customer's privacy is respected.

**Work:**

- Verify that the system implements access controls to ensure that only authorized personnel can view customer details.
- Ensure that all access to customer details is logged for auditing purposes.
- Provide a mechanism for customers to consent to the viewing of their personal details.
- Ensure that personal data is displayed in a secure manner to prevent unauthorized access during viewing.
- Implement training for staff on data privacy and the importance of respecting customer confidentiality.
- Provide a method for customers to review what personal data is accessed and by whom.
- Regularly review and update the privacy policy to ensure compliance with current regulations and ethical standards.

text: Responsible for properly allocating the selected product according to the customer’s choice and delivering product to the customer.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Responsibility

Title: Responsible Product Allocation and Delivery Management

Description: As a logistics coordinator, I want to ensure that the selected product is properly allocated according to the customer’s choice and delivered accurately, so that we maintain accountability and integrity in our delivery operations.

Work: 
- Verify that the allocation system matches the product selection with the customer's specified choice.
- Ensure that the inventory levels are accurately reflected and updated in real-time.
- Implement a tracking system to confirm that the product is delivered to the correct address.
- Monitor and address any discrepancies in the delivery process promptly.
- Provide customers with confirmation and status updates about their product delivery.
- Maintain a log of all allocations and deliveries to track accountability and provide traceable records.

text: Keep track of each product item’s stocks for selling purpose.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Transparent Stock Tracking System for Product Inventory

Description: As a store manager, I want to keep track of each product item’s stocks for selling purposes, so that I can ensure accurate inventory levels and maintain transparency with customers and suppliers.

Work:

- Develop a digital inventory system that allows real-time tracking of stock levels for each product.
- Provide user-friendly dashboards for managers to easily view and understand stock status and trends.
- Implement notifications and alerts for low stock levels to ensure timely restocking and avoid misleading availability.
- Ensure the system logs all changes to stock levels with timestamps and user identifications for transparency and accountability.
- Offer access to inventory data to authorized stakeholders, such as suppliers and auditors, ensuring clear communication regarding stock availability.
- Conduct regular audits of the inventory system to verify accuracy and integrity of stock data, ensuring consistent transparency.

text: Responsible for informing administrator when any product item’s stock goes under the minimum level.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Responsibility

Title: Stock Level Monitoring for Responsible Inventory Management

Description: As an inventory manager, I want to be informed when any product item's stock goes under the minimum level so that I can take timely action to restock items and ensure product availability without disruption.

Work: 
- Develop an automated system to monitor inventory levels continuously.
- Implement a notification system that alerts the inventory manager when the stock of any item falls below the minimum threshold.
- Ensure the alert system includes detailed information about the product, current stock, and minimum required level.
- Test the notification system for accuracy and reliability in different scenarios.
- Provide training for inventory managers to understand how to respond to these alerts effectively and responsibly.
- Document procedures for handling low stock alerts and restocking protocols.

text: Taking permission from the Administrator for the product to be purchased from vendor.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Responsibility

Title: Request Approval for Vendor Purchase

Description: As an Administrator, I want to approve product purchases from vendors so that I can ensure accountability and integrity in the purchasing process.

Work: 
- Implement a request workflow for purchase approvals.
- Notify the Administrator when a purchase request is made.
- Provide detailed information about the vendor and the product in the request.
- Allow the Administrator to approve or reject the purchase request. 
- Log all approval decisions for audit purposes.

text: Responsible for managing stocks of each product items.
ethical_us:
Title: Responsible Stock Management for Ethical Supply Chain

Description: As a supply chain manager, I want to manage stocks of each product responsibly so that inventory levels are maintained without waste and we can ensure ethical use of resources. 

Work: 
- Ensure stock tracking system accurately records inventory levels in real-time.
- Implement alerts for low inventory to prevent over-ordering and waste.
- Develop protocols for regular audits to verify stock accuracy and prevent misuse.
- Incorporate sustainability criteria for managing inventory levels to minimize resource waste.
- Establish responsibilities and accountability measures for inventory management processes.

text: Keep track of all the payment transactions made by the customers and update the payment information.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparency in Payment Transaction Tracking

Description: As a customer, I want to ensure that my payment transactions are accurately tracked and updated so that I have a clear understanding of my financial activities and can trust the system's reliability.

Work:
- Implement a logging system to record all customer payment transactions in a transparent manner.
- Ensure that customers can access their transaction history through a user-friendly interface.
- Provide detailed explanations of each transaction, including date, amount, and recipient.
- Notify customers promptly of any updates or changes to payment information.
- Conduct regular audits to verify the accuracy and completeness of transaction records.
- Display the company's data handling practices related to transaction tracking clearly to customers.

text: Responsible for contacting the banks for the validation of the a/c number provided by the customer while purchasing and make the transaction from the given a/c.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Responsibility in Bank Account Validation for Customer Transactions

**Description**: As a responsible banking application developer, I want to ensure the correct validation of customer-provided bank account numbers during transactions so that we prevent fraudulent activities and maintain accountability and integrity in financial operations.

**Work**:
- Validate the format and existence of the provided bank account number with the respective bank before proceeding with the transaction.
- Implement secure communication protocols to protect customer information during the validation process.
- Log all account validation attempts and outcomes for auditing and accountability purposes.
- Provide customers with immediate feedback if their account number cannot be validated, along with steps for resolution.
- Ensure that the entire validation process adheres to industry regulations and standards for financial transactions.

text: Consult with the Administrator about the payment details of the customers for the updating of the database.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Privacy in Customer Payment Data Consultation

Description: As a database administrator, I want to consult with the administrator about the payment details of customers with measures in place to protect their privacy so that I can update the database without compromising sensitive information.

Work:
- Verify that customer consent has been obtained for accessing their payment details.
- Ensure that all communications about payment details are conducted over secure channels.
- Implement data minimization practices to access only the necessary payment information.
- Log all access to customer payment data for accountability and auditing purposes.
- Encrypt the stored payment details to safeguard against unauthorized access.

text: Provide feasible solutions to the customers on their complaints and queries.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensuring Fair and Prompt Complaint Resolution**

**Description:** As a customer, I want to have my complaints and queries addressed with fair and feasible solutions so that I feel respected, valued, and treated justly by the company.

**Work:**
- Ensure all customer support staff are trained on the principles of fairness and equity in handling complaints.
- Implement a system to track customer complaints and monitor resolution times to ensure timely responses.
- Develop a standardized process for evaluating complaints and determining equitable solutions.
- Provide regular quality checks and audits of resolved complaints to ensure fairness and satisfaction.
- Offer customers clear communication on the resolution process and the rationale behind decisions made.

text: The system should require the user to state time when should the doughnut be delivered
ethical_us:
Title: Enhancing User Autonomy in Delivery Scheduling

Description: As a customer, I want to specify the time for my doughnut delivery so that I can exercise control over my schedule and ensure it aligns with my availability.

Work:
- The system must include a user interface component allowing customers to select a specific delivery time from available options.
- Validate the selected time to ensure it falls within the delivery service’s operating hours.
- Provide a confirmation message showing the selected delivery time upon completion of the order.
- Allow users to modify their selected delivery time prior to the final order submission.
- Ensure the system securely records and utilizes the delivery time for logistical planning.

text: The system is expected to have reasonable short time response. The voter should be able to login and should be able to get response for his requests in 2-3 seconds.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Quick System Response for Voter Satisfaction

Description: As a voter, I want to experience a fast login and quick response to my requests so that I can efficiently participate in the voting process without unnecessary delays.

Work:
- Ensure system infrastructure is optimized for performance to handle simultaneous voter logins.
- Implement efficient algorithms to facilitate quick processing of login requests and other voter interactions.
- Conduct thorough testing to guarantee response times of 2-3 seconds for all standard voter requests.
- Monitor system performance in real-time to promptly address any issues causing delays.
- Regularly update and optimize the system based on feedback and technological advancements to maintain quick response times.

Ethical Principle: Trust

Explanation: This requirement is closely associated with the ethical principle of trust. Ensuring a system's prompt response fosters voter trust in the voting process by demonstrating reliability and efficiency, which are crucial for maintaining confidence in digital services.

text: The data transaction between client and server must be encrypted using SSL technology.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Secure Data Transmission

Description: As an IT Security Officer, I want data transactions between the client and server to be encrypted using SSL technology so that sensitive information is protected from unauthorized access and privacy is maintained.

Work: 
- Implement SSL encryption protocols for all data transactions between clients and servers.
- Verify that SSL certificates are properly installed and configured.
- Conduct tests to ensure that data is encrypted during transmission.
- Regularly update and renew SSL certificates to maintain encryption standards.
- Monitor data transaction logs to identify and address any potential vulnerabilities or breaches.

text: All the passwords that are generated or accepted must be stored in database in an encrypted form.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Password Storage for User Protection

Description: As a security-conscious user, I want all passwords that are generated or accepted by the system to be stored in an encrypted form so that my personal and sensitive information remains protected from unauthorized access and data breaches.

Work: 
- Ensure that passwords are encrypted using strong and updated encryption algorithms before storing them in the database.
- Implement regular audits to verify that the encryption methods used for password storage comply with the latest security standards.
- Conduct penetration testing to identify potential vulnerabilities in the password storage system and address them promptly.
- Educate users about the importance of creating strong passwords and the measures taken to protect their data.

text: To prevent attacks the system should generate random word and ask the user to enter it correctly for multiple tryings.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring User Authentication Through CAPTCHA

Description: As a system administrator, I want to implement a CAPTCHA system that generates random words for users to enter correctly, so that we can prevent unauthorized access and protect user accounts from attacks.

Work:
- The system should generate a random word each time a user attempts to log in.
- Users should be allowed multiple attempts to enter the correct word.
- The random word should be clear, readable, and easily distinguishable to avoid accessibility issues.
- A limit on incorrect attempts should be established to prevent brute force attacks.
- The system should log failed CAPTCHA attempts for monitoring and security purposes.
- Ensure the CAPTCHA system is compatible with accessibility tools to accommodate users with disabilities.
- Regularly update the CAPTCHA generation algorithm to guard against evolving threats.
  
The most related ethical principle here is **Trust**. Ensuring user authentication through CAPTCHA is a method to build trust by protecting data responsibly and ensuring systems work properly to secure user accounts.

text: The system should warn ECA users about the malfunction of the system.
ethical_us:
Title: System Malfunction Warning for ECA Users

Description: As a Ethical Compliance Analyst (ECA) user, I want to receive timely warnings about system malfunctions so that I can take necessary actions to mitigate potential risks and maintain the integrity of the data I work with.

Work: 
- The system must detect any malfunction occurring within the system in real-time.
- A notification mechanism should be implemented to alert users about the malfunction promptly.
- Notifications should provide clear and understandable information about the nature of the malfunction.
- The system should offer guidance or steps on how to address the malfunction if possible.
- Documentation on the occurrence and resolution of malfunctions should be maintained for accountability and future reference.

text: The system should be simple to use
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure System Usability for All Users

Description: As a user, I want the system to be simple to use so that I can efficiently and effectively accomplish my tasks without experiencing unnecessary frustration or confusion.

Work:
- Acceptance Criteria:
  1. Design a user interface that is intuitive and requires minimal training for new users.
  2. Conduct usability testing sessions with a diverse group of users to identify points of confusion and inefficiency.
  3. Implement feedback from usability tests to improve the overall user experience.
  4. Provide clear and concise user guidance and support resources.
  5. Ensure that essential functions are easily accessible and operable by all users, including those with disabilities.
  
This ethical user story relates most closely to the principle of Transparency, as it emphasizes the need for a system that is understandable and easy to navigate, ensuring clear communication of function and purpose to the user.

text: The physician/pharmacist must have a valid user login to access the system.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Authentication for System Access

Description: As a physician or pharmacist, I want to have a valid user login to access the system so that patient data privacy is protected and confidential information is securely accessed only by authorized professionals.

Work: 
- Validate user credentials through a secure authentication process.
- Ensure user roles and permissions are properly assigned based on professional credentials.
- Implement regular audits and monitoring of login activities to detect unauthorized access.
- Provide training and support for users to understand and use secure login practices.
- Ensure compliance with data protection regulations related to system access.

text: A failed login will alert the physician/pharmacist.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Access Alert for Medical Data

Description: As a healthcare provider, I want to receive alerts for any failed login attempts to sensitive medical systems so that I can ensure the security and integrity of patient data.

Work: 
- Ensure that the system is capable of detecting failed login attempts.
- Implement a notification system that alerts the designated physician or pharmacist in real-time when a login attempt fails.
- Ensure that alert messages contain relevant details while respecting patient privacy.
- Test the alert mechanism to ensure it triggers reliably and only in appropriate circumstances.
- Verify that healthcare providers can successfully configure their alert preferences and contact information within the system.

This story relates to the ethical principle of Privacy, ensuring that any unauthorized access attempts to sensitive patient data are promptly detected and addressed to protect the privacy and integrity of the data.

text: A list of available patients is displayed after login.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Privacy and Confidentiality in User Access

Description: As a healthcare professional, I want to see a list of available patients only after logging in and verifying my identity so that patient information is kept confidential and accessible only to authorized personnel.

Work: 
- Ensure that the login process is secure and robust, utilizing strong authentication measures.
- Verify that only authorized users, such as registered healthcare professionals, can access the patient list.
- Implement audit logs to track access to patient data and ensure compliance with privacy regulations.
- Encrypt patient data in transit and ensure secure storage of such information.
- Design the user interface to visibly display privacy notices and access rights to the authorized user upon login.

text: An error message alerts when an invalid patient is entered.
ethical_us:
Title: Clear Error Alerts for Invalid Patient Data Entry

Description: As a healthcare data entry clerk, I want to receive a clear and immediate error message when an invalid patient is entered so that I can ensure accurate and reliable patient data is maintained in the system and reduce the risk of errors in patient records.

Work: 
- An error message is triggered and displayed when an invalid patient entry is detected.
- The error message clearly specifies the nature of the error and provides guidance on how to correct it.
- The system logs the error occurrence for review and potential auditing purposes.
- User feedback is implemented to ensure the error messages are understandable and address common data entry mistakes.
- The system prevents the submission of invalid entries until corrections are made. 

Ethical Principle: Trust and Transparency - Ensuring accurate data entry builds trust in the system's reliability and transparency in handling errors and encourages responsibility and integrity in data management.

text: Backspace/reset capability is implemented for typing errors.
ethical_us:
**Title: Implement Backspace/Reset Capability for Enhanced Trust and User Autonomy**

**Description:** As a user of the text input system, I want to have the ability to easily correct my typing errors using a backspace/reset function so that I can trust the system to accurately reflect my input and maintain my autonomy in editing content.

**Work:**

- Verify that the backspace functionality allows users to delete individual characters in a seamless and intuitive manner.
- Ensure that the reset feature enables users to clear entire text fields if necessary, providing a prompt to confirm the action to avoid accidental data loss.
- Test the backspace/reset functionalities across various input methods (e.g., keyboard, touch) for consistency and reliability.
- Confirm that the system provides immediate feedback when typing errors are corrected, reinforcing user trust.
- Gather user feedback on the backspace/reset experience to affirm satisfaction and make iterative improvements.

text: Selected or specified patient’s information is loaded.
ethical_us:
**Title: Secure Loading of Patient Information**

**Description:** As a healthcare provider, I want to ensure the privacy of selected or specified patient's information is maintained during the loading process so that the patient's personal data is protected from unauthorized access.

**Work:**

1. Verify that only authorized personnel can initiate the process of loading patient information.
2. Ensure that patient data is encrypted during transit and at rest.
3. Implement access controls to restrict who can view and edit patient information.
4. Notify the user when patient information is successfully loaded or if any errors occur.
5. Provide a logging mechanism for tracking access and changes to patient data.
6. Ensure compliance with relevant healthcare data privacy regulations (e.g., HIPAA, GDPR).
7. Conduct regular audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities in data handling procedures.

text: Return to List is available if the patient loaded is not correct.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensuring Patient Identity Verification through Easy List Navigation**

**Description:** As a healthcare provider, I want to be able to return to the list of patients if an incorrect patient is loaded so that I can ensure accurate patient identity verification and prevent treatment errors.

**Work:**
- Display a "Return to List" button prominently on the patient dashboard.
- Ensure that clicking "Return to List" returns the provider to the last accessed patient list without data loss.
- Verify that the system logs the action for accountability and auditing purposes.
- Test that selecting a different patient from the list updates the dashboard correctly.
- Confirm that no personal data is displayed until the correct patient selection is completed. 

**Related Ethical Principle: Non-maleficence**  
This user story centers on the principle of non-maleficence, emphasizing the importance of avoiding harm through potential patient misidentification. By allowing easy correction of loaded patient data, the system helps prevent errors in patient care.

text: Navigation to each selected tab.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Navigation Across Application Tabs

Description: As a user, I want to navigate easily and clearly to each selected tab so that I can effectively understand the system's functionality and access needed information without confusion.

Work:
- Ensure each tab is labeled with clear, concise, and intuitive names.
- Implement a consistent visual feedback mechanism to indicate when a tab is active or selected.
- Provide tooltips or brief descriptions explaining the purpose of each tab for first-time users.
- Ensure the transition between tabs is smooth and does not disrupt the user’s workflow.
- Conduct user testing to ensure the navigation is intuitive and easy to understand for a diverse group of users.
- Document any changes to the navigation system and communicate these changes to users efficiently and promptly.

text: The font will be larger enough for easy reading.
ethical_us:
Title: Enhanced Readability for All Users

Description: As an individual with visual impairments, I want the font to be large enough for easy reading so that I can comfortably read and understand content without straining my eyes.

Work: 
- Ensure the default font size meets accessibility standards for readability.
- Provide options for users to adjust font size according to their personal needs.
- Test the interface with users of various visual abilities to confirm easy readability.
- Implement and maintain a responsive design that accommodates different screen sizes while keeping text legible.
- Ensure that the font is clear and distinguishable in different lighting conditions and screen resolutions.

text: Icons will clearly illustrate the feature it represents.
ethical_us:
Title: Clear Icon Representation for Enhanced Understanding

Description: As a user, I want icons to clearly illustrate the feature they represent so that I can easily understand and navigate the interface without confusion.

Work: 
- Ensure each icon has a well-defined and universally recognized symbol that represents the feature it illustrates.
- Conduct user testing to confirm that users can understand the feature each icon represents without additional explanation.
- Provide tooltips with brief explanations for each icon to enhance understanding if needed.
- Ensure consistency across all icons in terms of style and theme to maintain uniform representation.
- Validate that the icons meet accessibility standards, including appropriate color contrast and size for visibility. 

Ethical Principle: Transparency. This user story emphasizes the importance of clear communication and understandability, aligning with the transparency principle by ensuring users can easily interpret what each icon signifies, leading to a more intuitive interaction with the system.

text: Basic Patient information is showed first.
ethical_us:
**Title: Prioritization of Basic Patient Information for Clarity and Safety**

**Description:** As a **healthcare practitioner**, I want to **view basic patient information first** so that **I can quickly understand and respond to the immediate healthcare needs of the patient, ensuring their safety and clarity in communication.**

**Work:**

- Ensure that the system displays essential patient information such as name, age, allergy information, and medical history at the top of the patient record screen.
- Provide clear visual indicators or highlights for critical information such as allergies or urgent medical needs.
- The interface should be designed for easy navigation and quick access to both basic and detailed patient information.
- Test the interface with healthcare practitioners to confirm usability and that the priority information is effectively highlighted.
- Update documentation to reflect the importance of prioritizing basic patient information for immediate accessibility and understanding. 

The most relevant ethical principle for this user story is **Non-maleficence**. This principle focuses on "doing no harm," which in the context of healthcare, translates to ensuring that critical patient information is easily accessible to prevent any potential harm due to oversight or lack of information.

text: Customized information is displayed.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Fairness in Customized Information Display

Description: As a technology user, I want customized information to be displayed fairly and equitably so that my experience is unbiased and representative of diverse perspectives.

Work: 
- Develop an algorithm that ensures information customization does not perpetuate or introduce bias.
- Conduct thorough testing for potential biases in the customization process.
- Include diverse datasets to train the customization algorithm to reflect a broad range of perspectives.
- Implement mechanisms for users to provide feedback on the fairness of the displayed information.
- Regularly audit and update the system to maintain fairness and inclusivity.

text: Each entry is shown in full.
ethical_us:
Requirement: "The system must log all user interactions with the AI to ensure accountability and transparency."

**Ethical Principle**: Transparency

**Ethical User Story**:

**Title**: Logging User Interactions for Transparency

**Description**: As a user, I want the system to log all my interactions with the AI so that I can have complete transparency and understand how my data is utilized.

**Work**:

1. Implement a logging mechanism that records all user interactions with the AI.
2. Ensure that logs are accessible to users upon request to review their own interaction data.
3. Display a clear and concise notice informing users about the data being logged and the purpose.
4. Confirm that logs are stored securely and in compliance with data protection regulations.
5. Provide users with the ability to opt-out of logging if desired, with a clear explanation of any potential impact.
6. Regularly audit the logging system to ensure accuracy and transparency in the records maintained.

text: The text and time/date of a note that has been entered is displayed starting with most recent.
ethical_us:
The ethical principle most related to the requirement is **Transparency**. The requirement focuses on clearly displaying information to the user in a way that enhances their understanding and access to data.

---

Title: Note Transparency Display

Description: As a user, I want to see the text and time/date of notes I've entered, starting with the most recent, so that I can easily track and find my notes effectively.

Work:
- Display the most recent note at the top of the list.
- Ensure the time and date of each note are clearly visible next to or below the note text.
- Allow users to verify the correct order of notes by date and time.
- Implement a consistent format for displaying date and time for easy readability.
- Provide an option to toggle between ascending and descending order if the user preferences change.

text: New and Delete buttons will allow the physician/pharmacist to add a notation to the patient’s file.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Responsibility

Title: Responsible Management of Patient Records by Healthcare Professionals

Description: As a physician/pharmacist, I want to add or delete notations on a patient's file responsibly, so that I can ensure the file accurately reflects the patient's medical history and current needs and maintain accountability for the changes made.

Work:
- Ensure the "New" button for notations allows adding relevant and accurate information to the patient’s file.
- Ensure the "Delete" button prompts a confirmation before removing any notation to prevent accidental data loss.
- Log all additions and deletions with timestamps and the responsible physician/pharmacist's identification for accountability.
- Provide role-based access control so only authorized personnel (physicians/pharmacists) can add or delete notations.
- Include a versioning system to retain a history of changes made for audit purposes.

text: A description and time/date of each prescription that has been ordered or given is displayed starting with most recent.
