ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Display Prescription History Transparently for Patients

Description: As a patient, I want to view a comprehensive and chronological list of all my prescription orders and their details so that I can fully understand and manage my medical history effectively.

Work:
- Ensure that the system displays all prescription details, including description, time, and date, in a clear and chronological order starting with the most recent.
- Implement filtering options for the patient to sort or search through prescriptions by date or medication name.
- Ensure the information is easily accessible and understandable for patients, possibly offering tooltips or additional resources explaining medical terms.
- Conduct user testing to verify that patients find the prescription display intuitive and informative.
- Include a feature for patients to export or print their prescription history for personal records or consultations.

text: All users of the system shall login using some form of unique identification.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure and Private User Identification

Description: As a system administrator, I want users to login using unique identification so that their privacy is maintained and unauthorized access is prevented.

Work: 
- Ensure that each user has a unique identifier such as a username or user ID.
- Implement secure password policies to protect user accounts.
- Provide multi-factor authentication options to enhance login security.
- Encrypt login data to protect user credentials from being intercepted.
- Log and monitor access attempts to detect and respond to unauthorized access quickly.

text: All login attempts shall be done so in a secure manner.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Login Process for Enhanced User Trust

Description: As a user, I want to ensure all my login attempts are done in a secure manner so that my personal information and access to the system are protected against unauthorized access.

Work:
- The system must employ strong encryption methods for transmitting and storing user credentials.
- Multi-factor authentication should be implemented as an option for users seeking additional security.
- Regular security audits should be conducted to identify and mitigate potential vulnerabilities in the login process.
- Users must be notified immediately of any suspicious login activity or failed login attempts.
- The system must comply with current security standards and regulations to ensure maximum protection of user data.

text: The system shall be compatible with the Microsoft Windows Operating System.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Trust

Title: Ensure System Compatibility with Microsoft Windows to Maintain User Trust

Description: As a software user, I want the system to be compatible with the Microsoft Windows Operating System so that I can trust it to run smoothly and reliably on my device without causing disruptions or security issues.

Work: 
- Verify that the system operates correctly on all currently supported versions of the Microsoft Windows Operating System.
- Ensure proper security updates and patches are maintained for Windows compatibility.
- Conduct performance testing on Windows to ensure the system does not cause any system crashes or slowdowns.
- Provide clear installation instructions specific to the Microsoft Windows Operating System.
- Offer customer support for issues related to the system's compatibility with Windows.

text: The system shall allow the administrator to remove equipment.
ethical_us:
**Title: Equipment Management Responsibility Enhancement**

**Description:** As an *administrator*, I want to *remove equipment from the system* so that *the inventory is accurately maintained, ensuring accountability and integrity in resource management*.

**Work:**
- Verify the administrator has the required permissions to remove equipment.
- Implement a confirmation prompt to prevent accidental removal.
- Log all equipment removal activities, including timestamps and administrator ID, for audit purposes.
- Ensure removed equipment data is archived appropriately for future reference and reporting.
- Notify relevant stakeholders of the equipment removal to maintain transparency and accountability.

**Related Ethical Principle: Responsibility**

This user story aligns with the principle of Responsibility by empowering administrators to maintain accurate and accountable inventory records while ensuring actions are documented and transparent.

text: The system shall allow the administrator to install additional distributed location templates.
ethical_us:
Title: Enabling Administrator Flexibility with Transparency

Description: As an administrator, I want to install additional distributed location templates so that I can ensure the system remains transparent and adaptable to the evolving needs of users and stakeholders.

Work:
- Verify that the system provides clear documentation and guidance on the process of installing additional distributed location templates.
- Ensure that the installation process is straightforward and can be easily understood by the administrator.
- Confirm that the system logs and documents all changes made during the installation of new templates for accountability and transparency.
- Test that the system provides feedback and notification once the installation of additional templates is complete.
- Validate that the installation process and the integrity of the system are not compromised by the addition of new templates.

text: The system shall allow the administrator to remove physical locations.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Administrative Oversight and Responsibility

Description: As an administrator, I want to have the ability to remove physical locations from the system so that outdated or incorrect data can be effectively managed and potential errors can be minimized, thus ensuring the accuracy and reliability of the system.

Work: 
- Verify that the administrator has the proper permissions to remove physical locations.
- Implement a confirmation process before a location is removed, including a warning about any dependencies linked to the location.
- Ensure that an audit log is maintained for all location removal actions to maintain transparency and accountability.
- Validate that the removal functionality does not affect other system functions and operations.
- Test the removal process to ensure accuracy and effectiveness without causing data inconsistency elsewhere.

text: The system shall allow administrators to define negotiation rules for the organization.
ethical_us:
Title: Enhancing Transparency in Negotiation Rules

Description: As an organization administrator, I want to define clear and transparent negotiation rules for the organization so that all stakeholders understand and trust the negotiation processes and outcomes.

Work:
- Acceptance Criteria:
  - Administrators can access a user-friendly interface to define negotiation rules.
  - The system provides comprehensive documentation and guidance for setting up negotiation rules.
  - The defined rules are clearly communicated to all relevant stakeholders within the organization.
  - Stakeholders have access to an explanation or rationale behind each negotiation rule to enhance understanding.
  - The system logs all changes to negotiation rules with timestamp and administrator details for accountability.
  - Stakeholders are notified of any updates or changes to the negotiation rules in a timely manner.

text: The system shall give the mediator privileges to schedule location and equipment resources.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Responsibility

Title: Mediator Resource Scheduling with Accountability

Description: As a mediator, I want to have the privileges to schedule location and equipment resources so that I can effectively manage events and ensure all parties have access to necessary resources responsibly and efficiently.

Work:
- Verify mediator role permissions include access to resource scheduling functionalities.
- Ensure the system logs all scheduling actions taken by the mediator to maintain accountability.
- Provide mediators with clear guidelines and rules regarding the proper use of scheduling privileges.
- Implement a user-friendly interface for mediators to schedule locations and resources easily.
- Create a notification system to alert relevant stakeholders of scheduled changes.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to negotiate a meeting date.
ethical_us:
Title: Facilitating Fair Meeting Scheduling

Description: As a mediator, I want to negotiate a meeting date fairly and transparently so that all parties feel equally considered and respected in the scheduling process.

Work:
- Ensure the system provides all parties with the ability to propose, view, and vote on available dates transparently.
- Implement notifications for all involved parties to track changes and updates in scheduling.
- Enable an audit trail of all scheduling interactions to ensure accountability and fairness.
- Provide a user-friendly interface that ensures clarity and avoids miscommunication during date selection.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to solve a date conflict.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Justice and fairness

Title: Date Conflict Resolution for Mediators

Description: As a mediator, I want to resolve scheduling conflicts for sessions so that all parties have a fair opportunity to participate without bias or scheduling disadvantages.

Work:
- The system shall provide mediators with an interface to view all conflicting dates clearly.
- The system shall allow mediators to propose alternative dates and times for the conflicting parties.
- The system shall notify all parties involved about the proposed dates and prompt them for confirmation.
- The system shall ensure that the proposed dates are equitable and do not favor any party unfairly.
- The system shall maintain a log of resolved conflicts and decisions for transparency and accountability.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to negotiate a location / equipment.
ethical_us:
Title: Empower Mediators to Facilitate Fair Negotiations

Description: As a mediator, I want to negotiate a location and equipment so that all parties involved can access efficient and fair resolution opportunities without bias or inequality.

Work: 
- Ensure the system provides options for suggesting neutral and accessible locations for all parties.
- Enable the selection of equipment based on the specific needs of the mediation to support an equitable environment.
- Implement a system that verifies the availability and suitability of chosen locations and equipment for fairness.
- Allow mediators to communicate directly with parties to discuss and finalize arrangements.
- Guarantee that all chosen negotiation tools and settings are free from bias and provide equal opportunities for representation and participation.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to solve a location conflict.
ethical_us:
**Ethical Principle: Justice and Fairness**  
The ethical principle of justice and fairness is closely related to the requirement to allow a mediator to solve a location conflict. Addressing conflicts in an impartial manner ensures that all parties are treated fairly, avoiding any form of discrimination or bias.

**Title: Fair Conflict Resolution in Location Disputes**

**Description:**  
As a mediator, I want to resolve location conflicts in a fair and unbiased manner so that all parties involved feel that their concerns have been addressed and justice has been served.

**Work:**  
- Implement a system to gather and analyze location data from all parties involved in the conflict.
- Create an interface for mediators to easily review and compare location data.
- Ensure the system can process multiple layers of conflict considerations, such as historical data and stakeholder input.
- Develop guidelines within the system to propose unbiased solutions based on collected data.
- Test the system to ensure all resolutions are free from bias and uphold fairness principles.
- Provide training for mediators on using the system effectively to ensure equitable conflict resolution.

text: The system shall allow the mediator to send and receive messages from users.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Transparent Communication through Mediators

**Description:** As a mediator, I want to send and receive messages from users so that I can facilitate clear and transparent communication between parties.

**Work:**

1. The system must allow mediators to access a secure messaging portal.
2. Mediators should be able to authenticate their identity before accessing messages to ensure transparency in communication.
3. The messaging interface should display timestamps for all sent and received messages to maintain a transparent conversation history.
4. The system must allow users to receive notifications of new messages from mediators, ensuring transparency in updates.
5. All messages should be stored in a secure database with proper access logs to ensure transparency and accountability.
6. Users must have the option to receive an audit trail of the conversation upon request.

text: The system shall allow the initiator to view the information of any meetings which they initiated.
ethical_us:
**Title: Enhance Transparency for Meeting Initiators**

**Description:** As a meeting initiator, I want to be able to view the information of any meetings that I have initiated so that I can ensure transparency in the meeting details and maintain accurate records for future reference.

**Work:**
- The system must authenticate users to verify that they are the initiator of the meeting.
- The system should display all relevant meeting information, including date, time, participants, and agenda, for initiated meetings.
- The meeting information should be easily accessible through a user-friendly interface.
- Users should be able to access meeting information both during and after the meeting has taken place.
- Ensure that the display of meeting information adheres to data privacy standards, showing only appropriate details to the initiator.

text: The system shall allow the initiator to cancel any meetings which they initiated.
ethical_us:
**Title: Meeting Cancellation Freedom and Autonomy**

**Description:** As an **initiator**, I want to **cancel any meetings that I have initiated** so that **I maintain control over my schedule and manage my commitments autonomously**.

**Work:**

1. Ensure that the initiator can view a list of all meetings they have initiated.
2. Provide a straightforward cancellation option for each meeting in the list.
3. Ensure the initiator receives a confirmation prompt before finalizing cancellation.
4. Notify all participants of the cancellation immediately after the meeting is cancelled.
5. Log the cancellation action for accountability and future reference.
6. Guarantee that no penalties or restrictions are imposed on the initiator for cancelling a meeting.

text: The system shall allow the initiator to send and receive messages from users.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Privacy

Title: Message Communication with Privacy Assurance

Description: As a system initiator, I want to send and receive messages from users with ensured privacy so that users' personal data and communication details remain confidential and protected.

Work:

- The system shall encrypt all messages sent and received to ensure confidentiality.
- Only authorized users should have access to their messages.
- Implement a user consent mechanism for any data sharing.
- Provide users with information on data protection measures in place.
- Regularly audit and update security protocols to safeguard user information.
- Ensure messages are stored only for a designated period, unless otherwise specified by the user.

text: The system shall authenticate users at the beginning each session.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Authentication for User Safety

Description: As a user, I want the system to authenticate my identity at the beginning of each session so that my personal information and data remain protected and accessible only to me.

Work:
- Implement a secure login process requiring a username and password.
- Ensure multi-factor authentication is available and recommended for added security.
- Encrypt user credentials during transmission and storage.
- Provide users with secure password reset and account recovery options.
- Log all authentication attempts and alert users of suspicious login activities.
- Regularly update authentication protocols to counteract emerging security threats.

Ethical Principle: Trust

text: The system shall allow the user to view their schedule.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Freedom and Autonomy

Title: User Empowerment through Schedule Transparency

Description: As an employee, I want to view my schedule so that I can manage my time effectively and maintain control over my work-life balance.

Work: 
- The system shall provide a user-friendly interface that allows employees to access their schedules from any device.
- The schedule should be displayed in a clear, organized manner, with options for both weekly and monthly views.
- Users must have the ability to set reminders or notifications for upcoming events or deadlines.
- The system must ensure that schedule updates are reflected in real-time to prevent confusion.
- Accessibility features must be implemented to ensure inclusivity for users with disabilities.
- Users should have the option to export or print their schedule for offline use.

text: The system shall notify the user of any schedule changes.
ethical_us:
Title: User Notification of Schedule Changes for Transparency

Description: As a user, I want to be notified of any changes to my schedule so that I can make informed decisions and manage my time effectively.

Work: 
- Ensure that the system automatically detects and logs any changes to the user's schedule.
- Develop a notification system that alerts the user in real-time about changes via preferred communication channels (e.g., email, push notification, SMS).
- Provide a clear explanation of what specific changes have occurred, including time, date, and any relevant details.
- Include an option for users to acknowledge the change and mark it as reviewed.
- Allow users to access a history of all schedule changes for ongoing transparency and record-keeping.

This user story reflects the ethical principle of transparency by ensuring that users are fully informed about any changes to their schedules, promoting understanding and open communication.

text: The system shall allow users to send and receive messages.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Trust

Title: Ensuring Trust in Communication Features 

Description: As a user, I want to send and receive messages securely so that I can trust that my communications are private and reliable.

Work: 
- The system must use end-to-end encryption for all messages.
- There should be clear information on how message data is stored and who has access to it.
- Ensure there is a secure authentication process for users accessing the messaging feature.
- Provide users with controls to manage message privacy settings.
- Regular audits should be conducted to verify the security and reliability of the messaging system.
- Create a user-friendly guide explaining how users can ensure personal message security.

text: The system shall request a user response to initiator or mediator messages.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Transparent Communication in User Interactions

Description: As a user, I want the system to request a response to initiator or mediator messages so that I can maintain clear and accountable communication.

Work:
- The system shall prompt the user for a response when a message is received from an initiator or mediator.
- The system shall provide an explanation of why a response is needed.
- The system shall offer understandable options for the user to choose from as a response.
- The system shall log the user's response and the original message for transparency and accountability.
- The system shall provide a notification to the user confirming that their response has been received and logged.

text: The system shall allow the user to modify the date preference set of an already submitted meeting response.
ethical_us:
Title: Enabling User Autonomy in Scheduling Preferences

Description: As a meeting participant, I want to modify the date preference set of an already submitted meeting response so that I can exercise my freedom and autonomy to accommodate changes in my schedule and ensure my participation.

Work:
- The system shall provide an intuitive interface for users to view their submitted meeting responses.
- The system shall allow users to select and modify the date preferences in their submitted meeting responses.
- The system shall send a confirmation request to users after they make changes to their date preferences.
- The system shall notify all relevant parties of any changes in meeting responses.
- The system shall ensure that the updated preferences are saved and displayed correctly in the user's meeting schedule.
- The system shall respect user privacy and ensure no sensitive data is exposed during the modification process.

text: The system shall allow the user to modify the location preference set of an already submitted meeting response.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Freedom and Autonomy

Title: Enable Users to Edit Meeting Location Preferences

Description: As a meeting participant, I want to be able to modify the location preference set of an already submitted meeting response so that I can maintain control and autonomy over my participation choices, ensuring they align with my personal preferences or changing circumstances.

Work: 
- Users can access their submitted meeting response from the user interface.
- Users can navigate to a section dedicated to location preferences.
- Users have the option to edit their previously set location preference.
- Users receive a confirmation message upon successfully modifying their location preference.
- The system automatically updates the meeting organizer with the modified location preference.

text: The system shall allow the user to modify the equipment requirement set of an already submitted meeting response.
ethical_us:
Title: Empowering User Control through Meeting Modifications

Description: As a meeting participant, I want to modify the equipment requirements of an already submitted meeting response so that I can ensure that the necessary tools and resources are available to support efficient and effective participation.

Work:
- The system shall provide an interface for users to view their submitted meeting responses.
- The system shall enable users to select a meeting response they have previously submitted.
- The system shall allow users to modify equipment requirements associated with that meeting response.
- The system shall provide confirmation once the modifications are successfully updated.
- The system shall notify relevant stakeholders of changes to equipment requirements to prepare adequately.
- Ensure that users can access this functionality at any time before the meeting starts.

text: The system shall allow the user to modify the date exclusion set of an already submitted meeting response.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Empowering Users to Manage Meeting Preferences

**Description:** As a meeting participant, I want to modify the date exclusion set of an already submitted meeting response so that I can maintain control over my schedule and avoid conflicts.

**Work:** 
- Ensure the system provides a clear interface for participants to view their submitted meeting responses.
- Allow users to edit the exclusion set of dates within a specified timeframe.
- Validate changes to ensure they don't conflict with existing meeting rules or schedules.
- Notify meeting organizers and other participants of any changes in real-time.
- Provide feedback to users on successful updates and highlight any potential scheduling conflicts.
- Ensure that the system logs changes for transparency and accountability purposes.

*This user story aligns primarily with the principle of Freedom and Autonomy, as it emphasizes giving users the ability to manage and control their participation in meetings according to their own preferences and schedules.*

text: The system shall allow the user to change the password.
ethical_us:
Title: Enable User-Controlled Password Management 

Description: As a system user, I want to change my password so that I can maintain my privacy and protect my personal data from unauthorized access.

Work:
- Ensure that the password change functionality is accessible from the user account settings.
- Implement secure authentication mechanisms to verify user identity before allowing a password change.
- Provide clear and understandable instructions during the password change process to ensure ease of use.
- Ensure that the new password meets security standards (e.g., minimum length, complexity).
- Notify the user via email or SMS upon successful password change to confirm the action and offer security assistance if the change was unauthorized.
- Log password change events for security audit purposes while ensuring no sensitive information is stored insecurely.

text: The system shall allow the user to view past attended meetings.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparency in Accessing Meeting History

Description: As a user, I want to view past attended meetings so that I can have a clear understanding and record of my previous engagements.

Work: 
- The system should provide a user-friendly interface to access the list of past attended meetings.
- Each meeting entry should include relevant details such as date, time, participants, and any key discussion points or decisions.
- Ensure that the user can access this information easily through a dedicated section in the user dashboard.
- Implement search and filter functionalities to help users find specific meetings quickly.
- Ensure that the information is displayed in a clear, understandable, and consistent format.

text: The system shall allow the user to view pending meetings.
ethical_us:
Title: View Upcoming Meetings for Enhanced Trust

Description: As a team member, I want to view pending meetings so that I can plan my tasks effectively and build trust within the team by being informed and prepared.

Work:
- Verify that the system displays all pending meetings for the user in an organized manner.
- Ensure the system updates the meetings list in real-time or with minimal delay.
- Confirm that the user interface is intuitive and provides easy navigation to the pending meetings section.
- Ensure meeting details include time, date, participants, and agenda for full transparency.
- Validate that the system sends timely notifications or reminders for upcoming meetings.

text: The system shall show the meetings to the user in ascending time order by default.
ethical_us:
Title: Clear Viewing of Meetings for Efficient Time Management

Description: As a busy professional, I want to see my meetings displayed in ascending time order by default so that I can efficiently manage my schedule and prepare adequately for each meeting.

Work: 
- The system shall retrieve all scheduled meetings for the user.
- The system shall sort meetings based on their start time in ascending order.
- The system shall display the meetings to the user with the earliest meeting at the top by default.
- The system shall allow users to toggle the order, if desired, while maintaining the default sort as ascending.
- The system shall update the meeting display instantly whenever new meeting data is added or changed, keeping the sort order intact.

Related Ethical Principle: Transparency

Explanation: This user story is tied to the principle of transparency as it emphasizes clear and understandable organization of information (meeting times) for the user. By defaulting to an ascending time order, the system ensures that the presentation of meetings is straightforward and logical, aligning with the user's expectations and needs.

text: The system shall allow users to view equipment information.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Transparency in Equipment Information Access

Description: As a maintenance technician, I want to view equipment information so that I can understand the equipment's status and history to make informed maintenance decisions.

Work: 
- The system shall display all relevant equipment information in a clear and understandable format.
- The system shall provide a history log of maintenance performed, including dates, actions taken, and personnel involved.
- The system shall ensure that all data presented is up-to-date and accurate.
- The system shall offer a user guide or help option to clarify any terms or functionalities related to viewing equipment information.
- The system shall allow users to easily navigate between different pieces of equipment and their detailed information pages.

text: The system shall allow users to view other users’ information.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Transparent Access to User Information

Description: As a system administrator, I want to view other users' information so that I can manage user accounts and maintain system integrity transparently.

Work: 
- Implement a secure user interface for administrators to access user information.
- Ensure that access logs are maintained to track when and why user information is accessed.
- Provide clear documentation and guidelines on how user information should be accessed and used by administrators.
- Ensure that user information is only accessible to authorized personnel with legitimate needs.
- Display terms and conditions that clarify the scope and intent of information access for user awareness and consent.
- Include an option for users to view the access history of their information for transparency and accountability.

text: The system shall allow user to specify custom meeting locations.
ethical_us:
Title: Empowering User Autonomy in Meeting Arrangements

Description: As a user, I want to specify custom meeting locations so that I can have the freedom to choose venues that best suit my preferences and needs.

Work: 
- The system must allow users to input their chosen meeting locations manually.
- The system should save custom meeting locations for future use by the individual user.
- The option for specifying custom meeting locations must be visible and easily accessible within the meeting scheduling interface.
- Users must be able to view and modify previously saved custom meeting locations.
- The system should ensure that all user-specified meeting locations are stored securely and are only accessible by the authorized user. 

This user story emphasizes Freedom and Autonomy by ensuring that users have the ability to select locations that align with their preferences, thus respecting their autonomy in decision-making.

text: The system shall allow users to view location information.
ethical_us:
Title: Ethical Access to Location Information

Description: As a user, I want to view my location information, so that I can make informed decisions while ensuring my privacy and consent are respected.

Work: 
- Ensure that location data is only accessible to the user with explicit consent.
- Provide clear information about how location data is collected, stored, and used.
- Allow users to easily opt-in or opt-out of location data tracking.
- Implement robust security measures to protect location information from unauthorized access.
- Ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations and standards. 

The ethical principle most related to this requirement is Privacy, as it concerns the user's control over their personal location data and ensuring their consent is obtained and respected.

text: The system shall allow users to search  for available distributed location templates(if any).
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Enabling Transparent Access to Distributed Location Templates

Description: As a user, I want to search for available distributed location templates so that I can easily identify the templates that are being utilized and understand their deployment in the system.

Work:
- The system displays a search bar prominently on the user interface dedicated to location templates.
- Users can input keywords or filters to search for specific distributed location templates.
- The system returns a list of available templates that match the search criteria, with clear labels and descriptions.
- Each listed template provides metadata, including its origin, purpose, and a brief overview of its use cases.
- Implement an option for users to learn more about each template through detailed documentation directly accessible from the search results.
- Ensure that the search function is responsive and intuitive, enhancing the user's ability to quickly find relevant templates.

text: The system shall allow users to view information concerning the available distributed location templates(if any).
ethical_us:
Title: Transparency of Location Templates Information

Description: As a system user, I want to view information concerning the available distributed location templates so that I can understand the choices available to me and make informed decisions.

Work: 
- The system clearly displays a list of all available distributed location templates.
- Each template includes a detailed description explaining its purpose and use.
- Information on the origin and last update of each template is accessible.
- Instructions or guidelines on how to select and apply these templates are provided.
- An option for users to provide feedback or report issues on the templates is available.

text: The web application shall add no more than 5 seconds of perceivable overhead time to any necessary web and database transaction time.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficiency in Web Transactions for Enhanced User Experience

Description: As a web user, I want the web application to ensure minimal perceivable delay in transactions so that I can enjoy a seamless and efficient online experience without unnecessary waits.

Work:
- Measure and record the current web and database transaction times.
- Optimize code and server processes to maintain added overhead at or below 5 seconds.
- Implement a monitoring system to continually assess transaction times for compliance.
- Conduct user testing to ensure the delay is not perceivable from a typical user standpoint.
- Provide clear communication to users about any potential delays and expected resolutions.

text: The system shall utilize HTTPS communication to ensure data confidentiality.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Data Transmission with HTTPS

Description: As a data-conscious user, I want the system to utilize HTTPS communication so that my personal and sensitive information remains confidential and secure during transmission.

Work:
- Ensure that all data transmitted between client-side and server-side is encrypted using HTTPS protocol.
- Implement and regularly update SSL/TLS certificates for encryption.
- Conduct periodic security audits to verify that data transmission is consistently secure.
- Provide users with clear communication regarding the encryption status of their data.
- Establish a mechanism to alert users in case of any security breaches in data transmission.

text: User authentication and privileges are defined outside the scope of the sytem by the Microsoft Active Directroy Server.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Transparent User Authentication and Privilege Management

Description: As an IT administrator, I want to ensure that user authentication and privileges are managed transparently through Microsoft Active Directory Server, so that there is clarity and accountability in access management outside the scope of the system.

Work:
- Verify that the system integrates with Microsoft Active Directory to handle user authentication.
- Confirm that the privileges assigned by Active Directory are accurately reflected within the system.
- Ensure documentation is available that explains how Active Directory manages authentication and privileges.
- Provide a log or audit feature within the system to track any changes or accesses related to Active Directory authentication.
- Validate that communication channels are in place for notifying users of their authentication status or privilege changes through Active Directory.

text: Personal information security is defined outside the scope of the SDMS by the database server.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Ensuring Privacy and Security of Personal Information

**Description**: As a data privacy advocate, I want to ensure that personal information security is effectively managed by the database server so that individuals' privacy is not jeopardized by the system.

**Work**:  
- Verify the database server has established strong encryption protocols for data storage and access.
- Ensure secure authentication mechanisms are in place to prevent unauthorized access.
- Review and ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations and standards.
- Conduct regular security audits to identify and address potential vulnerabilities.
- Implement logging and monitoring to track access to personal information.
- Develop and enforce a clear privacy policy outlining data handling practices.

text: Users shall be required to log into the system for all operations except the operations on the login page.
ethical_us:
Title: User Authentication for Secure Access

Description: As a system user, I want to be required to log into the system for all operations except those on the login page so that my personal information and the overall system security are protected against unauthorized access.

Work:
- Users must be prompted to log in whenever they attempt to access any system operation beyond the login page.
- The login process must verify user credentials against a secure, encrypted database.
- Unsuccessful login attempts should be limited, and account lockout mechanisms should be in place to prevent unauthorized access.
- Users should be notified of any unsuccessful login attempts or security breaches on their accounts.
- Ensure compliance with established privacy standards to safeguard personal data throughout the authentication process.

text: The system shall run on Windows Server 2003.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Sustainable System Compatibility

Description: As an IT administrator, I want to ensure the system runs on Windows Server 2003 so that our existing infrastructure remains functional without unnecessary hardware upgrades.

Work: 
- Verify current system compatibility with Windows Server 2003.
- Conduct an assessment of security vulnerabilities associated with running on an older server system.
- Implement necessary security patches to mitigate potential risks.
- Evaluate and document the resource efficiency of maintaining the system on the existing infrastructure.
- Develop a plan for gradual upgrade to newer systems considering cost-benefit analysis in terms of sustainability. 

Ethical Principle: Sustainability

text: The system shall be compatible with IIS6.0 and above or  Apache 2.0 and above.
ethical_us:
The requirement "The system shall be compatible with IIS6.0 and above or Apache 2.0 and above" is related to the ethical principle of **Trust**. Ensuring compatibility with established and widely-used server technologies helps in building trust by improving reliability and security of the system. 

Title: Ensuring Compatibility with Trusted Server Technologies

Description: As a system administrator, I want the system to be compatible with IIS 6.0 and above or Apache 2.0 and above so that I can ensure reliable and trusted server operation, maintaining security and stability in my environment.

Work: 
- Verify system compatibility with IIS 6.0 and higher versions.
- Test system functionality on Apache 2.0 and higher versions.
- Document any compatibility issues and their solutions.
- Conduct security assessments to ensure no vulnerabilities are introduced by integrating with these servers.
- Ensure seamless deployment on both IIS and Apache server environments.

text: The system shall display all the products that can be configured.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Product Configuration Display

Description: As a potential customer, I want to see all the products that can be configured so that I can make an informed decision and understand the available options.

Work: 
- Display a list of all configurable products on the product page.
- Ensure each product listing includes clear specifications and options that can be configured.
- Provide a brief explanation of the configuration possibilities for each product.
- Ensure that the product display is easily accessible and comprehensible, with no hidden options.
- Include links or information for further assistance or clarification on product configurations.

text: The system shall allow user to select the product to configure.
ethical_us:
Title: User Control in Product Configuration

Description: As a consumer, I want to be able to select the product I wish to configure, so that I have the freedom and autonomy to customize a product according to my personal needs and preferences.

Work:
- Allow users to browse the available products.
- Provide clear and accessible options for selecting a product.
- Ensure that product selection is intuitive and user-friendly.
- Implement a confirmation step for the selected product before moving to configuration.
- Log user selections to improve user experience without infringing on privacy.

text: The system shall display all the available components of the product to configure.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Display Complete Product Configuration Options

Description: As a customer, I want to see all the available components of the product so that I can make an informed decision and customize the product according to my preferences.

Work: 
- The system must list all available components for product configuration clearly and comprehensively.
- Each component should have a detailed description and specifications accessible to the user.
- The interface should be intuitive and easy to navigate, allowing users to explore different configuration options without confusion.
- Any updates or changes to the component availability must be reflected immediately in the system.
- Include a help or info section that explains how the components are displayed and any potential compatibility issues.

text: The system shall enable user to add one or more component to the configuration.
ethical_us:
**Title: Empowering Users with Configurable Choices**

**Description:** As a responsible user, I want to be able to add one or more components to a configuration so that I can have the freedom and autonomy to customize and optimize the system according to my preferences and needs.

**Work:**
- The user interface shall provide a clear option for adding components to a configuration.
- Users shall be able to select multiple components simultaneously without system restrictions.
- The system shall provide guidance or recommendations for optimal component combinations, ensuring user empowerment through informed decisions.
- The configuration changes shall be reversible, ensuring the user can maintain autonomy in their choices.
- A confirmation prompt shall be displayed before finalizing the addition of components, enabling user consent and control.

text: The system shall notify the user about any conflict in the current configuration.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: User Notification of Configuration Conflicts

Description: As a user, I want to be notified about any conflict in the current system configuration so that I can understand the issue and take appropriate action to resolve it.

Work: 
- The system must automatically detect conflicts in the configuration settings.
- Upon detecting a conflict, the system should immediately notify the user with a clear and understandable message.
- The notification must include details about the nature of the conflict and potential implications.
- Provide guidance or options to the user for resolving the conflict.
- Ensure that the notification system is reliable and delivers messages in a timely manner.
- Test notifications across different devices and platforms to ensure consistency and clarity.

text: The system shall allow user to confirm the completion of current configuration.
ethical_us:
**Title: User Confirmation for Configuration Completion**

**Description:** As a responsible user, I want to confirm the completion of the current configuration so that I can ensure accuracy and control over the process.

**Work:**
- The system must provide a clear and understandable notification to the user that the configuration process is complete.
- The user must be presented with an option to confirm or review the configuration before final approval.
- A log entry should be created once the user confirms the completion, documenting the action for accountability.
- The system should notify the user of any implications or next steps following the confirmation.
- Ensure that any confirmed configuration cannot be altered without additional authorization steps to maintain integrity.

This user story focuses on the principle of **Responsibility**, emphasizing user accountability and control in confirming their actions while ensuring the process aligns with ethical guidelines and system integrity.

text: The system shall display detailed information of the selected products.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Product Information Display

Description: As a customer, I want to see detailed information about the selected products so that I can make informed purchasing decisions and trust the quality and features of the products.

Work:
- Display product features, specifications, and benefits clearly and concisely.
- Provide visual aids such as images or videos to illustrate product details.
- Offer a comparison tool to help customers evaluate different products side by side.
- Ensure that all information presented is accurate and up-to-date.
- Include customer reviews and ratings for additional insights from previous buyers.

text: The system shall provide browsing options to see product details.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Transparent Access to Product Information

Description: As a consumer, I want to have easy access to detailed product information so that I can make informed purchasing decisions.

Work:
- The system must include a clear and intuitive user interface for accessing product details.
- Ensure all relevant product information, including specifications, pricing, and availability, is easily accessible and comprehensible.
- Implement a feature that allows users to compare products based on important attributes.
- Provide explanations and context for technical terms within product descriptions.
- Ensure the browsing and searching functionality is responsive and provides accurate results.
- Test the product detail pages for clarity and ease of use with a diverse group of users to ensure transparency and effectiveness.

text: The system shall display detailed product categorization to the user.
ethical_us:
Title: Enhancing User Clarity with Product Categorization

Description: As a conscientious consumer, I want to access detailed product categorization so that I can make informed and ethical purchasing decisions.

Work: 
- The system provides a clear and comprehensive categorization of products.
- Categories are easily searchable and navigable for the user.
- Descriptions of categories include all relevant information to aid understanding.
- The categorization system is regularly updated to reflect new products or product changes.
- The presentation of product categories supports accessibility for all users.

text: The system shall enable user to enter the search text on the screen.
ethical_us:
**Title: Enable User-Friendly Search Functionality**

**Description:** As a **user**, I want to **enter search text on the screen effortlessly** so that **I can find the information I need quickly and efficiently without unnecessary barriers**.

**Work:**
1. The system must display a clearly visible search bar on the screen.
2. Users should be able to click on the search bar and start typing immediately.
3. The system should support entry of both single and multi-word search queries.
4. Upon entering text, the system must provide feedback (e.g., a blinking cursor) to assure users their input is being recorded.
5. Implement real-time suggestions or autocomplete functionality to assist users in refining their search.
6. Ensure that the search functionality is accessible to all users, including those with disabilities, meeting WCAG 2.1 AA standards.
7. The system should deliver search results promptly after user input.
8. Maintain privacy by not retaining any user-entered search texts unless explicitly consented to by the user. 

**Ethical Principle:** Freedom and Autonomy – This principle is emphasized by ensuring users can navigate and use the search function without obstacles, thereby preserving their freedom to access information autonomously, in line with their personal preferences.

text: The system shall enable user to select multiple options on the screen to search.
ethical_us:
### Title: Effective and Fair Search Functionality

### Description:
As a user of the system, I want to have the ability to select multiple options on the screen when performing a search so that I can efficiently narrow down my search results to what is most relevant to me and ensure fair access to options.

### Work:
- Ensure that the search interface clearly displays all available options to select.
- Implement a multi-option selection mechanism that is intuitive and user-friendly.
- Test the system for responsiveness and accuracy when multiple search criteria are applied.
- Validate that the search results are accurate and correspond to the selected criteria.
- Provide easy-to-understand guidelines or tooltips for users unfamiliar with multi-selection functionalities.
- Ensure that the feature is accessible and fair for users with different abilities and backgrounds.

text: The system shall display all the matching products based on the search.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Search Results Display

Description: As a user, I want the system to display all matching products transparently based on my search query so that I can make informed purchasing decisions.

Work: 
- The system should clearly display how search results are ranked or filtered.
- Provide users with an option to sort search results according to different criteria like price, rating, and relevance.
- Include brief explanations or labels for any algorithms used in sorting or filtering.
- Validate the accuracy of search results with regular testing.
- Ensure consistency in search result displays across different devices and platforms.

text: The system shall display only 10 matching result on the current screen.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Display of Search Results

Description: As a user, I want the system to display only 10 matching results on the current screen so that I can easily comprehend and manage the presented information without being overwhelmed.

Work: 
- The system should limit the display to 10 search results per page.
- There should be a clear indication that additional results can be accessed through navigation controls (e.g., next/previous buttons).
- Ensure that the results presented are the most relevant or accurate based on the user's query.
- Provide a clear explanation or indication if the results are being sorted, filtered, or customized in any way.
- Conduct user testing to ensure that users find the display of 10 results to be easy to understand and use.

text: The system shall enable user to navigate between the search results.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Navigate Search Results with Ease

**Description:** As a regular user of the system, I want to navigate efficiently between search results so that I can access and evaluate the information I need without unnecessary delays or confusion.

**Work:**
- The system provides a clear and intuitive interface for navigating between search results.
- There are visible Next and Previous buttons to move through search result pages.
- A clickable navigation bar or pagination allows users to jump to specific pages of search results.
- There is an indication of the current page number and total number of pages.
- The system maintains search query context when users navigate through different pages. 

The ethical principle related to this requirement is **Transparency**. Ensuring transparency here means that users understand easily how to navigate and access information without encountering hidden complexities or obstacles in the interface design.

text: The system shall notify the user when no matching product is found on the search.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Search Results Notification

Description: As a user, I want to be notified when no matching product is found on my search so that I am transparently informed of the search outcome and can decide on a different course of action.

Work: 
- Implement a notification system to alert users when a search yields no results.
- Ensure that the notification is clear, understandable, and prominently displayed.
- Provide suggestions or alternative options, if possible, to aid the user in their search.
- Test the notification with different scenarios to ensure reliability and transparency.
- Document the process and reasons for user notifications within the system for accountability.

text: The system shall allow user to create profile and set his credential.
ethical_us:
Title: User Profile Management with Privacy Assurance

Description: As a user, I want to create a profile and set my credentials so that my data is protected and my privacy is respected.

Work: 
- The system should ensure that all user data entered is securely stored and protected against unauthorized access.
- Users should be able to modify their credentials at any time to maintain control over their personal information.
- The system must provide clear information on how user data will be used and guarantee it will not be shared without explicit consent.
- Implement robust authentication mechanisms to prevent unauthorized access to user profiles.
- Ensure compliance with data protection regulations and provide users with options to delete their profile and data permanently.
- Provide users with a privacy settings page where they can control visibility and access to their information.

text: The system shall authenticate user credentials to view the profile.
ethical_us:
Title: User Authentication for Profile Access

Description: As a user, I want to authenticate my credentials before viewing profiles so that my privacy is protected and unauthorized access is prevented.

Work: 
- The system shall prompt users for their credentials when attempting to access a profile.
- The system shall verify the provided credentials against stored user data.
- The system shall allow profile access only if the credentials are correctly authenticated.
- The system shall notify users of failed authentication attempts without revealing sensitive data.
- The system shall log authentication attempts for auditing and security purposes.

text: The system shall allow user to update the profile information.
ethical_us:
Title: Enable User-Driven Profile Management for Privacy Assurance

Description: As a registered user, I want to update my profile information so that I can ensure the accuracy and privacy of my personal data.

Work:
- Verify that users can securely access their profile information via a login mechanism.
- Ensure that users can edit fields such as name, contact information, and preferences without restrictions.
- Provide clear guidance and confirmation messages upon successful updates.
- Implement privacy settings that allow users to control the visibility of their profile information.
- Ensure all changes to profile information are logged with timestamps for accountability.
- Protect user data from unauthorized access during the update process using encryption.

text: The system shall display both the active and completed order history in the customer profile.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparency in Order History Display

Description: As a customer, I want to view both my active and completed order history in my profile so that I can transparently track my orders and maintain a clear record for personal reference and accountability.

Work:
- Ensure the system displays a section for active orders in the customer profile.
- Ensure the system displays a section for completed orders in the customer profile.
- Allow customers to access detailed views of individual active and completed orders.
- Implement clear labeling to distinguish between active and completed orders.
- Ensure the order history is updated in real-time to reflect the current status of all orders.

text: The system shall allow user to select the order from the order history.
ethical_us:
**Title**: Order History Accessibility for User Trust  

**Description**: As an **online shopper**, I want to **easily access and select orders from my order history** so that **I can manage past purchases and maintain trust in the system's reliability**.  

**Work**:  
- Ensure the order history is easily navigable and accessible to users.  
- Verify that all past orders are accurately listed and can be selected.  
- Confirm that selecting an order provides detailed information about that particular purchase.  
- Test the system's performance to ensure it reliably presents order history without errors or delays.  
- Guarantee the security of user data while accessing order history to protect their privacy.  

The most relevant ethical principle here is **Trust**. By allowing users to select and manage past orders reliably and securely, the system builds user trust and confirms its effectiveness.

text: The system shall display the detailed information about the selected order.
ethical_us:
**Title: Transparent Access to Order Information**

**Description:** As a customer, I want to view detailed information about my selected order so that I can fully understand the status and specifics of my purchase.

**Work:**
- Ensure order details include item descriptions, quantities, prices, and status updates.
- Display information in a clear and understandable format.
- Provide easy navigation to different sections of the order details.
- Allow ability to download or print order information for personal records.
- Ensure that any changes to the order information are clearly communicated.

text: The system shall display the most frequently searched items by the user in the profile.
ethical_us:
Title: Personalized Transparency for User Profiles

Description: As a user, I want to view the most frequently searched items displayed in my profile so that I can understand how my interactions influence the content I see and ensure that my preferences are reflected correctly.

Work: 
- Display a section in the user profile that lists the most frequently searched items.
- Ensure that the displayed information is updated in real-time to reflect the user's latest search behavior.
- Provide a clear explanation of how the frequency of searched items is calculated.
- Allow users to opt-out of having their search frequency displayed in their profile.
- Provide a help section or tooltip explaining the benefits and implications of displaying frequently searched items for enhanced user understanding.

text: The system shall allow user to register for newsletters and surveys in the profile.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Privacy

Title: User Subscription Management for Privacy Protection

Description: As a registered user, I want to manage my subscription preferences for newsletters and surveys in my profile so that I can control and protect my personal data and ensure my privacy preferences are respected.

Work: 
- Ensure the subscription feature is accessible within the user's profile settings.
- Implement clear and concise options for users to opt-in or opt-out of newsletters and surveys.
- Provide detailed information about the types of data collected and how it will be used.
- Ensure that default settings prioritize user privacy and require explicit consent for subscriptions.
- Confirm that users can easily update their subscription preferences at any time.
- Validate that all collected data complies with applicable privacy laws and regulations.
- Implement a system to notify users about changes in subscription terms or data usage policies.

text: The system shall allow user to select the support type he wants.
ethical_us:
Title: Empowering User Autonomy Through Support Choices

Description: As a user, I want to select the type of support I want so that I can maintain control over the assistance I receive and ensure it best fits my needs.

Work:
- The system must provide a clear and understandable interface that allows users to view different support options.
- Users should be able to select from various types of support, such as chat, email, or phone support.
- The system will confirm the support choice with the user before finalizing the selection.
- Ensure that the selected support option is easily accessible to the user within the platform.
- The system should offer additional resources or FAQs to help users make informed decisions about their support choice.

text: The system shall allow user to enter the customer and product information for the support.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Ensuring Privacy in Customer and Product Information Entry

**Description:** As a support agent, I want to ensure that the customer and product information entered into the system is protected and used responsibly so that the privacy of our customers is maintained and they feel secure sharing their data with us.

**Work:**
- The system must encrypt customer and product information upon entry.
- Access to customer and product information should be restricted to authorized personnel only.
- Audit logs must be maintained to track access to and changes made to customer and product information.
- Clear communication must be provided to customers on how their data will be used and stored.
- Ensure compliance with relevant data protection regulations and privacy laws.

text: The system shall display the customer support contact numbers on the screen.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Access to Customer Support

Description: As a customer, I want to easily view the customer support contact numbers on the screen so that I can quickly reach out for assistance when needed without any confusion or delays.

Work:
- The system must display customer support contact numbers prominently on the main interface.
- Contact numbers must be clearly labeled and easy to understand.
- Ensure that the contact information provided is accurate and up-to-date.
- Include multiple contact options (e.g., phone, email) to cater to different preferences.
- Test the display functionality across different devices and screen sizes to ensure consistent visibility.

text: The system shall allow user to enter the contact number for support personnel to call.
ethical_us:
Title: Facilitate Responsible Support Communication

Description: As a user, I want to enter the contact number for support personnel so that I can receive assistance promptly and ensure my technical issues are resolved efficiently.

Work:
- The system must provide a secure and easy-to-find input field for the user to enter the contact number.
- The input field should have validations to ensure the number entered is in the correct format and is a valid phone number.
- The entered contact number should only be accessible to authorized support personnel, ensuring that user privacy is maintained.
- The system should log each contact number entry for accountability and traceability, ensuring the contact process is transparent and responsible.
- Users should receive a confirmation message once the contact number is successfully entered into the system.

text: The system shall display the online help upon request.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Accessible Online Help 

Description: As an end user, I want to access the online help system upon request so that I can obtain clear and understandable guidance on using the application effectively.

Work:
- The online help button or link should be clearly visible on every page of the application.
- When the help button/link is clicked, it should open a user-friendly help section or pop-up.
- Ensure the help content is comprehensive, up-to-date, and provides step-by-step guides.
- Enable search functionality within the help section to quickly find specific information.
- Ensure the help section is accessible for users with disabilities, adhering to relevant accessibility standards (e.g., WCAG).
- Include a feedback mechanism for users to report unclear or missing help topics.
- Test the help feature on various devices and browsers to ensure consistent accessibility and visibility. 

Ethical Principle: Transparency

Explanation: This user story focuses on the ethical principle of Transparency, as it aims to provide clear and understandable guidance to users, ensuring they can follow and understand the application’s features and functionalities effectively.

text: The system shall display the FAQ’s upon request.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Ensure Easy Access to Frequently Asked Questions

Description: As a user, I want to access the FAQs easily so that I can understand the system's functionalities, processes, and how it handles data.

Work: 
- The system shall provide a clearly visible and accessible FAQ section on the homepage.
- The FAQs shall include detailed explanations of the system's key features and functionalities.
- FAQs should address common user concerns about data handling and privacy.
- The system shall provide easy-to-understand language and avoid technical jargon in the FAQs.
- User feedback on the FAQs comprehensibility should be periodically collected and used to update the content.

text: The system shall maintain customer email information as a required part of customer profile.
ethical_us:
Title: Preserving Customer Privacy in Email Information Handling

Description: As a customer, I want my email information to be securely maintained as part of my profile so that my personal privacy is protected and I can trust the organization with my data.

Work: 
- Verify that customer email data storage complies with data protection regulations and privacy laws.
- Implement encryption protocols for storing and transferring customer email information.
- Develop procedures for customers to update or delete their email information easily.
- Ensure systems are in place to prevent unauthorized access to customer email data.
- Conduct regular audits to ensure compliance with privacy and data protection standards.

text: The system shall send an order confirmation to the user through email.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Transparent Order Confirmation Process

Description: As an online shopper, I want to receive an order confirmation via email so that I am informed and can verify the details of my purchase to ensure the order has been processed correctly.

Work: 
- The system should send an automatic confirmation email to the user upon successful order placement.
- The email should clearly list the order details, including items purchased, quantities, prices, and estimated delivery dates.
- Provide a contact link or support information within the email for users to address any discrepancies or questions.
- Ensure the email subject line clearly indicates it's an order confirmation to avoid confusion with other communications.
- Log the confirmation email as sent in the system for traceability and auditing purposes.

text: The system shall display detailed invoice for current order once it is confirmed.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Invoice Presentation

Description: As a customer, I want to see a detailed invoice for my current order once it is confirmed so that I can understand the charges and ensure transparency in my purchase.

Work:
- The system shall show a breakdown of each item in the order, including individual prices and quantities.
- The system shall display any additional fees or taxes separately from the item prices.
- The system shall provide a clear total amount for the entire order.
- The system shall include a confirmation date and invoice number for reference.
- The system shall allow the invoice to be easily accessible and downloadable for personal records.

text: The system shall optionally allow user to print the invoice.
ethical_us:
**Title**: User-Centric Invoice Flexibility

**Description**: As a **user**, I want to have the option to print the invoice so that I can retain a physical copy for my personal records and ensure data management aligns with my privacy preferences.

**Work**: 
- Provide a clear and visible option for printing invoices on the final checkout or billing page.
- Ensure that selecting to print the invoice does not automatically store or share any additional personal data.
- Maintain the functionality across various devices and print settings to accommodate user needs.
- Clearly communicate to the user that printing is optional and explain the privacy implications, if any, associated with printing the invoice.
- Test the invoice printing feature to confirm it works seamlessly without technical glitches.

text: The system shall provide shopping cart during online purchase.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Transparent Shopping Cart Experience

**Description:** As an online shopper, I want to use a transparent shopping cart during my purchase process so that I am fully informed about the items I am buying, their prices, and any additional costs.

**Work:**  
- Display itemized list of all products added to the shopping cart along with their individual prices.  
- Clearly show any applicable taxes, fees, or shipping costs separate from item prices.  
- Provide a detailed summary of the total cost before proceeding to checkout.  
- Ensure that any changes in the cart (e.g., adding/removing items) are immediately updated and visible to the user.  
- Include a clear explanation of return policies and guarantees related to items in the cart within easy access.  
- Facilitate easy accessibility of any available discounts or promotions that apply to the items in the shopping cart.

text: The system shall allow user to add/remove products in the shopping cart.
ethical_us:
Title: Empowering User Shopping Autonomy

Description: As an online shopper, I want to have the ability to add or remove products from my shopping cart so that I can manage my purchases according to my preferences and have control over my shopping experience.

Work: 
- Ensure the interface allows users to easily add items to the shopping cart with a visible and accessible button.
- Provide a clear and straightforward method for removing items from the cart, minimizing accidental removals.
- Display an updated cart summary each time products are added or removed, reflecting the current selection.
- Include informative feedback confirming when items are successfully added or removed from the cart.
- Ensure the design respects users’ choices and preferences without tracking manipulation or coercive tactics.

text: The system shall display different shipping options provided by shipping department.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Display of Shipping Options

Work:

- Clearly distinguish between different shipping methods (e.g., standard, express, overnight) with relevant details such as delivery times, costs, and carrier names.
- Provide detailed information on how each shipping option affects the estimated delivery date.
- Allow customers to compare shipping options side by side to facilitate informed decision-making.
- Display any additional fees or conditions associated with each shipping option upfront.
- Ensure the information is updated in real-time to reflect any changes in the shipping options offered by the shipping department.

text: The system shall enable user to select the shipping method during payment process.
ethical_us:
**Title: Facilitating User Autonomy in Shipping Method Selection**

**Work:**
- The system shall present a list of all available shipping methods during the payment process.
- The system shall provide detailed information for each shipping method, including cost and estimated delivery time.
- The system shall allow users to compare different shipping methods before making a selection.
- The system shall confirm the selected shipping method before finalizing the payment.
- The system shall ensure the user's selection is securely processed and reflected in the order confirmation.

text: The system shall display the shipping charges.

Ethical Principle: Transparency

text: The system shall allow user to enter the order information for tracking.

text: The system shall display the current tracking information about the order.

Title: Transparent Order Tracking

- Show estimated delivery date and time based on current order status.

- Ensure the tracking page updates in real-time with accurate information.
- Include a help option for customers to contact support regarding tracking information.

text: The system shall calculate tax for the order.
ethical_us:
**Title: Accurate and Fair Tax Calculation for Orders**

**Description:** As a taxpayer, I want the system to accurately and fairly calculate the tax for each order so that my financial obligations are transparent and just, ensuring I pay the correct amount without discrepancies.

**Work:**
- Ensure the system incorporates current and relevant tax rates applicable to different regions.
- Validate the order details to ensure they include all required information for tax calculation, such as product type and price.
- Implement a mechanism to promptly update tax rules and rates to reflect changes in legislation.
- Test the tax calculation process extensively to ensure its accuracy across various scenarios and order compositions.
- Provide clear documentation and a summary of the tax calculation process to users, enhancing transparency.
- Include a feature that allows users to review the tax breakdown to understand how the total tax amount was derived.

text: The system shall display tax information for the order.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Display of Order Tax Information for Transparent Transactions

Description: As a customer, I want to see detailed tax information for my order so that I can understand the breakdown of costs and ensure that I am being charged correctly.

Work: 
- Display the tax amount for each item in the order summary.
- Include a breakdown of tax rates applicable to each item.
- Provide a total tax amount for the entire order.
- Ensure the tax information is clearly visible and easy to understand.
- Verify that the tax data aligns accurately with applicable tax laws.

text: The system shall display available payment methods for payment.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Payment Options Display

Description: As a user, I want to clearly see all available payment methods so that I can make an informed decision about how to proceed with a payment.

text: The system shall allow user to select the payment method for order.

Ethical Principle: Freedom and Autonomy

- The system provides a variety of payment method options at checkout, including credit/debit cards, digital wallets, and other popular forms of payment.

- Users have the ability to change their selected payment method before the transaction is finalized.

text: The system shall display the orders that are eligible to change.

Title: Transparent Order Change Eligibility

text: The system shall allow user to select the order to be changed.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Order Selection Transparency

**Work:**

- Provide a user-friendly interface for selecting specific orders.
- Ensure that all relevant order details (such as order date, status, and items) are visible to aid in making informed decisions.

text: The system shall allow user to cancel the order.
ethical_us:
Title: Order Cancellation Capability

Description: As a customer, I want to easily cancel my order so that I can maintain control over my purchasing decisions and avoid unintended commitments.

Work: 

- The system provides a clear and accessible option for order cancellation on the user interface.
- Users receive confirmation and feedback upon successful cancellation.
- The time frame for cancellation eligibility is clearly communicated to users.
- Customer support is available for users who experience difficulties cancelling their orders.
- Cancellation does not incur unjustified penalties or harm the user's consumer rights.
- An order reversal process is enacted seamlessly within the existing system workflow.

text: The system shall notify the user about any changes made to the order.

Ethical Principle: Transparency

text: The system shall enable the user to enter their reviews and ratings.

Ethical Principle: Freedom and Autonomy

text: The system shall display all the available financing options.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Transparent Display of Financing Options

text: The system shall allow user to select the financing option.
ethical_us:
Title: Empowering Users with Financial Autonomy

Description: As a potential borrower, I want to select the financing option, so that I can choose the plan that best fits my financial situation and goals, ensuring my autonomy in financial decision-making.

Work:

text: The system shall notify the use about the financing request.

Title: Notification of Financing Request for Transparency

text: The system shall display all the available promotions to the user.

text: The system shall allow user to select available promotion.
ethical_us:
Title: Empowering User Choice in Promotions

- Display all available promotions clearly and without bias on the system interface.
- Ensure that the selection process is intuitive and easily navigable for users.
- Provide detailed information on each promotion, including terms and conditions, to enhance understandability.

text: The system shall allow user to confirm the purchase.
ethical_us:
Title: Confirm Purchase to Ensure Autonomy

Description: As a customer, I want to confirm my purchase before finalizing the transaction so that I maintain control over my spending decisions and ensure that my autonomy is respected.

Work: 
- The system must display a summary of the items in the cart before proceeding to payment.
- The system should provide a clear "Confirm Purchase" button that users must click to finalize the transaction.
- Users must have the option to review and edit their order details before confirming the purchase.
