text: The system shall enable user to enter the payment information.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Payment Information Entry

Description: As a customer, I want to securely enter my payment information so that my financial data is protected from unauthorized access or misuse.

Work:
1. The system must encrypt the payment information during transmission and storage.
2. The user interface should provide clear instructions and feedback to guide users through the payment entry process.
3. Implement a secure authentication method to verify the legitimacy of the user entering payment details.
4. Ensure compliance with relevant financial and data protection regulations, such as PCI-DSS.
5. Provide a visible privacy policy that explains how payment information is used and protected.
6. Conduct regular security audits to identify and rectify potential vulnerabilities in the payment information entry process.

text: The system shall provide a uniform look and feel between all the web pages.

Title: Consistent User Interface for Fair Navigation

Work:
- Ensure all web pages maintain consistent design elements such as color schemes, fonts, and layout.

text: The system shall provide a digital image for each product in the product catalog.

text: The system shall provide handicap access.

text: The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider for T3 access with 99.9999% availability.

Description: As an IT administrator, I want to establish a contractual agreement with an internet service provider for T3 access with 99.9999% availability so that the organization's online services remain consistently accessible and trustworthy to users.

Work:
- Verify that the contractual agreement includes clear terms for 99.9999% service availability.
- Review and confirm the service level agreement (SLA) detailing the performance metrics and remedies for any breaches.
- Ensure the service provider has a proven record of reliability and prompt issue resolution.
- Set up monitoring and reporting systems to track and document the service availability consistently.
- Develop a contingency plan for mitigating any potential downtime, including backup options and communication strategies with users.

text: The system shall provide a contractual agreement with an internet service provider who can provide 99.999% availability through their network facilities onto the internet.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Reliable and Trustworthy Network Connectivity

Description: As a service user, I want to have a contractual agreement with an internet service provider that ensures 99.999% availability so that I can trust the system's network reliability and avoid disruptions.

Work:

- Ensure contractual terms include penalties for non-compliance with availability standards.
- Implement monitoring systems to continually assess network reliability.
- Provide transparent reports to users about network performance and availability.
- Ensure redundancy procedures are in place to address potential network issues. 

Principle: Trust.

text: The product shall be based on web and has to be run from a web server.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Web-based Product Accessibility and Transparency

Description: As a web user, I want the product to be based on the web and run from a web server so that I can access it transparently from anywhere with an internet connection.

Work:

- Guarantee the web product runs smoothly across different browsers.

text: The product shall take initial load time depending on internet connection strength which also depends on the media from which the product is run.

Description: As an end user, I want the product's initial load time to be fair and consistent across different internet connection strengths and media platforms so that all users have an equitable experience when accessing the product.

Work: 
- Develop a mechanism to assess the internet connection strength of each user.
- Implement adaptive loading processes to optimize performance based on connection strength.
- Test the load time across various media platforms (e.g., web, mobile app) to ensure consistency.

text: The performance shall depend upon hardware components of the client/customer.

Title: Ethical Performance Calibration

Description: As a system user, I want the AI system's performance to depend upon hardware components, so that the technology can operate effectively and ethically without causing harm or degradation in user experience.

Work:
- Evaluate the minimum hardware requirements necessary for optimal AI system performance.
- Ensure the AI system provides feedback or suggestions to users when performance might be compromised due to limited hardware.
- Implement adaptive algorithms that adjust AI processing based on the available resources, minimizing potential harm to the user experience.
- Conduct testing across a variety of hardware configurations to ensure equitable performance for all users.

Principle: Transparency

text: The system shall use secure sockets in all transactions that include any confidential customer information.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Transmission of Confidential Information

Description: As a customer, I want my confidential information to be securely transmitted over networks so that my privacy and data integrity are protected and I can trust the system.

Work:
- Ensure all transactions involving confidential customer information utilize secure socket layers (SSL).
- Perform regular security audits to guarantee that SSL implementation meets industry standards.
- Update SSL certificates promptly and appropriately to maintain security.
- Conduct vulnerability assessments to identify and mitigate any potential threats to data transmission security.
- Provide clear communication to users about the security measures in place for protecting their information and the importance of secure data transmission.

text: The system shall automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity.
ethical_us:
Title: Automatic Logout for Inactive Sessions

Description: As a responsible system administrator, I want the system to automatically log out all customers after a period of inactivity so that customer privacy and data security are protected.

Work: 
- Implement a mechanism to detect user inactivity by tracking user engagement metrics.
- Establish a configurable time limit for inactivity, beyond which a user is logged out.
- Provide a session timeout warning to users, informing them of impending logout and giving the option to extend the session.
- Ensure the logout process secures any unsaved work or sensitive data.
- Test the automatic logout feature for both functionality and user experience across different devices and network conditions.
- Document the automatic logout feature in the system's security and privacy policy for user transparency.

text: The system shall confirm all transactions with the customer’s web browser.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Trust

Title: Secure Transaction Confirmation

Description: As a customer, I want the system to confirm all transactions with my web browser so that I can trust the security and accuracy of my transactions.

Work:

- Ensure all transaction details are sent and require confirmation via the customer's web browser before final completion.
- Implement a secure protocol for transaction confirmation to prevent unauthorized access.
- Provide clear, understandable notifications in the web browser for transaction confirmation.
- Allow for a simple process to verify legitimacy and details of each transaction.
- Ensure transaction confirmation logs are maintained for auditing and accountability purposes.
- Test the transaction confirmation process with customers to ensure reliability and user comprehension.

text: The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing the user’s password.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Cookie Management for User Privacy

Description: As a privacy-conscious user, I want the system to ensure my password is never stored in cookies on my computer so that my personal data remains protected and secure.

Work:
- Ensure that the system's cookie management policy strictly prohibits the storage of user passwords in cookies.
- Implement a secure password handling mechanism that does not rely on cookies for authentication purposes.
- Conduct regular security audits to verify that no cookies contain sensitive information like passwords.
- Provide clear documentation and user guidance on how user data is managed and protected.
- Test the system extensively to ensure compliance with privacy best practices and identify any potential vulnerabilities.

text: The system shall not leave any cookies on the customer’s computer containing any of the user’s confidential information.
ethical_us:
Title: Safeguarding User Privacy Through Cookie Management

Description: As a privacy-conscious user, I want the system to avoid storing any of my confidential information in cookies so that my personal data remains secure and private from unauthorized access.

Work: 
- Ensure that cookies do not store any personally identifiable information (PII).
- Implement secure alternatives for storing user session data.
- Conduct regular audits of cookie data to ensure compliance with privacy standards.
- Provide clear communication to users about what data is stored in cookies and how it is managed.
- Obtain user consent before storing any non-essential cookies on their device.

text: The customer’s web browser shall never display a customer’s password.  It shall always be echoed with special characters representing typed characters.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Password Display

Description: As a security-conscious customer, I want my password to be obscured with special characters when typing, so that my sensitive information remains private and secure from any onlookers.

Work: 
- The web browser shall display all typed characters in the password field as asterisks or bullets.
- The system shall ensure that password entries are hidden by default across all input fields designated for passwords.
- Provide an option to reveal the password temporarily with appropriate security measures, such as a "show/hide" toggle button, which will revert after a short period.
- Implement thorough testing to ensure no accidental exposure of passwords due to browser errors or user actions like copy-pasting.
- Review security protocols regularly to align with the current best practices for password protection and privacy.

text: The customer’s web browser shall never display a customer’s credit card number after retrieving from the database.  It shall always be shown with just the last 4 digits of the credit card number.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure Display of Credit Card Information

Description: As a customer, I want my credit card information to be protected and displayed only with the last 4 digits so that my financial privacy is safeguarded and my personal data security is maintained.

Work:
- Retrieve the credit card number securely from the database.
- Implement a masking system to display only the last 4 digits of the credit card number in the web browser.
- Ensure the full credit card number is not stored or cached in the browser.
- Verify that the system adheres to relevant privacy and data protection regulations.
- Conduct regular security audits to ensure the masking system remains secure and effective.

text: The system’s back-end servers shall never display a customer’s password.  The customer’s password may be reset but never shown.
ethical_us:
Title: Safeguarding Customer Password Visibility

Description: As a customer, I want my password to never be displayed on the system’s back-end servers so that my privacy and security are maintained.

Work: 
- Ensure back-end systems are designed to protect customer passwords from being displayed.
- Implement password hashing techniques to secure stored passwords.
- Enable a password reset functionality that does not reveal the existing password.
- Conduct regular audits to confirm passwords are never exposed in any system process.
- Train staff on policies to handle customer data securely and confidentially.

text: The system’s back-end databases shall be encrypted.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Data Privacy through Encryption

Description: As a Data Privacy Officer, I want the system's back-end databases to be encrypted so that sensitive information is protected from unauthorized access and privacy breaches are mitigated.

Work: 
- Ensure that all data stored in the back-end databases is encrypted at rest.
- Implement strong encryption algorithms in line with industry standards.
- Conduct regular security audits to verify the encryption integrity.
- Develop a process for secure encryption key management.
- Provide documentation and training for team members on data encryption practices.

text: The system shall allow the user to register for an account from any page in the system.
ethical_us:
Title: Transparent Registration Accessibility from Any Page

Description: As a website visitor, I want to register for an account from any page in the system so that I have a clear and seamless experience without having to navigate away or search for registration options, ensuring transparency in access.

Work:
- Ensure a visible registration link/button is present on all pages.
- Test the registration process from multiple pages for consistency.
- Provide clear guidance or tooltip on what registration entails and the benefits.
- Implement analytics to track and ensure users can successfully register from any page.
- Ensure that any data collected during registration complies with privacy laws and is communicated transparently to the user.

text: The system will use a single password per user to login to the E-Store System.
ethical_us:
**Title: Ensure Secure User Authentication**

**Description:** As a **user**, I want to have a unique password for my login to the E-Store System so that my personal information and account data remain secure and private.

**Work:**
- The system must require each user to create a unique password during registration.
- Passwords must meet established security criteria (e.g., minimum length, inclusion of alphanumeric and special characters).
- Implement encryption protocols to securely store and process passwords.
- Provide users with a secure means to reset their password if they forget it.
- Conduct regular security audits to ensure the password system is resistant to breaches.

*Related Ethical Principle: Privacy*

text: The system shall use secure socket layer (SSL) technology to ensure all payments made online and user logins are secure.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Secure Transactions and Logins

Description: As a security-conscious user, I want to have my online payments and logins protected through secure socket layer (SSL) technology so that I can trust that my sensitive information is safeguarded against unauthorized access and data breaches.

Work:
- Verify that SSL certificates are implemented on all payment and login pages.
- Ensure the server configurations are set to force HTTPS connections for these activities.
- Perform regular audits to check for SSL certificate validity and renewal.
- Test transactions and login processes to confirm secure data encryption.
- Educate users on recognizing secure (SSL-protected) connections during their online interactions.

text: Any page of the application should not take more than 6 seconds to load on a DSL broadband connection.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient Access for Seamless User Experience

Description: As a user, I want the application's pages to load within 6 seconds on a DSL broadband connection so that I can trust the application to provide a smooth and efficient experience without unnecessary delays.

Work:
- Ensure all images, scripts, and elements are optimized for fast loading times.
- Implement caching strategies to reduce server load and improve response times.
- Conduct performance testing on a DSL broadband connection to guarantee the 6-second load time requirement is met.
- Monitor and analyze page load times regularly to identify and rectify potential bottlenecks promptly.
- Utilize a Content Delivery Network (CDN) to distribute load and improve access speed for users globally.

Ethical Principle: Trust - This focuses on building trust through reliable and efficient system performance, ensuring that users can access the application without consistently encountering slowdowns or delays.

text: The system may be throttled or slowed down on heavy loads to ensure service for everybody. By throttling is meant that certain functionality may be unavailable during heavy server load.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Fair Resource Allocation During Heavy Server Load

Description: As a system administrator, I want to implement throttling mechanisms to manage heavy server loads so that all users can have a fair chance of accessing the services without significant disruptions.

Work: 
- Acceptance criteria:
  1. Implement a throttling system that identifies peak load times and automatically reduces non-essential services.
  2. Ensure the throttling mechanism prioritizes core functions essential for user access.
  3. Develop a communication strategy to inform users about potential delays or unavailable features during peak times.
  4. Monitor system performance during throttling to ensure equitable distribution of resources among active users.
  5. Provide feedback and logging to evaluate the effectiveness and fairness of the throttling system and make improvements as necessary. 

Ethical Principle: Justice and Fairness. This user story focuses on ensuring fair access by managing resources intelligently during heavy server loads to prevent some users from being disproportionately affected.

text: The application should be able to support 100 concurrent users without any performance degradation.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Reliable Performance for High User Load

Description: As a user, I want the application to support 100 concurrent users without any performance degradation so that I can trust it to deliver a consistent and efficient experience during peak usage times.

Ethical Principle: Trust

Work: 
- Conduct load testing to simulate 100 concurrent users and analyze the performance metrics.
- Optimize the application infrastructure to handle high user loads efficiently.
- Implement monitoring tools to detect potential performance degradation as the user count increases.
- Provide documentation on performance outcomes and any limitations identified during testing.
- Ensure that the performance improvement strategies respect data privacy and security standards.

text: The system should be able to scale up to 500 concurrent users (if there is a need in the future) by installing additional hardware components.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Scalability for Seamless User Experience

Description: As a system administrator, I want the system to be able to scale up to 500 concurrent users by installing additional hardware components so that we can ensure a reliable and fair service for all users during peak times and future growth.

Work: 
- Evaluate current system architecture and identify potential bottlenecks that might affect scalability.
- Develop a modular hardware upgrade plan for seamless integration without impacting current operations.
- Conduct stress tests simulating 500 concurrent users to identify performance issues and ensure smooth functionality.
- Implement monitoring and alert systems to anticipate and react timely to increased load demands.
- Document the scalability process and make sure all relevant team members are trained for future scalability needs. 

This user story aligns with the ethical principle of Justice and fairness, ensuring that all users receive a fair and uninterrupted service experience, regardless of the time or number of users.

text: The MTBF (if any) should not be less than 2 months.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Consistent System Reliability

Description: As a product user, I want the system to maintain a minimum Mean Time Between Failures (MTBF) of at least 2 months so that I can trust its reliability and minimize disruptions.

Work: 
- Implement system design enhancements that contribute to improved reliability and reduced failure rates.
- Conduct thorough testing and quality assurance processes to ensure the system meets the required MTBF threshold.
- Monitor system performance continuously to identify potential risks and address failure trends proactively.
- Provide transparent reporting methods detailing the system's reliability metrics to users.
- Establish a feedback loop for users to report reliability issues, ensuring that these are addressed swiftly and effectively.

text: A secure server will be required to ensure confidentiality of customer’s credit card and other details.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Confidentiality of Customer Financial Details

Description: As a customer, I want my credit card and other personal details to be kept confidential so that my privacy is protected and unauthorized access is prevented.

Work: 
- Implement secure encryption protocols for data storage and transmission.
- Regularly audit and update security measures to protect against potential breaches.
- Ensure server compliance with industry standards for confidentiality and data protection.
- Conduct routine vulnerability assessments and penetration testing.
- Train staff on data handling best practices and confidentiality requirements.

Ethical Principle: Privacy

text: The user interface of the system should be very user friendly.
ethical_us:
Title: Intuitive User Interface Design  

Description: As a user, I want an intuitive and user-friendly interface so that I can navigate and utilize the system efficiently without frustration or confusion.

Work: 
- Design the interface with clear labels and instructions.
- Conduct usability testing with a diverse group of users to ensure accessibility and ease of use.
- Implement a consistent layout and design elements across all pages.
- Ensure fast response times and load speeds for user interactions.
- Provide tooltips and help options for complex features.
- Gather user feedback and make iterative improvements based on their experiences. 

Ethical Principle: Dignity  
Rationale: A user-friendly interface respects the dignity of individuals by recognizing the importance of accessibility and the inherent worth of providing an experience that values users' needs and preferences.

text: It should not take more than 120 seconds for a new user to register for an account.
ethical_us:
Title: Quick and Fair Registration Process

Description: As a new user, I want to register for an account without unnecessary delays so that I can access services efficiently and equally.

Work: 
- Ensure the registration form is simple and intuitive, minimizing unnecessary fields and steps.
- Implement performance optimizations to ensure form submission and processing are completed within 120 seconds.
- Test the registration process across various devices and network conditions to ensure it performs reliably for all users.
- Provide clear and understandable feedback to the user throughout the registration process to assist in swift completion.
- Conduct usability testing to identify and remove any roadblocks or biased elements in the registration process. 

This user story is aligned with the principle of Justice and fairness, emphasizing that the registration process should be equitable and efficient for all users, preventing any form of discrimination or bias due to technical or design inefficiencies.

text: It should not take more than 90 seconds for a registered user to place an order.
ethical_us:
Title: Efficient Order Placement for User Convenience

Description: As a registered user, I want to place an order in less than 90 seconds so that I can save time and have a seamless purchasing experience without unnecessary delays.

Work: 
- Ensure the user interface is intuitive and easy to navigate.
- Optimize backend processes to handle order requests swiftly.
- Implement a quick checkout process that minimizes clicks and steps.
- Conduct performance tests to ensure order placement consistently meets the 90-second requirement.
- Provide clear communication and feedback during the order process.

Ethical Principle: Beneficence. This requirement is designed to enhance the user experience by making the process more efficient, which benefits the user by reducing frustration and saving time.

text: The system should be easy enough to maintain that someone else could do it with a manual and a few hours training.
ethical_us:
**Title:** Transparent Maintenance Process

**Description:** As a **maintenance engineer**, I want to **understand and maintain the AI system using a manual and minimal training** so that **the system can be sustained effectively without reliance on specific personnel**.

**Work:**

- The maintenance manual should clearly explain the system’s architecture and processes.
- The training session should cover all basic and critical maintenance tasks within a few hours.
- Provide step-by-step instructions and troubleshooting guides in the manual.
- The system should have self-diagnostic capabilities to aid in easy identification of issues.
- Regular updates to the manual must be included to cover new features or changes.
- Ensure all information is communicated in a clear and understandable manner suitable for individuals with minimal technical background.

text: The system should be portable to various operating environments.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring System Portability for Increased Trust

Description: As a user, I want the system to be portable across various operating environments so that I can rely on its consistent performance and maintain trust in its effectiveness and reliability.

Work:
- Verify compatibility across multiple operating systems, including Windows, macOS, Linux, and others.
- Conduct tests to ensure consistent functionality and performance in different hardware environments.
- Provide documentation outlining steps for deploying the system in various operating environments.
- Ensure seamless updates and maintenance processes across platforms to avoid disruptions.
- Gather user feedback on system performance in different environments and incorporate suggestions for improvement.

text: Registered User must be able to maintain his/her session information for at least 60 minutes of inactive session before the system prompts him to log out of the system. The registered user must be provided with all the options of the E-store regardless of the time when he/she logs in.
ethical_us:
Title: Ensure Uninterrupted Access and Session Stability for Registered Users

Description: As a registered user, I want to maintain my session information for at least 60 minutes of inactivity so that I can access all options of the E-store seamlessly and without unnecessary disruptions during my shopping experience, regardless of the time when I log in.

Work: 
- The system must extend the session timeout to last for at least 60 minutes of inactivity.
- The prompt to log out after inactivity must only appear once the 60-minute period has lapsed.
- All features and options of the E-store must remain available and consistent upon re-login, regardless of when the user initially logged in.
- Ensure session information is securely stored to protect user privacy during the inactive period.
- Implement user notifications or messages that clearly inform users about their session status when inactive.

Ethical Principle: Trust

This requirement aligns with the ethical principle of Trust because it ensures that users can rely on the system to maintain session stability and provide consistent access to E-store features, fostering trust in the system's reliability and user experience.

text: The entire website must be user-friendly and easily navigable. The website must be provided with a site map for quick access to a particular link according to the requirement specification. The user must be able to find what he/she wants from the site without any difficulty. The website must adhere to branding schemes and the layout of the web pages must be uniform throughout
ethical_us:
Title: Ensuring Website Usability and Accessibility

Description: As a user, I want the website to be user-friendly and easily navigable with a site map, so that I can efficiently find what I need without unnecessary difficulty.

Work: 
- Provide a comprehensive site map for quick access to specific links.
- Ensure uniformity in the layout of web pages adhering to branding schemes.
- Implement intuitive navigation that allows users to find content effortlessly.
- Conduct user testing to ensure ease of use and identify any navigation issues.

text: The system shall support up to 10000 simultaneous users against the central database at any given time and up to 5000 simultaneous users against the local servers at any one time. The performance of the website must be optimal incase of huge loads and hence appropriate load balancing must be done to achieve this. There can be any number of mirror servers readily available in case of huge loads without the user getting any delay.
ethical_us:
Title: Reliable and Efficient System Performance

Description: As a user, I want the system to support large numbers of simultaneous users efficiently, so that I experience no delays or interruptions during peak usage times.

Work:
- Implement scalable server infrastructure to support up to 10,000 simultaneous users on the central database and 5,000 on local servers.
- Develop and integrate load balancing mechanisms to optimize the system's performance during high demand.
- Configure an automatic switch to mirror servers when the server load surpasses the threshold to ensure uninterrupted service.
- Test the system under various load conditions to ensure optimal performance and no delay in user experience.
- Document the load balancing and server infrastructure strategies to maintain transparency and understanding among all stakeholders.

text: The website must provide highest degree of security to the registered users. All the transactions that are made must be secured. The sensitive information passed to and from the website must be secured. Identity theft and other security related issues must be solved. Unauthorized transmission of sensitive information of the user to third party websites for reference must be avoided. On the basis of user agreement the information must be processed. All the information about the registered user must be securely stored in the central database.
ethical_us:
Title: Secure and Trustworthy User Experience

Description: As a registered user, I want my personal and sensitive information to be securely transmitted, stored, and processed so that I can trust the website with my data and protect myself from identity theft and unauthorized access. 

Work: 
- Ensure all data transmission to and from the website is encrypted using industry-standard protocols.
- Implement robust authentication and authorization mechanisms to prevent unauthorized access.
- Store user data securely in the central database, following best practices for data protection.
- Prohibit unauthorized sharing of user data with third parties without explicit user consent.
- Provide a comprehensive user agreement detailing how information will be processed and obtain user agreement before data processing.
- Regularly audit and test the security framework to identify and fix vulnerabilities.
- Ensure compliance with applicable data protection regulations and standards.

text: The product shall be intuitive and self-explanatory. 90% of new users shall be able to start the display of Events or Activities within 90 minutes of using the product.
ethical_us:
Title: Intuitive and Self-Explanatory User Experience

Description: As a new user, I want to navigate and begin using the product's features with ease so that I can utilize the platform effectively without needing additional assistance.

Work:
- Acceptance Criteria:
  - Implement user-friendly interfaces with clear navigation paths.
  - Conduct usability testing with a sample of new users to ensure 90% can start displaying Events or Activities within 90 minutes.
  - Design intuitive guides or tooltips for first-time users to assist in navigation.
  - Ensure the platform follows design principles that enhance understandability, such as consistent layout and labeling.
  - Gather feedback from new users to continuously improve the intuitiveness of the product.

Ethical Principle: Transparency — emphasizing understandability and communication in product design to ensure users are well-informed and can use the product successfully without hidden complexities.

text: The system shall be intuitive and self explanatory.
ethical_us:
**Title: Intuitive and Transparent User Experience**

**Description:** As a user of the AI system, I want it to be intuitive and self-explanatory so that I can understand how to navigate and use it effectively without confusion or needing extensive assistance.

**Work:**

- The user interface should clearly display labels and instructions in simple language.
- All features and functionalities should have tooltips or help buttons that explain their purpose.
- Provide a user guide or FAQ section for additional assistance if needed.
- Ensure that system feedback (like error messages) is descriptive and points towards solutions.
- Include onboarding tutorials for first-time users to help them get started.
- Conduct user testing sessions to ensure the interface is easily navigable for users of varying technical backgrounds.

text: The product shall use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the realtor community.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Ensure Clear Communication with Realtor Community

Description: As a realtor, I want the product to use symbols and words that are naturally understandable by the realtor community, so that I can easily comprehend the information and use the product effectively without confusion.

Work: 
- Identify common symbols and terminologies used within the realtor community.
- Conduct user testing with realtors to verify the clarity and understanding of the symbols and words used in the product.
- Update product documentation to include a glossary of terms and symbols specific to the realtor community.
- Implement a feedback mechanism for realtors to report any symbols or words that are unclear or misleading.
- Ensure that all user interface elements using these symbols and words are reviewed by a language expert within the realtor domain before final deployment.

text: The system shall be intuitive to the Program Administrators/Nursing Staff Members.
ethical_us:
Ethical Principle: Transparency

Title: Ensure System Transparency for Nursing Staff

Description: As a Nursing Staff Member, I want the system to be intuitive so that I can understand and effectively use it without confusion or errors.

Work:
- Ensure the system interface is user-friendly and easy to navigate for Nursing Staff Members.
- Provide clear, step-by-step instructions within the system to guide users through complex tasks.
- Conduct user testing with Nursing Staff Members to identify areas of confusion and address them.
- Implement help and support features that are easily accessible within the system.
- Gather feedback from Nursing Staff Members to continuously improve system usability and transparency.
